Srinivasamakhi Vedantadesika: Dasavidhahetunirupana (part of the Vaikhanasasutratatparyacintamani)
Based on (pp. 1-122) the of the Devanāgarī-ed. by R. Parthasarathi Bhattacarya:
Śrīvaikhānasagṛhyasūtra (= DHN[D]); 2 vols., Akulamannāḍu, 1967 (reprint Tirupati, 1997/98).
Input by Ute Hüsken
ANNOTATED VERSION
STRUCTURE OF REFERENCES:
[nn.nn] = pagination of R. Pārthasārathi Bhaṭṭācārya's edition (at the beginning of the line)
*{nn}* = note-number in main text
!{nn}! = note-number in note section (at the beginning of the respective note)
FURTHER NOTES BY THE CONTRIBUTOR:
Die in eckige Klammern gesetzten Angaben im Text sowie die Anmerkungen sind Ergänzungen von Ute Hüsken.
Die Angaben aus dem Inhaltsverzeichnis der Devanāgarī-Edition sind in eckigen Klammern als Zwischenüberschriften in den Text eingefügt.
Die Quellennachweise bei Zitaten stehen in eckigen Klammern am rechten Rand oder in den Anmerkungen - dort ohne eckige Klammern.
Abweichende Lesarten der älteren Telugu-Ausgabe des Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa (Abk.: DHN[T]; s.u.) sowie der zitierten Texte sind gelegentlich in Anmerkungen notiert, jedoch nicht durchgängig.*{1}*
Wird im Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa durch kurze Zitate auf längere Textzusammenhänge Bezug genommen, sind diese - sofern verifiziert - an der ersten Stelle ihres Vorkommens vollständig in den Anmerkungen zitiert. An weiteren Stellen wird auf das erste Zitat verwiesen. Die Verse sind in der vorliegenden Textwiedergabe der Ausgabe folgend eingerückt, Daṇḍas im Prosa-Text durch Punkte und Kommata ersetzt.
Das Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa liegt in zwei Editionen vor,*{2}* die beide von dem Vaikhānasa-Gelehrten Pārthasārathi Bhaṭṭācārya besorgt wurden. Die erste Edition erschien 1931 in Telugu-Schrift und umfaßt als Grundtext nur das Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa.
Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa by Śrīnivāsa Dīkṣita [in Telugu-script], ed. as Śrīvaikhānasasūtratātparyacintāmaṇidhṛto Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇākhyo bhāgaḥ, with Sanskrit-commentary and explanations in Telugu by Rompicarla Bhattar Srinivasa Aiyangar, Igavaripalem, 1931 (Śrīvaikhānasagranthamālā, Anubandha 5).
Wenngleich dieser Telugu-Druck an vielen Stellen die vermutlich richtigere Lesart enthält und die darin gegebenen Zitate den zitierten Texten in der uns heute gedruckt vorliegenden Form häufig näherkommen, ist der Textwiedergabe in der vorliegenden Arbeit die 36 Jahre später erschienene Devanāgarī-Edition zugrunde gelegt, da der Telugu-Druck an vielen Stellen nicht mehr lesbar ist. Zudem ist die ältere Telugu-Edition des Textes weltweit nur in wenigen Bibliotheken vorhanden und wegen der Brüchigkeit des Papiers kaum zu benutzen. Selbst im vorbildlich restaurierten Exemplar der Niedersächsischen Staats-und Universitätsbibliothek Göttingen (Signatur A 2000 A 35512) sind etliche Passagen unleserlich. Der Edition von 1931 in Telugu-Schrift ist neben dem Text des Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa auch der Sanskrit-Kommentar Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇavyākhyāna (Abk.: DHNV) und eine Telugu-Erläuterung des Herausgebers beigegeben. Zudem enthält das Werk noch einen Zitatindex von 13 Seiten, so daß das Buch insgesamt stattliche 748 Druckseiten umfaßt. Der Umfang des Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇavyākhyāna übertrifft dabei den des Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa selbst bei weitem. Im Vorwort dieser Ausgabe äußert der Herausgeber sich nicht zu den der Edition zugrunde liegenden Manuskripten.
In der zweiten Edition von 1967 gab Pārthasārathi Bhaṭṭācārya das Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa zusammen mit dem Tātparyacintāmaṇi in zwei Bänden in Devanāgarī-Schrift heraus. Der Text dieser Ausgabe umfaßt 122 Druckseiten. Im Vorwort gibt Pārthasārathi Bhaṭṭācārya zu den dabei benutzten Manuskripten lediglich an, daß sie ihm sämtlich von Vaikhānasa-Familien zur Verfügung gestellt worden seien, und daß alle Manuskripte hinsichtlich der Fehler und Auslassungen identisch seien ("Introduction", S. v). Es ist davon auszugehen, daß er für diese Edition mindestens drei Handschriften konsultierte, die ihm drei Personen aus Andhra Pradesh (Ākuḷamannāḍu, Tirupati, Nallūru) überließen ("Introduction", S. viii). Da Pārthasārathi Bhaṭṭācārya seine Telugu-Edition des Daśavidhahetunirūpaṇa von 1931 mit keinem Wort erwähnt, bleibt unklar, ob er ganz andere Manuskripte verwendete oder ob die textliche Basis beider Editionen identisch ist.
-----
!{1}! Besonderheiten des Telugu-Textes, die den Gepflogenheiten alter Telugu-Drucke entsprechen, sind nicht gesondert vermerkt (s. dazu Grünendahl, 2001, S. xviiff.). Auf abweichende Lesarten im Telugu-Druck weist die Abkürzung "DHN[T]" mit Seitenzahl, aber ohne Zeilenangabe hin. Diese Unterscheide zwischen Devanāgarī- und Telugu-Ausgabe sind allerdings hier noch nicht vollständig erfaßt
!{2}! In keiner der beiden Editionen sind Lesarten angegeben.

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: [1.7] śrīveṅkaṭeśam akhileśam anantam ādyaṃ kāruṇyavāridhim aśeṣasurais suvandyam /
[1.8] vande samastajagatāṃ sthitisṛṣṭihetuṃ mānyān gurūṃś ca śataśo*{4}* bhṛgukaśyapādīn //

div.p: !{3}! DHN[T] 1: veṅkaṭeśārcanāvaram. !{4}! DHN[T] 2: vaikhānasān munivarān statt mānyān gurūṃś ca śataśo. !{5}! Dieser Vers ist auch zu Beginn der Thanjavur-Edition des Vimānārcanakalpa (S. 3) als "Śrīvikhanasācāryastotrapāṭha" zitiert; dort steht zuvor der Śloka: śrautasmārtakarma nikhilam yena sūtritam / tasmai samasta vedārthavidhe vikhanasa namaḥ. !{6}! DHN[T] 5: sūtrāṇām anyakḷptānāṃ. !{7}! DHN[T] 6: sūtrāṇām uttamaṃ sūtraṃ. !{8}! DHN[T] 9: śrīmatkauśikagotreṇa.

[2.1-3] atha satyatvādisamastakalyāṇaguṇaviśiṣṭāt parabrahmaṇaḥ śrīmannārāyaṇād utpannena vikhanaśśabdavācyena caturmukhabrahmaṇā praṇītasya vaikhānasasūtrasya sarvasūtrottamatve tatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatamatve ca daśavidhahetavo nirūpyante. [2.4] yathā: [2.5-9] akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtena vikhanasā praṇītatvāt.*{9}* sarvasūtrāṇām āditvāt.*{10}* sarvakarmasu śrutimārgānusāritvāt.*{11}* samantrakasarvakriyāpratipādakatvāt.*{12}* niṣekasaṃskārādimatvāt.*{13}* aṣṭādaśaśārīrasaṃskārapratipādakatvāt.*{14}* sāṅgakriyākalāpavattvāt.*{15}* manvādyaiḥ svīkṛtatvāt.*{16}* akhilajagadekakāraṇabhūtaśrīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvāt.*{17}* etatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhānavatām eva bhagavatpriyatamatvopapatteś ca.*{18}* iti. [2.10-12] ebhir hetubhir asya sūtrasya sarvasūtrottamatvaṃ etatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhānād eva vaikhānasānāṃ sarvebhyaḥ śreṣṭhatamatvāñ ca śrutismṛtipurāṇādimukhena pratipādyate. tatrādau akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtena vikhanasā praṇītatvād iti hetur nirūpyate. [2.13] vikhanaśśabdārthanirṇayaḥ

[2.14] vikhanā nāma kaścid ṛṣiḥ, uta nārāyaṇaḥ? nārāyaṇa eva kevalaṃ. [2.15-16] munimātrasya vaikhānasaśabdavācyatvena pratipādanābhāvāt. paramātmano nārāyaṇasya vikhano vaikhānasādiśabdavācyatvaṃ śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣv avagamyate. yathā: [2.17] khilaśrutau: "dhenur vahāṇām aditis surāṇāṃ brahmā ṛbhūṇāṃ vikhanā munīnām".

lg.l: [2.18-19] iti śruyate. ayam arthaḥ. vahānāṃ ataḍudādīnāṃ dhenuḥ utpattikāraṇam. surāṇāṃ indrādīnām aditiḥ. ṛbhūṇāṃ:
[2.20] "sādhyā viśve ca vasavo maruto ṛbhavas tathā /
[2.21] tathaivāṅgiraso rudrā ādityāś ca tathaiva ca /

div.l: [2.23] iti bhṛgūktānāṃ sādhyādīnāṃ brahmā. munīnāṃ muniśabdavācyānāṃ vikhanāḥ.
[2.24] brahmaṇo muniśabdavācyatvaṃ bhārate cāvagamyate
[2.25] "niśāṃ suptvātha bhagavān kṣapānte pratyabuddhyata* /{19}* [MBh 13, App. 3.265]
[3.1] paścād buddhvā sasarjāpaḥ tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat* //{20}* [MBh 13, App. 3.266]
[3.2] tad aṇḍam abhavad dhaimaṃ sahasrāṃśusamaprabham / [MBh 13, App. 3.267]
[3.3] ahaṅkṛtyā*{21}* tatas tasmin sasarja prabhur īśvaraḥ / [MBh 13, App. 3.268]
[3.4] hiraṇyagarbhaṃ viśvātmā brahmāṇaṃ jalajaṃ*{22}* munim //" iti [MBh 13, App. 3.269]
[3.5] aṇḍabahutvābhiprāyeṇa munīnām iti bahuvacanam. yathā
[3.6] "aṇḍānān tu sahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca /
[3.7] īdṛśānām anantānāṃ koṭikoṭiśatāni ce//"ti smaraṇāt.
[3.8] niśā cātra pralayaḥ, sā etāvatīti kutrāvagamyata iti cet.
[3.9] mahābhārate: "caturyugasahasrāṇi caturyugaśatāni ca*{23}* / [MBh 13, App. 3.261]
[3.10] prāhuḥ kalpasahasran tu*{24}* brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ / [MBh 13, App. 3.262]
[3.11] daśakalpasahasrāṇi apy ayas sā mahāniśā*{25}* //" iti. [MBh 13, App. 3.263]
[3.12-13] anayā khilaśrutyā bhagavato vikhanaśśabdavācyatvaṃ katham avagamyata iti cet ucyate.

lg.l: [3.14] "durbodhā vaidikāś śabdā prakīrṇatvāc ca ye khilāḥ /
[3.15] tadjñais ta eva spaṣṭārthāḥ smṛtitantre pratiṣṭhitāḥ //"*{26}* iti
[3.17] na cet purāṇasadvidyā na vedārthavicakṣaṇaḥ //" iti
[3.19] bibhety alpaśruvād*{28}* vedo mām ayaṃ pratariṣyati //" iti ca [MBh 1.1.204]

lg.l: [3.22-23] "namas te devadeveśa"*{29}* ity ārabhya stotramadhye "phenapācārya vālakhilya vikhano vikhanasa vaikhānasācārya abhagnayoga abhagnaparisaṅkhyāna"*{30}* iti.
[3.24] tatraiva: "yat tasminn upalabhyaṃ te tat tejas tat trayīmayam /

div.l: [4.6] iti śāṇḍilyena śatānandam abhilakṣyoktam.
[4.7] vaikhānase ānandasaṃhitāyāṃ:
[4.8] "vedāntatattvamīmāṃsākhananaṃ kṛtavāt hariḥ* /{32}*
[4.9] nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhur yañ ca vaikhānasaṃ tathā* //{33}*" iti proktam. [ĀS ]
[4.10-12] atra khananaśabdena saṅkalpa ucyate. "so 'kāmayata. bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti sa tapo 'tayata"*{34}* ityādi śrutibhyaḥ. avāptasamastakāmasyāpi bhagavataḥ sṛṣṭikārye pravṛttir bhavati.
[4.16] iti samagraṣāḍguṇyaparipūrṇasya avāptasamastakāmasya kimarthaṃ sṛṣṭyadikam*{35}* iti cet ucyate.
[4.17] "aprameyo 'niyojyaś ca yatra kāmagamo vaśī / [MBh 2, App. 21.1605]
[4.18] modate bhagavān bhūtaiḥ bālaḥ kīḍanakair iva* //{36}*" [MBh 2, App. 21.1606]
[4.19] ityādi bhāratavacanānusāreṇa līlārtham eveti.
[4.20] jagadsṛṣṭyādilīlānubhavārthaṃ bhagavatā samaṣṭisṛṣṭer anantaraṃ vyaṣṭisṛṣṭau

lg.l: [4.21-22] devamanuṣyādivividhaviśeṣasṛṣṭyarthaṃ caturmukhasṛṣṭiṃ prati dhyānaṃ kṛtam. eṣā cidacidātmikā sṛṣṭiḥ bhagavatā kriyate. vyaṣṭisṛṣṭis tu brahmaṇā. samaṣṭisṛṣṭir nāma:
[4.23] "bhūtais tu pañcabhiḥ prāṇaiḥ svāntair daśabhir indriyaiḥ /

div.p: !{31}! Bezug auf MBh 13.135.119: ātmayoniḥ svayañjāto vaikhānaḥ sāmagāyanaḥ / devakīnandanaḥ sraṣṭā kṣitīśaḥ pāpanāśanaḥ. !{32}! Lies mit DHN[T] 54: kṛtavān; vgl. DHN[D] 11.13; vgl. ĀS 4.15cd: viśeṣakhananaṃ tatra kṛtavān kṛtināṃ varaḥ; vgl. ĀS 15.19ab: vedāntatattvamīmāṃsākhananaṃ kṛtvān prabhuḥ. !{33}! Die zweite Vershälfte ist zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.23. !{34}! DHN[T] 55: prajāye"yetītyādi "yasya jñānamayaṃ tapa". !{35}! Lies: sṛṣṭyādikam. !{36}! Lies mit MBh und DHN[T] 61: krīḍanakair iva.

lg.l: [5.1] mahān kālaḥ pradhānañ ca māyāvidyā ca pūruṣaḥ /
[5.2] iti paurāṇikāḥ prāhuḥ triṃśattatvāni tais saha //"

[5.3-9] iti vacanāt tattvasṛṣṭir ity avagamyate. "svāntair" ity anena "mano buddhir ahaṅkāraś cittañ ca karaṇāny amī" ity antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayam ucyate. vyaṣṭisṛṣṭir nāma: aṇḍāntarvartibhūtajātasṛṣṭiḥ. "ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇām" "nityo nityānām cetanaś cetanānām". ityādi śrutibhiḥ nityatvena śrutānāṃ prakṛtipuruṣānāṃ sṛṣṭir nāma pralayadaśāyāṃ sūkṣmarūpeṇa avibhaktanāmarūpeṇa ca paramātmany ekībhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭikāle paramātmano 'nupraveśānantaraṃ sthūlarūpavatvaṃ vibhaktanāmarūpabhāktvañ ca. "tat sṛṣṭvā". "tad evānuprāviśat. tad anupraviśya. sac ca tyac cābhavat" ityādi śruteḥ.

div.l: [5.14] gītāsu: "prakṛtiṃ puruṣam caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api /" [BhGī = MBh 6.35.19ab]

lg.l: [5.15] mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham /
[5.16] sambhavas sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata //" [BhGī = MBh 6.36.3]

[5.17-21] iti coktarītyā sṛṣṭikāle jagadyonibhūtaṃ "mahabrahma" tadīyaṃ prakṛtyākhyam ācidvastu*{38}* yat, tasmin cetanākhyaṃ garbhaṃ yojayati. tatkṛtāc cidacitsaṃsargāt devādisthāvarāntānām acinmiśrāṇāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sambhavo bhavati. evam eva paramātmanā pañcīkṛtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ anyonyasaṃyogādinā aṇḍoptattyādikaṃ*{39}* śrīviṣṇupurāṇe pratipādyate. yathā:
[5.24] śāntā ghorāś ca mūḍhāś ca viśeṣās tena te smṛtāḥ /
[5.25] nānāvīryāḥ pṛthagbhūtāḥ tataḥ te saṃhatiṃ vinā // [ViṣṇuP ]

div.p: !{37}! Lies mit DHN[T] 72: āvirbhāvatirobhāvajanmanāśavikalpavat. !{38}! Lies: acidvastu. !{39}! Lies: aṇḍotpattyādikaṃ. !{40}! ViṣṇuP: śabdādibhir guṇair brahman.

div.l: [6.3] ekasaṅghātalakṣyāś ca*{41}* saṃprāpyaikyamaśeṣataḥ / [ViṣṇuP 1.2.49cd]
[6.4] puruṣādhiṣṭhitatvāc cāpy avyaktānugraheṇa ca* //{42}* [ViṣṇuP 1.2.50ab]
[6.5] mahadādyā viśeṣāntā hy aṇḍam utpādayanti te /
[6.6] tatkrameṇa prabuddhaṃ taj*{43}* jalabudbudavatsamam /
[6.7] bhūtebhyo 'ṇḍaṃ mahābuddhe pravṛddham udakeśayam* /{44}*
[6.8] prākṛtaṃ brahmarūpasya viṣṇoḥ sthānam anuttamam // [Viṣṇu.P 1.2.51]
[6.11] ity ārabhya
[6.12] "tasminn aṇḍe 'bhavad brahmā*{45}* sadevāsuramānuṣaḥ //" [ViṣṇuP 1.2.54]
[6.13-14] ityādibhiḥ samaṣṭisṛṣṭyādikam*{46}* uktam. viśeṣeṇa vyaṣṭisṛṣṭāv api brahmaṇo 'ṇḍādiṣūtpattiprakāraḥ śrūyate. yathā:

[6.15-21] mahopaniṣadi: "athāto mahopaniṣadaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīd" ity ārabhya "tasya dhyānāntassthasya yajñastomam ucyate. tasmin caturdaśapuruṣā jāyante. ekā kanyā*{47}*. daśendriyāṇi mana ekādaśaṃ tejo dvādaśam ahaṅkāraḥ trayodaśaḥ praṇāś*{48}* caturdaśaḥ ātmā pañcadaśaḥ buddhir bhūtāni pañca tanmātrāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni ca sa ekaḥ pañcaviṃśaḥ puruṣaḥ."*{49}* "atha punar eva nārāyaṇas so 'nyatkāmo*{50}* manasā dhyāyata tasya dhyānāntassthasya lalāṭāt svedo 'patat, ta imāḥ pratatā āpaḥ, tāsu tejaḥ, tat tejo*{51}* hiraṇmayam aṇḍam tatra brahmā caturmukho 'jāyata."*{52}* iti.
[6.22] yajuṣi: "sa prajāpatir ekaḥ puṣkaraparṇe samabhavat" iti ca.*{53}*
[6.23] *{54}*manau: evaṃ "apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat* //{55}*" ity ārabhya [ManuDhŚ 1.8cd]
[6.24] "tasmin jajñe svayaṃ brahmā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ //" iti [ManuDhŚ 1.9cd]

div.p: !{41}! ViṣṇuP: ekasaṅghātalakṣmāś ca. !{42}! ViṣṇuP: puruṣādhiṣṭhitatvāc ca pradhā nānugraheṇa ca. !{43}! ViṣṇuP: tatkrameṇa vivṛddhan tu. !{44}! ViṣṇuP: vṛhat tad udakeśayam. !{45}! ViṣṇuP: tasminn aṇḍe 'bhavad vipra. !{46}! Lies mit DHN[T] 77: samaṣṭisṛṣṭyādikam. !{47}! DHN[T] 79: (kanyā). !{48}! Lies mit DHN[T] 79: prāṇāś. !{49}! DHN[T] 79: pañcaviṃśakaḥ puruṣaṃ ity uktvā. !{50}! DHN[T] 79 ins. (syaṃ kāmaṃ). !{51}! DHN[T] 80: tāsu tejo (tat tejo) statt tāsu tejaḥ, tat tejo. !{52}! Bezug auf MahāU 1.1: athāto mahopaniṣadaṃ vyākhyāsyāmas tad āhur eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā neśāno nāpo nāgniśomau neme dyāvāpṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇi na sūryo na candramāḥ. sa ekākī na ramate. tasya dhyānāntaḥsthasya yajñastomam ucyate. tasmin puruṣāś caturdaśa jāyante. ekā kanyā. daśendriyāṇi mana ekādaśaṃ tejaḥ. dvādaśam ahaṅkāraḥ. trayodaśaḥ prāṇāḥ. caturdaśaḥ ātmā. pañcadaśī buddhiḥ. bhūtāni pañca tanmātrāṇi. pañca mahābhūtāni. sa ekaḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ puruṣaḥ. tatpuruṣam puruṣo niveśya nāsya pradhānasaṃvatsarā jāyante. saṃvatsarādadhijāyante. atha punar eva nārāyaṇaḥ so 'nyatkāmo manasādhyāyata. tasya dhyānāntaḥsthasya lalāṭān trayakṣaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ puruṣo jāyate. bibhrac chriyaṃ yaśaḥ satyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ tapo vairāṅyaṃ mana aiśvaryaṃ sapraṇava vyāhṛtaya ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāṅgirasaḥ sarvāṇi chandāṃsi tāny aṅge samāśritāni. tasmād īśāno mahādevo mahād eva. atha punar eva nārāyaṇaḥ so 'nyatkāmo manasādhyāyata. tasya dhyānāntaḥsthasya lalāṭāt svedo 'patat. tā imāḥ pratatā āpaḥ tatas tejo hiraṇyamayam aṇḍam. tatra brahmā caturmukho 'jāyata. DHN[T] 80 ins. nach iti: (puṣkaraparṇe: śrutyantaraṃ). !{53}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.1. !{54}! DHN[T] 81 ins. aṇḍe mānavīsmṛtiḥ. !{55}! Ähnlich zitiert als "Mahābhārata" in DHN[D] 3.1.

lg.l: [7.2] nābhyāṃ vinissṛtam abhūt tatrotpannaḥ prajāpatiḥ //"*{57}* iti ca smaryate.*{58}* [MBh 3.194.11]

div.l: [7.3-4] nanu nābhyām aṇḍe cotpattir ekasya katham upapadyata*{59}* iti cet - tat kalpāntara iti vaktayam. taduktaṃ hayaśira upākhyāne:

lg.l: [7.6] cākṣuṣaṃ vai dvitīyaṃ me āsīj janma purātanam //
[7.7] tvatprasādāc ca me janma tṛtīyaṃ vācikaṃ mahat /
[7.8] tvatto me śrāvaṇañ cāpi caturthaṃ janma vai prabho //
[7.9] nāsikyañ caiva me janma tvattaḥ pañcamam ucyate /
[7.10] aṇḍajañ cāpi me janma tvattaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vinirmittam //

div.l: [7.11] idan tu saptamaṃ janma padmajaṃ me 'mitaprabha* /{60}*" iti.

lg.l: [7.12-14] atas samastajagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsamahānandaikahetoḥ bhagavataḥ parabrahmaṇo nārāyaṇasya vaikhānasādiśabdavācyatvasambhavāt tannābhinalinasañjātasya brahmaṇo 'pi "aṅgād aṅgād"*{61}* iti mantroktaprakāreṇa bhāratādipratipāditarītyā ca*{62}* vaikhānasādiśabdavācyatvam upapadyate.
[7.16] tasmād vikhanaso nāma sa āsīd aṇḍajaḥ priyaḥ //" iti [MBh ]
[7.17] tatraiva: "sraṣṭuṃ sa tu samudyukto brahmayonimayaḥ prabhuḥ /
[7.19] dhyānam āviśya yogena hy āsīd vikhanaso muniḥ //" iti [MBh ]
[7.20-21] śrībhāgavate: "na khalu gopikānandano bhavān akhiladehinām antarātmadṛk /
[7.22-23] vikhanasārthito viśvaguptaye sakha udeyivān sāttvatāṃ kule //" iti [BhāgavataP 10.31.4]

div.p: !{56}! DHN[T] 81 ins. (nābhipadme - bhāratam). !{57}! MBh: nābhyāṃ viniḥsṛtaṃ tatra yatrotpannaḥ pitāmahaḥ. !{58}! DHN[T] 81 om. ca smaryate. !{59}! DHN[T] 83: ekasya vividhotpatti vacanānām aikarasyam ekasmin janmani katham upapadyate. !{60}! DHN[T] 84: padajaṃ me 'mitaprabha und ins. (pādmaṃ me cāmitaprabha). !{61}! Bezug auf ṚV 10.163.1-2{21}: aṅgād aṅgāl lomno lomno jātaṃ parvaṇi parvaṇi. yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te. !{62}! DHN[T] 84: bhāratādiṣu pratipādita. !{63}! DHN[T] 85: viśeṣeṇa khaned. !{64}! DHN[D] 26.5 liest mit DHN[T] 87: vastreṇācchādya.

lg.l: [8.5] sa vibhuḥ procyate sarvaiḥ vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ /
[8.6] vaikhānasaś ca bhagavān procyate sa pitāmahaḥ* //{67}*" iti [ĀS ]

div.l: [8.7] vyāsanighaṇṭau: "vikhanasañ ca vidhātāraṃ viriñca*{68}* taṃ caturmukham /" iti
[8.8] "nābhijanmāṇḍajaḥ pūrvo vikhanāḥ kamalāsanaḥ //
[8.9] śatānandaś śatadhṛtis satyako haṃsavāhanaḥ* /{69}*
[8.10] padmāsano vikhanasaś cāharmukhaḥ*{70}* itīritaḥ //" iti ca pratipāditam.*{71}*
[8.11-12] evaṃ kāryakāraṇayor abhedāvagamāt*{72}* pramāṇabāhulyāc ca bhagavati nārāyaṇe caturmukhe ca vaikhānasaśabdaprayogaprakāraḥ*{73}* pratipāditaḥ.
[8.13] vaikhānasānām utpattiprakāraḥ*{74}*

lg.l: [8.14-23] vaikhānasānām utpattiḥ viśeṣeṇa śrūyate. yajuṣi āruṇaketuke iṣṭakopadhānakathanānuvāke sṛṣṭiprakaraṇe*{75}* - "āpo vā idam āsan*{76}* salilam eva. sa prajāpatir ekaḥ puṣkaraparṇe samabhavat. tasyāntar manasi kāmas samavartata. idaṃ sṛjeyam iti"*{77}* ity ārabhya "sa tapas taptvā. śarīram adhūnuta. tasya yan māṃsam āsīt. tato 'ruṇāḥ ketavo vātaraśanā ṛṣaya udatiṣṭhan.*{78}* ye 'nakhāḥ te vaikhānasāḥ. ye vālāḥ te vālakhilyāḥ."*{79}* iti. asyārthaḥ. samaṣṭisṛṣṭer anantaraṃ vyaṣṭisṛṣṭau caturmukhaḥ*{80}* devamanuṣyādivividhaviśeṣasṛṣṭyarthaṃ matsyādirūpeṇāvatariṣyamāṇasya*{81}* bhagavato nārāyaṇasya paramavaidikatvena sampratipannaśrīvaikhānasabhagavacchāstramārgeṇa*{82}* samārādhdanarthañ ca svātmatulyāḥ prajās sambhaveyur iti svāntaryāmiṇaṃ paramātmānaṃ dhyonenānukṛtavān*{83}* ayam evārtho brāhmāṇḍe 'py ucyate
[8.24] "om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan saṃsmaran harim /

div.p: !{65}! DHN[D] 26.6 liest mit DHN[T] 87: tathā. !{66}! Beide Verse sind auch als "Gāruḍapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 26.4-7. !{67}! Auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.9-11. !{68}! Lies mit DHN[T] 88: viriñcaṃ. !{69}! DHN[T] 88 ins. (śatānandaś śatadhṛtir vikhanāś ca viriñcanaḥ). !{70}! Lies mit DHN[T] 88: caturmukha. !{71}! DHN[T] 88: itīrita. !{72}! DHN[T] 89: atra kārya kāraṇayor abhede(datve?)nāvagamāt. !{73}! DHN[T] 89: vaikhānasādiśabdaprayogaprakāraḥ. !{74}! DHN[T] 91: vaikhānasānām utpattiḥ (śrutau). !{75}! DHN[T] 91: (śrūyate). !{76}! TĀ: āsant. !{77}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.1: āpo vā idam āsant salilam eva. sa prajāpatir ekaḥ puṣkaraparṇe samabhavat. tasāntar manasi kāmaḥ samavartata. idaṃ sṛjeyam iti. tasmād yat puruṣo manasābhigacchati. tadvācā vadati. tat karmaṇā karoti. tad eṣābhyanūktā. kāmas tadagre samavartatadhi. manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt. S.a. DHN[D] 6.22. !{78}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.2: sato bandhum asati niravindan. hṛdi prītiṣyā kavayo manoṣeti. upainaṃ tad upanamati. yat kāmo bhavati. ya evaṃ veda. sa tapo 'tapyata. sa tapas taptvā. śarīram adhūnuta. tasya yan māṃsam āsīt. tato 'ruṇāḥ ketavo vātaraśanā ṛṣaya udatiṣṭhan. !{79}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.3: ye nakhāḥ. te vaikhānasāḥ. ye bālāḥ. te vālakhilyāḥ. yo rasaḥ. so 'pāṃ. antarataḥ kūrmaṃ bhūtaṃ sarpanraṃ. tam abravīt. mama vai tvaṅmāṃsā. samabhūt. !{80}! DHN[T] 92 om. caturmukhaḥ. !{81}! DHN[T] 92: matsyāvatārādirūpeṇāvatariṣyamāṇasya. !{82}! DHN[T] 92: sampratipannaśrīvaikhānasaśāstramārgeṇa. !{83}! Lies: dhyānenānukṛtavān; DHN[T] 93: dhyānenānu(bhavaṃ)kṛtavān (caturmukhaḥ).

[9.1-5] ity ārabhya*{84}* brahmaṇā brahuśaḥ*{85}* kṛtaṃ tapaścaraṇam uktam. tapaścaraṇakāle sākṣātkṛtabhagavatsvarūpavaibhavānubhavātiśayāt bhagavaddattasṛṣṭiśaktilābhāt tadupajanitaviśeṣavegāc ca pulakitasarvāṅgaḥ śarīram adhūnuta - kampam akarot. "tasya yan māṃsam āsīd"*{86}* māṃsaṃ mānasam iti yāvat. "arthāt prakaraṇāl liṅgād aucityād arthanirṇayaḥ" ity arthādibhiḥ*{87}* samīcīnārthanirṇayavidhānāt "akṣarasāmyān nirbrūyād"*{88}* iti niruktavidhānāñ ca.

lg.l: [9.6-10] tathā ca tasya manaḥ paramātmani saṃsaktam āsīd iti yat, tena hetunā tadanugrahas samajani. tenānugṛhītāt brahmaṇaḥ "ketavo vātaraśanāḥ ṛṣayaḥ udatiṣṭhan"*{89}*. "aruṇāḥ" paramātmani vasantaḥ taditararaviktāḥ "ketavaḥ" ucchritasvabhāvāḥ paramātmapravaṇānām agresarāḥ "vātaraśanā" digvāsasaḥ "ṛṣayaḥ" sarvārthadarśinaḥ sanakādayaḥ "udatiṣṭhan" utkṛṣya samabhavan iti.*{90}*
[9.11] idaṃ viṣṇupurāṇe 'pi: "sanandanādayo ye ca pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭās tu vedhasā /
[9.12] na te lokeṣv asajjanta nirapekṣāḥ prajāvidhau* //{91}* [ViṣṇuP 1.7.9]
[9.13] sarve te yogino jātā*{92}* vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ /
[9.14] teṣv evaṃ nirapekṣeṣu lokasṛṣṭau mahātmanaḥ //" ityādinā pratipāditam.*{93}* [ViṣṇuP 1.7.10]

[9.15-19] sa prajāpatiḥ evaṃvidhān svakāryāsādhakān tān dṛṣṭvā kiñcid viṣādam āpannaḥ punar api svakāraṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyānaprayāyeṇa khananenātoṣat. "ye nakhā" ityādi*{94}*. bhagavadanugrahavikasite prajāpater manasi vaikhānasā nāma ṛṣayas sambhūtāḥ atra "ye nakhā" ity atra ādyantavarṇaviparyayo bhavati. "kaśyapaḥ paśyako bhavatī"tivat "khanā ity etat nakhā" iti viparyastam iti yāvat.*{95}*
[9.21] vyatyayam icchiti*{97}* śāstrakṛd eṣāṃ so 'pi ca siddhyati bāhulakena //"

div.l: [9.22-24] iti, "bahulaṃ chandasī"*{98}*ti cātra praṇāman*{99}*. atra "anakhā" iti cchittvā kecid evam ūcuḥ*{100}*. anakhā ity anena saumyendriyavatvaṃ uktam iti*{101}*.

div.p: !{84}! DHN[T] 93 ins. "śūdrajātiṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ paśūnām aśvam eva" cetyantaṃ (evaṃ?). !{85}! Lies mit DHN[T] 93: bahuśaḥ. !{86}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.3; s. DHN[D] 8.15-19. !{87}! DHN[T] 94: arthanirṇaya" arthanirṇaye vidhānāt. !{88}! Bezug auf Nirukta 2.1: avidyamāne sāmānye apy akṣaravarṇasāmānyān nirbrūyān na tv eva na nirbrūyāt. !{89}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.2; s. DHN[D] 8.15-19. !{90}! DHN[T] 95 statt 9.6-10: tathā tasya manaḥ paramātmani saṃsaktam āsīd iti yat, tena hetunā tadanugrahas samajani. tenānugṛhītā brāhmaṇāḥ (tāt brahmaṇaḥ) aruṇāḥ ketavo vātaraśanā ṛṣaya udatiṣṭhan. yad vā paramātmani vasanta(s sanda)s taditaraviraktāḥ ketava ivocchritasvabhāvāḥ paramātmapravaṇānām agresarāḥ vātaraśanā digvāsasaḥ (sarvārthadarśinaḥ) sanakādaya udatiṣṭhan utkṛṣya samabhavan. !{91}! ViṣṇuP: nirapekṣāḥ prajāsu te. !{92}! ViṣṇuP: sarve te 'bhyāgatajñānā. !{93}! DHN[T] 95: mahātmana" iti. !{94}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.3; s. DHN[D] 8.15-19. !{95}! DHN[T] 96 statt DHN[D] 9.15-19: sa prajāpatir evaṃvi(dhānyannādau)dhas svakāryāsādhakāṃ dṛṣṭvā kiñcid viṣādam āpannaḥ punar api svakāraṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyānaparyāyanāma khananenātoṣayat. "ye nakhā" iti bhagavadanugrahavikasite prajāpater manasi vaikhānasā nāma ṛṣayas sambhūtāḥ ye nakhā ity atrādyantavarṇaviparyayo bhavati. kaśyapaḥ >>>paśyako bhavatī"tivat. !{96}! DHN[T] 96: kālahalacsvarakartṛyaṅāṃ. !{97}! Lies: icchati. !{98}! Aṣṭadhyāyī 2.3.62, 2.4.39, 73 und 76. !{99}! DHN[T] 96: ca statt cātra praṇāman. !{100}! Anm. des Herausgebers: na vidyante khāni indriyāṇi yeṣāṃ te nakhāḥ. na nakhāḥ anakhāḥ nañdvayena saumyendrayavatvaṃ phalitam. !{101}! DHN[T] 97: "anakhā" ityatra cchittvā kecid evam ūcuḥ. anakhā ity anena sarve(saumye)ndriyavatvaṃ uktam syād iti.

div.l: [10.1-3] evañ ca sati "saumyaṃ jitendriyaṃ"*{102}* "suprasannendriyaṃ"*{103}* ityādinā bhagavacchāstreṣv ācāryalakṣaṇasya*{104}* pratipāditatvāt "vaikhānasa vikhanasācarya"*{105}* iti. viṣṇor*{106}* ācāryatvena śāntyparvaṇy abhihitatvāt.
[10.4] "vikhanā iti viṣṇus tajjā vaikhānasāḥ smṛtāḥ* /{107}* [KrA 36.28cd]
[10.5] viṣṇor eva samutpannā bhṛgvādyā munayas tathā //"
[10.6-7] iti vacanāt, "guros sānavṛttir*{108}* vaikhānasa"*{109}* iti bodhāyanasūtre uktatvāc ca bhāgavatādiṣu*{110}* pratipāditam "ācāryapuṃstvam eteṣāṃ vaikhānasānām*{111}* eve"ty avagamyate.

lg.l: [10.8-9] yadvā "anaghā" iti pāṭhaḥ. anena*{112}* triśuklatvaṃ sūcyate. janma vidyā karma ceti. advārakatvena bhagavataḥ caturmukhāc coptattiśravaṇāt*{113}*,
[10.10] "tatkarma yan na bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktaye /
[10.12-13] ity uktarītyā advārakabhagavatsvarūpajñānatadārādhanavidhipratipādakaśāstraniṣṭhatvena ca eṣāṃ triśuklatvam.*{114}* śuklavatām evādhikyaṃ āraṇyaparvaṇi prathamādhyāye pratipāditam. yathā:
[10.14] "yeṣāṃ trīṇy avadātāni yonirvidyā ca karma ca /
[10.15] te sevyās tais samāsyā hi śāstrebhyo 'pi garīyasī* //{115}*" ti [MBh 3.1.25]
[10.19] smaraṇānantarād eva prādur āsīt puraḥ prabhoḥ /
[10.21] taṃ prāha*{117}* bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇataṃ purataḥ sthitam /
[10.22] śrībhagavān uvāca: brahman tvayā jagat sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ sacarācaram // [ĀS 4.8]

div.l: [10.23] loke vihartum icchāmi yad ahaṃ*{118}* padmasambhava /
[10.24] tatas tvatsṛṣṭajagatām avicchinnapravṛttaye /

div.note: !{102}! Bezug auf KrA 1.22-23 (ācāryalakṣaṇam): evam manasi sañjāte yajamāno mudānvitaḥ / vaikhānasena sūtreṇa niṣekādikriyānvitam // vipraṃ svādhyāyasaṃyuktaṃ vedatattvārthadarśinam / saumyaṃ jitendriyam śuddhaṃ viṣṇvarcanaparāyaṇam //.
!{103}! Bezug auf SA 27.13: suprasannendriyaṃ dāntaṃ jñāninaṃ śāntamānasam / pāraṃparyakramāyātavaiṣṇavaṃ bhaktisaṃyutaṃ.
!{107}! KrA: vikhanā iti vai viṣṇuḥ tajjā vaikhānasāḥ smṛtāḥ.
!{109}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 2.9.17: athāsmā atithir bhavati guros samānavṛttir vaikhānaso vā gṛhastho vānaprasthaḥ parivrājako gataśrīs snātako rājā vā dharmayuktaḥ; s.a. DHN[D] 84.1-10.
!{112}! DHN[T] 100: yadvā "anaghā" iti (cet). anaghā ity anena.
!{115}! MBh: tān sevettaiḥ samāsyā hi; DHN[D] ist jedoch v.l.
!{116}! ĀS: dhātāraṃ sargakaraṇa-; DHN[T] 102: dhātāraṃ smaraṇaṃ cakrī caturaś caturānanam(tmavat).

div.l: [11.1] dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārthāya vedaśāstrārthasiddhaye* //{119}* [ĀS 4.9]

lg.l: [11.3] te paravyūhavibhavān ātmānāñ ca na menire* //{120}* [ĀS 4.10]

div.l: [11.4] saulabhyāya tu bhaktānāṃ sarvalokānukampayā* //{121}* [ĀS 4.11cd]
[11.7] madarcāyai sṛja brahman sṛṣṭyādau munisattamaṃ* /{123}* [ĀS 4.13ab]

lg.l: [11.8] ity ājñaptas tadā brahmā muhūrtaṃ tat sisṛkṣayā /

div.l: [11.10] ūcuḥ na śaknuyām evaṃ sraṣṭum icchan tathāvidham* /{125}*
[11.11] tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devadevo haris svayam // [Ā.S ]

lg.l: [11.15] tathā cintayatas tasya manaso dvau babhūvatuḥ* //{128}* [ĀS 4.18]

div.l: [11.16] saṅkalpadharmau sannamya prāñjaliṃ purataḥ sthitam* /{129}* [ĀS 4.19ab?]
[11.19] śuddhasattvasamutpanno nirmito 'yaṃ tavāgrataḥ* //{131}* [ĀS 4.35cd]
[11.20] muniśreṣṭho mahātejā matkāryakaraṇakṣamaḥ* /{132}* [ĀS 4.36ab?]
[11.21] matkāryasādhakān eva tvaṃ vai sraṣṭum athārhasi //
[11.22] hṛṣīkeśasya tadvākyaṃ bhyādhāya kṛtañjaliḥ* /{133}*
[11.23] caturmukhaś cāpi tathā sanakādimunīśvarān* /{134}*
[11.24] dhyāyan mukhaiś caturbhis tu kramād asṛjad abjabhūḥ* //{135}*

div.p: !{119}! ĀS: loke vihartum icchā me vartate padmasambhava / tatas svasṛṣṭir jagatām aviccinnā pravartate / dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya vedaśāstrārthasiddhaye//. Vgl. ĀS 15.9/10ab: loke vihartum icchāme vartate padmasambhava / tatas tvatsṛṣṭajagatām avicchinnaprasṛttaye // sādhusaṃrakṣaṇārthaya vedaśāstrarthasiddhaye /. !{120}! ĀS: ālasā hy alpasatvāś ca manuṣyās svalpabuddhayaḥ / te paravyūhavibhavān antaryāmaṇam eva vā //; vgl. ĀS 15.11cd/12ab: alasā alpasattvāś ca bhaviṣyanti narāḥ kramāt // na vetsyanti prakārāṇi parāvyūhādikāni me/. !{121}! ĀS: sulabhaṃ mama bhaktānāṃ sarvalokānukampaye; ĀS 4.11ab (sajānanti hi mūḍhās tu teṣāṃ dhyānānusiddhaye/) fehlt in DHN[D]. !{122}! ĀS: hriyā. !{123}! ĀS 4.13cd (tatas svasṛṣṭir jagatām avicchinna pravartate) fehlt in DHN[D]. !{124}! ĀS: ity ādiṣṭas tathā brahmā muhūrtaṃ tat sisṛkṣayā / cintayāmāsa taṃ sraṣṭuṃ kṣaṇam ekaṃ mahāmuniṃ. !{125}! DHN[T] 103: tathā na śaknuyām eva sraṣṭum icchan tathāvidhaḥ. !{126}! ĀS: cintanān antarā devasya nirmalatarātmani / viśeṣakhananaṃ tatra kṛtavān kṛtināṃ varaḥ //; vgl. ĀS 15.18cd/19ab: cintayatvāsṛjad viṣṇus svārādhanavaraṃ muniṃ // vedāntatattvamīmāṃsākhananaṃ kṛtvān prabhuḥ /; vgl. das Zitat aus ĀS in DHN[D] 4.8 vedāntatattvamīmāṃsākhananaṃ kṛtavāt hariḥ. DHN[D] läßt nun ĀS 4.16-17 aus (ĀS 4.16: viśeṣakhananāt tasmāt tattvārthaparicintanāt / ṛṣiśreṣṭho mahān ko 'pi vedaśāstrārthapāragaḥ // ĀS 4.17: prādurāsīn mahātejās sākṣād viṣṇur ivāparaḥ / viśeṣakhananāj jātaṃ padmabhūr munisattamaṃ). !{127}! ĀS: tadvadasvarthayāgirā; DHN[T] 103: cakrī tatvadanvarthayogataḥ (tadpadanyārthayogataḥ). !{128}! ĀS: mānane dve babhūvatuḥ; DHN[T] 103: manasi dvau babhūvatuḥ. !{129}! ĀS: saṅkalpadharmau sarveṣām api pūrvakṛtodayau; DHN[T] 103: saṅkalpadharmau sa kalpya prāñjaliṃ purataḥ sthitam. !{130}! Es fehlt ĀS 4.19cd -4.35ab; ĀS 4.20-49 bzw. 76 wird jedoch weiter unten ab DHN[D] 12.1 zitiert. !{131}! ĀS: tvadājñayā; ähnlich auch zitiert in DHN[D] 13.8. !{132}! ĀS: ṛṣiśreṣṭho mahātejās tvatkarmakaraṇakṣamaḥ; so auch zitiert in DHN[D] 13.9. !{133}! Vgl. ĀS 15.32ef: hṛṣīkeśasya tadvākyaṃ mūrdhnyāthāyakṛtāñjaliḥ. !{134}! Vgl. ĀS 15.33ab: caturmukhaś cāpi tathā dhyātvā sṛṣṭimukhe hariṃ. !{135}! DHN[T] 104: dhyāyaṃś caturmukhair dhīmān.

lg.l: [12.1] sanatkumārañ ca tathā sanakañ ca sanātanam /

div.l: [12.5] svakāryasādhakān brahmā sṛṣṭavān punar eva hi* /{139}*
[12.6] prāṇāc ca cakṣuṣas tadvad abhimānāc ca karmaṇaḥ* //{140}* [ĀS 4.22]

lg.l: [12.7] hṛdayāc chirasaḥ*{141}* śrotrād udānād vyānatas tataḥ /
[12.8] samānāc ca tathāpānād ṛṣiśreṣṭhān imān daśa* //{142}* [ĀS 4.23]
[12.9] dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ*{143}* nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgum eva ca /
[12.10] tathāṅgirasam atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ tathā* //{144}* [ĀS 4.24]
[12.11] vasiṣṭhaṃ ca kratuṃ caiva kramād asṛjad abjabhūḥ /
[12.12] nava brahmāṇa evaite vinā syur nīlalohitaṃ* //{145}* [ĀS 4.25]
[12.17] sarveṣām agrajaṃ śreṣṭham ātmaputraṃ muniṃ tathā /
[12.18] taṃ hareḥ purataḥ kṛtvā proktavān kamalāsanaḥ // [ĀS 4.28]
[12.21] jātāḥ cintayato mattas tvat sṛṣṭau munayas tv ime /
[12.22] etair api kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad etac carācaraṃ // [ĀS 4.30]
[12.24] vaiṣṇaveṣv agrajaś śreṣṭho munīnāṃ prathamo muniḥ // [Ā.S 4.31]

div.p: !{136}! ĀS: sanatkumāraś ca tathā sanakaś ca sanātanaḥ / sanandana iti khyātā brahmavidyāviśāradāḥ; so liest auch DHN[T] 104. !{137}! ĀS: sanmuniśreṣṭhā. !{138}! ĀS: viraktacittās te jagmuḥ; so liest auch DHN[T] 104. !{139}! ĀS: punar va hi cāsṛjat. !{140}! Der zweite Halbvers ist auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.14; DHN[T] 104: marma(karma)ṇi; ĀS: ca marmaṇaḥ. !{141}! ĀS: chirasa. !{142}! Auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.15-16; DHN[T] 104: samānāc ca tathā prāṇād. !{143}! ĀS: marīciṃ ca. !{144}! Auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.17-18. !{145}! Auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.19-20; die zweite Vershälfte ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 34.2 zitiert; ĀS: vinānye nīlalohitaṃ. !{146}! ĀS: śrutismṛtinivedanāt; so auch DHN[T] 105. !{147}! ĀS: bhagavaṃs tvanniyogena; so auch DHN[T] 105.

lg.l: [13.4] etad uktaprakāreṇa sarve vai mama sūnavaḥ // [ĀS 4.33]

div.l: [13.7] bhavān avataratv atra mama sṛṣṭau janārdana* /{151}*
[13.8] śuddhasattvasamutpanno nirmito 'yaṃ tvayā vibho* //{152}* [ĀS 4.35]

lg.l: [13.10] tathāsau khananād viṣṇoḥ dhyāyād antaś ca garbhataḥ* //{153}* [ĀS 4.36]
[13.12] ity ukto bhagavān prāha muniśreṣṭhaṃ taponidhiṃ // [Ā.S 4.37]
[13.13] śrībhagavān uvāca: devabrahma ṛṣīṇān tu madīyārādhanaṃ prati /
[13.14] mayā sañcodito yasmāt tvam eva munisattama* //{155}* [ĀS 4.38]
[13.16] ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vā nityanaimittikādi yat // [Ā.S 4.39]

div.l: [13.17] tat sarvaṃ matprasādena madīyārādhanaṃ kuru* /{156}*
[13.18] athāha sa ṛṣis tasmai praṇamya jagadātmane // [ĀS 4.40]

lg.l: [13.20] nātaḥ parataraṃ kāryaṃ kim apy anyad divaukasām* //{157}* [ĀS 4.41]

div.p: !{148}! Lies mit DHN[T] 106 und ĀS: upadiṣṭavān. !{149}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 106: ācaranti yathānyāyyaṃ. !{150}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 106: avicchinnā mayā hare. !{151}! ĀS: avatīrṇo bhana bhavān atra sṛṣṭau janārdana; DHN[T] 106: bhava statt bhana. !{152}! ĀS: tvadājñayā; so liest auch DHN[T] 106; ĀS 4.35cd ist ähnlich in DHN[D] 11.19 zitiert. !{153}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 106: tathāsau vikhanā viṣṇor dhyānād antaś ca garbhataḥ. !{154}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 106: tvad dhyānād yas samutpanno. !{155}! ĀS: mayā samprārthito yasmāt tvam eva munisattama; DHN[T] 107: mayā samprārthito yasmāt tvam eva munisattamaḥ. !{156}! Vgl. ĀS 16.19: ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vā gṛhe devālaye 'pi vā / nityanaimittike caiva marīyārādhanaṃ kuru. !{157}! Vgl. ĀS 16.21: bhavatānugṛhīto 'smi dhanyo 'smi puruṣottama / nātaḥ parataraṃ kāryaṃ asmākaṃ ca divaukasāṃ. !{158}! DHN[T] 107: śrīyate.

div.l: [14.1] bhavadārādhanaṃ viṣṇo kathaṃ kāraṃ karomy ahaṃ /
[14.2] tvatkarma kriyate cet tu karmalopo bhaven mama* /{159}*
[14.3] ity ukto bhagavān āha muninā tattvavedinā // [ĀS 4.44]
[14.4] śrībhagavān uvāca: vikhanas tvaṃ muniśreṣṭha madārādhanakarmaṇi* //{160}* [ĀS 4.45]

lg.l: [14.6] tava karmāṇy anūnāni saṃtu nityaṃ madājñayā // [ĀS 4.46]

div.l: [14.7] tvadvaṃśajānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāle vai kṛtakarmaṇām* /{162}*
[14.8] niṣekādiśmaśānāntāḥ kāryāḥ mantrasamanvitāḥ* //{163}* [ĀS 4.47]

lg.l: [14.10] yajñāś ca viṃśatir dvau ca dharmaṃ vaiṣṇavam uttamaṃ // [Ā.S 4.48]
[14.11] vede vaikhānase sūtre yo dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
[14.12] sarvais sa dharmo 'nuṣṭheyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā* //{164}* [ĀS 4.49]

div.l: [14.13] tvadājñaiva bhṛgvādyā nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ* //{165}* [ĀS 4.67cd]

lg.l: [14.15] taddharmaniratā ye tu te vai bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ // [Ā.S 4.68]

div.l: [14.16] matkarmakāriṇāṃ teṣāṃ karmalopo na vidyate* /{166}*
[14.17] tisraḥ koṭyo munīnām tu karma kurvanti me sadā* //{167}* [ĀS 4.69]

lg.l: [14.18] jñātvā yajūṃṣi sāṅgāni manmatās sarva eva te /

div.l: [14.24] vaikhānasena sūtreṇa niṣekādikriyānvitāḥ /

div.note: !{159}! ĀS: tvatkarma kriyate ced vā; so auch DHN[T] 108; vgl. ĀS 16.24: bhavad ārādhanaṃ viṣṇo kathaṃ bhūmyāṃ karomy ahaṃ / tvat karma kriyate yat tat karmalopo bhaved dhruvaṃ.
!{160}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 108: vikhanas tvaṃ sammaniśreṣṭha.

!{164}! Dieser Vers ist als "Bhṛgu" zitiert in DHN[D] 83.21-22, ferner als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 35.2-3. ĀS 4.50-4.67ab ist nicht in DHN[D] zitiert, wohl aber in DHN[T] 108-111: [108: ĀS 4.50:] kṛtamallāñchanānāṃ ca garbhavaiṣṇavajanmanāṃ / matputrāṇāṃ na cihnāni dāsāś cihnasamanvitāḥ // [Ā.S 4.51:] vaikhānasā mama sutā garbhavaiṣṇavajātakāḥ / teṣāṃ pṛthañ na cihnāni cakrādīnāṃ gurur na hi // [109: ĀS 4.52:] vaikhānasānāṃ sarveṣāṃ madarcāhetujanmanāṃ / śrautasmārtakriyārhāṇāṃ matprasādaikajīvināṃ // [Ā.S 4.53:] mama vākyabale naiva te vai cakrāṅkitāmatāḥ / sālagrāmeṣu sarveṣu garbhe cakrasya dhāraṇaṃ / vaikhānasānāṃ sarveṣāṃ garbhe cakrasya dhāraṇaṃ // [Ā.S 4.54:] uttamo garbhacakraś ca madhyamo nyāsacakrakaḥ / adhamo bāhyacakraś ca cakrahīno dhamādhamaḥ // [Ā.S 4.55:] garbhe māsy aṣṭame viṣṇubaliṃ kuryād yathāvidhiḥ / tenāgninaiva taptena cakreṇaivāṅkayed dhaviḥ // [Ā.S 4.56:] tad dhaviḥ prāśayet patnīṃ tanmantreṇaiva cātvaraḥ / vaikhānasena sūtreṇa yasyo 'yaṃ garbhavaiṣṇavaḥ // [Ā.S 4.57:] jāte putre pitā viṣṇubaliṃ kuryād yathāvidhi / tenāgnitaptacakrāṅkahaviṣā prāśayec chiśuṃ // [110: ĀS 4.58:] yadā kadā vāpi bhavet sarveṣām api sūtraṇāṃ // [Ā.S 4.59:] svaśākhāṃ samparityajya paraśākhānusārataḥ / śākhāraṇḍas sa vijñeyas sarvakarmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // [Ā.S 4.60:] ajñānād arthalobhād vā mohād vā parapīḍanāt / taptamudrā bhaved yasya prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate // [Ā.S 4.61:] śrīvaikhānasasūtrasthas taptamudro bhaved yadi / ālayaṃ na viśet paścāt pūjanaṃ naiva kārayet // [Ā.S 4.62:] sarveṣāṃ viṣṇubhaktānāṃ taptamudrāvidhikramaṃ / vaikhānasena kartavyaṃ sarveṣām anyasūtriṇāṃ // [Ā.S 4.63:] śrīvaikhānasahastena taptacakrāṅkito yadi / trisaptakulam uddhṛtya naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet // [Ā.S 4.64:] vaikhānasasya hastena śaṅkhacakrāṅkito yadi / pāpair eva viśuddhātmā kalpakoṭiśatodbhavaiḥ // [Ā.S 4.65:] vaikhānasakareṇaiva śaṅkhacakrāṅkito yadi / [111:] mocayitvā tu pāpebhyaś caturvargaṃ dadāmy ahaṃ // [Ā.S 4.66:] svādhyāyābhyasane nityaṃ yatphalaṃ labhate naraḥ / tatphalaṃ samavāpnoti vaikhānasakareṇa ca // [Ā.S 4.67ab:] aṅkitaś śaṅkhacakrābhyām atra vaikhānasetaraḥ /.
!{167}! ĀS mit DHN[T] 111: tisraḥ koṭya ṛṣiśreṣṭhāḥ.

div.l: [15.1] bhavanti bhāvitātmāno matkarmakaraṇakṣamāḥ // [Ā.S 4.73]

lg.l: [15.3] sarvadhā "ye nakhās te vaikhānasā" iti vedataḥ* //{170}* [ĀS 4.74]
[15.5] tataḥ prāha muniśreṣṭhas tam evaṃ vādinaṃ harim* //{171}* [ĀS 4.75]
[15.6] śrīvikhanāḥ: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena karma sāṅgaṃ yathoditaṃ /
[15.7] sarveṣāṃ matkulīnānāṃ bhavaty eva na saṃśayaḥ // [Ā.S 4.76]

div.p: [15.8-9] ato 'tra śrutyuktamārgeṇa vaikhānasānāṃ sṛṣṭyādikaṃ, advārakabhagavadyajanenaiteṣāṃ nityakarmānuṣṭhānapūrṇatvaṃ ca pratipāditam*{172}*.

lg.l: [15.10-11] atha pañcamavedatvena prasiddhe mahābhārate ānuśāsanikaparvaṇi 85tame adhyāye bhṛgvādimaharṣīṇāṃ vaikhānasānāñ cotpattiḥ nirūpitā*{173}*. yathā:
[15.12] vasiṣṭha: "api cedaṃ purā rāma śrutaṃ me brahmadarśanam /
[15.14] devasya mahatas tāta vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum /
[15.15] aiśvarye vāruṇe rāma rudrasyeśasya vai prabhoḥ*{174}* // [MBh 13.85.2]
[15.17] yajñāṅgāni ca sarvāṇi vaṣaṭkāraś ca mūrtimān // [MBh 13.85.3]
[15.18] mūrtimanti ca sāmāni yajūṃṣi ca sahasraśaḥ /
[15.22] tathā vedās sopaniṣado vidyās*{176}* sāvitry athāpi ca /
[15.23] bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dadhāra śirasā*{177}* śivaḥ /

div.l: [15.25] yajñañ ca śobhayāmāsa bahurūpaṃ pinākadhṛt // [MBh 13.395.1]

div.note: !{173}! DHN[T] 112: atha pañcamavedatvena prasiddhe bhārate cānuśāsanike pañcāṣītatamādhyāye vaikhānasādīnām utpattiś ca nirūpitā.
!{175}! MBh: lakṣaṇāni svarāḥ stobhā niruktaṃ svarabhaktayaḥ / oṅkāraś cāvasan netre nigrahapragrahau tathā; DHN[T] 113: (oṅkāraś cāvasannetre).
!{176}! MBh: tathā vedāś ca sopaniṣado vidyā; DHN[T] 113: tathā vedāś ca sopaniṣado vidyās.
!{178}! MBh: juhvac cātmany athātmānaṃ tadā prabho.

lg.l: [16.1] dyair nabhaḥ pṛthivī*{179}* khañ ca tathā caivaiṣa bhūpatiḥ /

div.l: [16.3] eṣa brahmā śivo rudro varuṇo 'gniḥ prajāpatiḥ / [MBh 13.3954]
[16.4] kīrtyate bhagavān devas sarvabhūtapatiś śivaḥ // [MB.h 13.3955]
[16.5] tasya yajñaḥ paśupates tapaḥ kratava eva ca / [MBh 13.3956]
[16.6] dīkṣā dīptavratā devī diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ* //{181}* [MBh 13.3957]

lg.l: [16.7] devapatnyaś ca kanyāś ca devānāṃ caiva mātaraḥ /

div.l: [16.9] yajñaṃ paśupateḥ prītā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
[16.10] svayaṃbhuvas tu tā dṛṣṭvā retaḥ samapatad bhuvi / [MBh 13.85.8]

lg.l: [16.11] tasya śukrasya niṣṣyandāt*{182}* pāṃsūn saṃgṛhya bhūmitaḥ /
[16.12] prāsyat pūṣā karābhyāṃ vai tasminn eva hutāśane // [MBh 13.85.9]
[16.14] brahmaṇo juhvatas tatra prādurbhāvo babhūva ha // [MB.h 13.85.10]
[16.15] skannamātraṃ ca tac chukraṃ sruveṇa pratigṛhya saḥ /
[16.17] tatas tu janayāmāsa*{184}* bhūtagrāmaṃ sa vīryavān /
[16.18] tatas tu tejasas*{185}* tasmāj jajñe lokeṣu taijasam // [MB.h 13.85.12]
[16.19] tamasas tāmasā bhāvā vyāpi sattvaṃ tathobhayam /
[16.20] sa guṇas tejaso nityas tasya cākāśam*{186}* eva ca // [MB.h 13.85.13]
[16.21] sarvabhūteṣu ca*{187}* tathā sattvaṃ tejas tv athottamam*{188}* /
[16.22] śukre hute 'gnau tasmiṃs tu prādurāsaṃs trayaḥ prabho // [MB.h 13.85.14]
[16.23] puruṣā vapuṣā yuktā tais taiḥ*{189}* prasavajair*{190}* guṇaiḥ /

div.note: !{179}! DHN[T] 114: dyaur nabhaḥ pṛthivīṃ; MBh: dyaur.
!{181}! bis ist in MBh als "After 6, N (except D6.7; D3 missing) ins.:" in der Fußnote angeführt.
!{188}! MBh: tathā tamaḥ; DHN[T] 115: tathottamam (sa sattvas tejasas tamaḥ).
!{191}! MBh: bhṛg ity eva bhṛguḥ pūrvam aṅgārebhyo 'ṅgirābhavat.

div.l: [17.1] (bhṛg ity eva bhṛguḥ pūrvam aṅgārebhyo 'ṅgirābhavat // [MB.h 13.85.15cd]

lg.l: [17.3] saha jvālābhir utpanno bhṛgus tasmād bhṛguḥ smṛtaḥ // [MB.h 13.85.16]
[17.4] marīcibhyo marīcis tu mārīcaḥ kaśyapo hy abhūt /
[17.6] atraivātreti ca vibho jātam atriṃ vadanty api // [MBh 13.85.17]

div.l: [17.7] tathāgnes tasya bhasmabhyo brahmarṣigaṇasaṃmatāḥ* /{193}*
[17.8] vaikhānasāḥ samutpannās tapaḥśrutaguṇepsavaḥ* /{194}*
[17.9] aśruto 'sya samutpannāv aśvinau lokasaṃmatau* //{195}* [MBh 13.85.18]

lg.l: [17.10] śeṣāḥ prajānāṃ patayaḥ srotobhyas tasya jajñire /
[17.12] etasmāt kāraṇād āhur agniḥ sarvāś caab hier telugu devatāḥ*{197}* /
[17.14] yāni dārūṇi te māsā niryāsāḥ pakṣasaṃjñitāḥ /
[17.15] ahorātrā muhūrtās tu pittaṃ jyotiś ca vāruṇam // [MBh 13.85.21]
[17.16] raudraṃ lohitam ity āhur lohitāt kanakaṃ smṛtam /
[17.17] tan maitram iti vijñeyaṃ dhūmāc ca vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ // [MB.h 13.85.22]
[17.18] arciṣo yāś ca te rudrās tathādityā mahāprabhāḥ /
[17.19] uddiṣṭās te tathāṅgārā ye dhiṣṇyeṣu divi sthitāḥ // [MB.h 13.85.23]
[17.20] ādikartā*{198}* ca lokasya tat paraṃ brahma tad dhruvam /
[17.21] sarvakāmadam ity āhus tadrahasyam uvāca ca* //{199}* [MBh 13.85.24]
[17.23] [varuṇa] mama satram idaṃ divyam ahaṃ gṛhapatis tv iha // [MBh 13.85.25]

div.l: [17.24] trīṇi pūrvāṇy apatyāni mama tāni na saṃśayaḥ /

div.p: !{192}! DHN[T] 116: kuśoccayāt. !{193}! MBh: tathā bhasmavyapohebhyo brahmarṣigaṇasaṃmitāḥ; DHN[T] 166; bhasma vyapohebhyo (tathāgnes tasya bhasnabhyo) brahmarṣigaṇasaṃnitāḥ. !{194}! Diese beiden Vershälften sind als "Mahābhārata" auch in DHN[D] 21.15-16 zitiert. !{195}! MBh: rūpasaṃmatau. !{196}! MBh: ṛṣayo lomakūpebhyaḥ svedāc chando malātmakam. !{197}! MBh: agniṃ sarvās tu devatāḥ; DHN[T] 116: sarvāś ca(bhi). !{198}! MBh: ādināthaś. !{199}! MBh: tatra havyam udāvahat. !{200}! MBh: paramātmakaḥ.

div.l: [18.1] iti jānīta khagamā mama yajñaphalaṃ hi tat // [MB.h 13.85.26]

lg.l: [18.3] mamaiva tāny apatyāni varuṇo hy avaśātmakaḥ // [MB.h 13.85.27]
[18.5] mamaiva tāny apatyāni mama śukraṃ hutaṃ hi tat // [MB.h 13.85.28]
[18.6] īśvara: ahaṃ kartā hi satrasya hotā śukrasya caiva hi*{201}* /
[18.7] yasya bījaṃ phalaṃ tasya śukraṃ cet kāraṇaṃ matam // [MB.h 13.85.29]
[18.10] vayaṃ ca bhagavan sarve jagat etac carācaram*{203}* /
[18.11] tavaiva prasavaṃ sarvaṃ*{204}* tasmād agnir vibhāvasuḥ /
[18.12] varuṇaś ceśvaro devo labhatāṃ kāmam īpsitam // [MB.h 13.85.31]
[18.13] nisargād varuṇaś cāpi brahmaṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
[18.14] jagrāha vai bhṛguṃ pūrvam apatyaṃ sūryavarcasam // [MBh 13.85.32]
[18.16] pitāmahas tv apatyaṃ vai kaviṃ jagrāha dharmataḥ*{206}* // [MB.h 13.85.33]

div.l: [18.17] tadā sa vāruṇiḥ*{207}* khyāto bhṛguḥ prasavakarmakṛt /
[18.18] āgneyas tv aṅgirāḥ śrīmān kavir brāhyo mahāyāśāḥ* /{208}*
[18.19] bhārgavāṅgirasau loke lokasaṃtānalakṣaṇau // [MBh 13.85.34]

lg.l: [18.20] ete hi prasavās*{209}* sarve prajānāṃ patayas trayaḥ /
[18.21] sarvaṃ saṃtānam eteṣām idam ity avadhāraya* //{210}* [MBh 13.85.35]

div.l: [18.22] ityādinā vaikhānasānām utpattyādikaṃ viśeṣeṇa pratipāditam.

lg.l: [18.24] yajñe devasya vitate mahato varuṇasya ha /

div.p: !{201}! MBh: ahaṃ vaktā ca mantrasya hotā śukrasya caiva ha. !{202}! MBh: abhivandya ca. !{203}! MBh: jagac ca sacarācaram. !{204}! MBh: prasavāḥ sarve. !{205}! MBh: 'bhyakalpayat. !{206}! MBh: tattvavit. !{207}! MBh: vāruṇaḥ. !{208}! MBh: brāhmo mahāyaśāḥ. !{209}! MBh: vipravarāḥ. !{210}! MBh: upadhāraya.

lg.l: [19.1] tat pratīkṣya sa parṇena saṃjuhāva vibhāv asau /
[19.4] khananaṃ tattvamīmāṃsety bis hier teluguāhuḥ kecana sūrayaḥ //

div.l: [19.7-10] "ye vālāḥ te vālakhilyāḥ" ity atra bakārasthāne vakāra*{211}*. jñānātiśayavaibhavāt kāmādidoṣarāhityena ca bālā ucyante. śrūyate hi*{212}*: "tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset*{213}* bālyañ ca pāṇdityañ ca nirvidyātha muniḥ" iti.

[19.11-13] atra kecid evam ūcuḥ: brahmaṇaḥ vidhūtāc charīrāt yanmāṃsaṃ vikīrṇam abhavat tato ketavo vātaraśanā ṛṣaya udatiṣṭhann iti. tad asat. evam arthasvīkāre sṛṣṭikāraṇabhūtasya brahmaśarīrasya śaithilyam uktaṃ syād iti.

[19.14-20] kiñ ca "tasyāntarmanasi kāmas samavartata" ityādinā "kāmas tadagre samavartatādhi" ity antena sopapattikaṃ vartamānaṃ saṅkalparūpaṃ mananavyāpāram uktvā "manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīd" ity atra tatra vidyamānasya vyāpārasya prajāpateḥ sṛṣṭikāraṇatvaṃ retaś śabdebis hier telugunoktvā "sato bandhum asati niravindann" ity ārabhya "ya evaṃ veda" ity antena brahmaṇas tatkālavidyamānamānasaśaktimāab hier telugutreṇa vyaṣṭisṛṣṭer aniṣpannatvam uktvā manaso vyaṣṭikāraṇalābhāya "sa tapo 'tapyata" iti bhagavadupāsanam akarod" ity uktam. ayam evārthaḥ "oṃ ity ekākṣaraṃ brahme"tyādinā brahmāṇḍe 'py uktam.*{214}*

lg.l: [19.23] madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ //" [MBh 6.32.6]

div.l: [19.24] bhṛgvādaya eva vaikhānasānāṃ vaṃśakartāraḥ iti bhārate 'py uktam.

div.p: !{211}! DHN[T] 120: bakārasya sthāne vakāraḥ. !{212}! DHN[T] 120: bālāḥ śrūyate. !{213}! DHN[T] 120: tiṣṭhāsīt. !{214}! BrahmāṇḍaP

div.l: [20.1] yathā śāntiparvaṇi:
[20.2] "bhṛgvaṅgiromarīcyatri pulastyapulahāḥ kratuḥ*{215}* / [MBh 13, App. 7.49]
[20.3] tathā vasiṣṭho dakṣaś ca nava svāyambhuvā dvijāḥ* //{216}*
[20.6-8] tasmād bhagavatā nārāyaṇena brahmaṇā ca sṛṣṭānāṃ bhṛgvādīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ tadvaṃśajānāṃ ca niṣekādikriyāvatām advārakabhagavadyajanādhikāravatām eva loke vaikhānasā iti prasiddhiḥ.
div.p: [caturmukhasṛṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vaikhānasatvaṃ samānam ity ākṣepasya parihāraḥ]

lg.l: [20.9] nanu brahmaṇā sṛṣṭānāṃ sarveṣām api manuṣyānāṃ vaikhānasatvaṃ samānam.

[20.10-11] katham eteṣv eva vyavahriyate iti cet satyam. nāmarūbis hier telugupakṛtyavibhāgādikaṃ vedaśabdebhya eva brahmaṇā kṛtam iti śrūyate. "vedena nāmarūpe vyākarot satāsatī*{217}* prajāpatir" iti.
[20.12] tathā bhārate: "anādinidhanā hy eṣā vāgudsṛṣṭā svayambhuvā* //{218}* [MBh 12.224.55cd]

div.l: [20.13] ādau vedamayī divyā yatas sarvāḥ prasūtayaḥ* //{219}*" iti [MBh 12.671.1]

lg.l: [20.14] śrīviṣṇupurāṇe: "nāma rupañ ca bhūtānāṃ kṛtyānāñ ca praab hier telugupañcanam /
[20.15] vedaśabdebhya evādau devādīnāṃ cakāra saḥ //" iti. [ViṣṇuP 1.5.63]
[20.16] manu: "sarveṣāñ ca sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /
[20.17] vedaśabdebhya evādau pṛthak saṃsthāś ca nirmame //" [ManuDhŚ 1.21]

div.l: [20.18-19] iti ca nāmarūpavibhāgasya śrutismṛtiṣu pratipāditatvāt brahmaṇā tādṛśaśrutismṛtyanusāreṇa sṛṣṭānām eva vaikhānasatvavyavahāraḥ. Nānyeṣām.

lg.l: [20.20-23] kiñca ekasmin paramapuruṣe mukhādiṣu jātānāṃ yathā brāhmaṇādivyavahāraḥ yathā viśvāmitra bhāradvājādi gotreṣūtpannānām ekasūtraniṣṭhatvaṃ vinā anekasūtrānusāritvaṃ, yathā ca kumudakahlārādiṣu "paṅke jāyata" iti vyutpattyā paṅkajatve samāno 'pi yogarūḍhibhyāṃ paṅkajatvaṃ tāmarasa eva vartate tathaiva vaikhānasatvam api. tathoktam:

div.p: !{215}! MBh: pitāmahasya rājendra pulastyapulahādayaḥ. !{216}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 33.24-34.1 zitiert. !{217}! DHN[T] 131: (satāsatī). !{218}! MBh: anādinidhanā nityā vāgutsṛṣṭā svayambhuvā. !{219}! MBh: yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ; diese Vershälfte wird in einigen Manuskripten eingefügt.

div.l: [21.2-6] nanu: "brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca bhikṣur vaikhānasas tathā"*{220}* iti tatra tatra tṛtīyāśramaniṣṭhānām eva vaikhānasatvāvagamāt ta eva vaikhānasaśabdavācyāḥ kiṃ na syur iti cet na. śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu uktaprakāreṇa brahmaṇā sṛṣṭānām eva vaikhānasatvāvagamāt teṣām eva tatra tatrotkṛṣṭatvapratipādanāc ca.*{221}*
[21.7-8] tathā hi: śrutāv eva vaikhānasānām utpattiḥ śrūyate. "ye nakhāḥ te vaikhānasāḥ"*{222}* iti. chandogyabrāhmaṇe: "vaikhānasā vā ṛṣaya indrasya priyā āsan*{223}*"

[21.9-11] "pauruhan mahaṃ bhavati. puruhānnādo vā etena vaikhānaso 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokam apaśyat" iti. atra indraśabdena paramātmā nārāyaṇa ucyate. "sa brahmā sa śivassendrasso 'kṣaraḥ paramas svarāṭ" ityādi śrutibhyaḥ.*{224}*
[21.12] "āśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvas tulasī vikhanās tathā* /{225}*
[21.13] catvāro matpriyā rājaṃs teṣāṃ vaikhānaso varaḥ* //{226}*" [ĀS 19.10]
[21.14] ity upabrahmaṇāt. brahmasūtre indraprāṇādhikaraṇe tathā nirṇayāc ca.*{227}*
[21.15] ānuśāsanike: "tathāgnes tasya bhasmabhyo*{228}* brahmarṣigaṇasamimtāḥ*{229}* /
[21.16] vaikhānasās samutpannās tapaśśrutaguṇepsavaḥ//*{230}*" [MBh 13.85.18]

lg.l: [21.20] tatra pūrvaṃ padaṃ kṛtvā purā viṣṇus trivikrame /
[21.23] dṛśyo bhavati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śikharaṃ tan mahocchrayam // [Rā.m 4.39.53]

div.p: !{220}! Dieser Halbvers ist ähnlich in DHN[D] 53.3 zitiert. !{221}! DHN[T] 135 statt DHN[D] 21.2-6: iti kutaḥ: tṛtīyāśramaniṣṭhaparatvenāvagamyamānatvāt tatra tatrotkṛṣṭatvapratipādanāc ca tṛtīyāśramaniṣṭā eveti cet tat asat. !{222}! Bezug auf TĀ 1.23.3; s. DHN[D] 8.14-19. !{223}! ChāndogyaBr 2.23.1; ebenfalls zitiert in DHN[D] 41.8, 61.13-15 und 118.4. !{224}! DHN[T] 136 om. ityādi śrutibhyaḥ. !{225}! DHN[T] 136: vikhanos tathā; der erste Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.3 zitiert. !{226}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Varāhapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 41.10-11 und in DHN[D] 118.6-7; vgl. KrA 36.37: aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvaḥ tulasī vikhano dvijaḥ / haripriyās tu catvāraḥ teṣu vaikhānaso varaḥ. !{227}! DHN[T] 136: ity upabṛṃhaṇavacanāc ca. nārāyaṇaḥ. !{228}! MBh: tathā bhasmavyapohebhyo; die Lesart des DHN[D] ist v.l. !{229}! Lies: brahmarṣigaṇasammitāḥ. !{230}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Mahābhārata" in DHN[D] 17.7-8 zitiert. !{231}! DHN[T] 136: ity agnāv evotpattipratipādanāt. !{232}! Rām: śikharaṃ meroś. !{233}! Rām: uttareṇa parikramya.

lg.l: [22.3] strīṇām aśvamukhīnāñ ca niketās tatra tatra tu // [Rā.m 4.42.30]
[22.5] siddhā vaikhānasās tatra vālakhilyāś ca tāpasāḥ // [Rā.m 4.42.31]
[22.6] vandyās te tu tapassiddhās tapasā vītakalmaṣāḥ /

div.l: [22.8] hemapuṣkarasañchannaṃ tatra vaikhānasaṃ saraḥ /" [Rām 4.42.33ab]
[22.9] iti ca vānaprasthaparatvaṃ vinā "vaikhānasā vālakhilyā" iti vālakhilyasamānatayā pṛthag vaṃśatvena kīrtanāt.
[22.14] mahātmābhir mahātmā vai jagatāṃ pālanodyataḥ //" iti [ViṣṇuP ]
[22.15] tathā sabhāparvaṇi:
[22.16] pitāmahasya bhavanaṃ jagmuś ca kṛpayānvitāḥ* //{236}* [MBh 1.203.2cd]

lg.l: [22.17] tato dadṛśur ātmānaṃ saha devaiḥ pitāmaham /
[22.19] tatra viṣṇur mahādevas tatrāgnir vāyunā saha /
[22.20] candrādityau ca dharmaś ca parameṣṭhī tathā budhāḥ* //{238}* [MBh 1.203.4]

div.l: [22.24-25] iti ca vaikhānasānāṃ brahmasabhāpraveśavarṇanāt. tasya ca tṛtīyāśramaniṣṭheṣv asambhavāt.

div.p: !{234}! Rām: mainākas tu. !{235}! Rām: praṣṭavyāś cāpi sītāyāḥ pravṛttaṃ vinayānvitaiḥ. !{236}! MBh: pitāmahasya bhavanaṃ jagataḥ kṛpayā tadā. !{237}! MBh: tato dadṛśur āsīnaṃ saha devaiḥ pitāmaham / siddhair brahmarṣibhiś caiva samantāt parivāritam. !{238}! MBh: tatra devo mahādevas tatrāgnir vāyunā saha / candrādityau ca dharmaś ca parameṣṭhī tathā budhaḥ. !{239}! MBh: vaikhānasā vālakhilyā vānaprasthā marīcipāḥ / ajāś caivāvimūḍhāś ca tejogarbhās tapasvinaḥ / ṛṣayaḥ sarva evaite pitāmaham upāsate.

div.l: [23.1] ānuśāsanike
[23.2] "śṛṇu rājan vasiṣṭhasya mukhyaṃ karma yaśasvinaḥ / [MBh 13.140.15cd]
[23.3] vaikhānasavidhānena gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritāḥ // [MBh 13.140.647*.1]
[23.4] ādityās satramīhanti saro vaikhānasaṃ prati*{240}* //" iti [MBh 13.140.16]

[23.5-7] atra vānaprasthavidhau satrayāgakramavidhānābhāvāt vānaprasthāśramapraviṣṭhānāṃ tena śārīreṇa punar api devatvayogyatā 'sambhavāc ca vaikhānasavidhāneneti vaikhānasapadena vānaprasthānāṃ gṛhītum aśakyatvāt.

lg.l: [23.10] na tu śrautena vidhinā māṃ yajeta vanāśramī* //{241}*" [BhāgavataP 11.18.7]

div.l: [23.11] iti vānaprasthānāṃ śarutavidhiniṣedhapratipādanāt.

lg.l: [23.13] yājayed yajñapuruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ rājā jagaddhitaḥ //" iti

div.l: [23.14] tathā āśvamedhike:
[23.15] yudhiṣṭhirah: "kathaṃ tvaṃ arcanīyo 'si mūrtayaḥ kīdṛśāś ca te*{242}* / [MBh 14, App. 4.1652]
[23.16] vaikhānasāḥ kathaṃ brūyuḥ kathaṃ vā pāñcarātrikāḥ // [MB.h 14, App. 4.1653]
[23.17] śrībhagavān: "śṛṇu pāṇḍava tatsarvam arcanākramam ātmanaḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.1654]
[23.18] sthaṇḍile padmakaṃ kṛtvā sāṣṭapatraṃ*{243}* sakarṇikam // [MB.h 14, App. 4.1655]
[23.19] aṣṭākṣaravidhānena athavā dvādaśākṣaraiḥ*{244}* / [MBh 14, App. 4.1656]
[23.20] vaidikair athavā mantrair mama sūktena vā punaḥ // [MB.h 14, App. 4.1657]
[23.21] sthitaṃ māṃ mantratas tasmin arcayet susamahitaḥ*{245}* / [MBh 14, App. 4.1658]
[23.22] viṣṇuñ ca puruṣaṃ satyam*{246}* acyutañ ca yudhiṣṭhira*{247}* // [MB.h 14, App. 4.1659]
[23.23] aniruddhañ ca māṃ prāhur vaikhānasavido janāḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.1660]
[23.24] anye tv evaṃ vijānānti māṃ rājan pāñcarātrikāḥ*{248}* // [MB.h 14, App. 4.1661]

div.p: !{240}! MBh: ādityāḥ satramāsanta saro vai mānasaṃ prati; DHN[D] ist v.l. !{241}! BhāgavataP: vanyaiś carupuroḍāśair nirvapet kālacoditān / na tu śrautena paśunā māṃ yajeta vanāśramī. !{242}! MBh: tu te. !{243}! MBh: cāṣṭapatraṃ. !{244}! MBh: hy athavā dvādaśākṣaraiḥ. !{245}! MBh: sthāpitaṃ māṃ tatas tasminn arcayitvā vicakṣaṇaḥ. !{246}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" zitiert in DHN[D] 36.9. !{247}! MBh: puruṣaṃ ca tataḥ satyam acyutañ ca yudhiṣṭhira; so auch zitiert in DHN[D] 44.22. !{248}! So auch zitiert in DHN[D] 44.23-24.

div.l: [24.1] vāsudevañ ca rājendra saṅkarṣaṇam athāpi vā / [MBh 14, App. 4.1662]
[24.2] pradyumnañ cāniruddhañ ca caturmūrtiṃ pracakṣate* //{249}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1663]
[24.3] etāś cānyāś ca rājendra saṃjñābhedena mūrtayaḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.1664]
[24.4] viddhy anarthāntarā eva mām evañ cārcayed budhaḥ* //{250}*" iti [MBh 14, App. 4.1665]
[24.5] tathā pāñcarātre pauṣkarasaṃhitāyām:
[24.6] "viprā vaikhānasākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvam ucyate* //{251}* [PauṣkaraS 36.260cd]

lg.l: [24.8] kartavyam iti deveśaṃ saṃyajante phalaṃ vinā //"*{253}* iti [PauṣkaraS 36.261]
[24.10] "śuddhañ ca vaidikañ ceti tāntrikañ ca tridhā bhavet /
[24.11] pāñcarātreṇa pūjā tu śuddhaṃ viṣṇor iti smṛtam // [PauṣkaraS ]
[24.13] vaidikaṃ tad iti proktaṃ dvijātīnāṃ praśasyate //" iti [PauṣkaraS ]
[24.16] saṃhitājapamāsthāya te māṃ prāpsyanti vai dvijāḥ //

div.l: [24.17] alābhe vedamantrāṇāṃ pāñcarātroditena vā //" iti

lg.l: [24.20] vaikhānasoktair divyair vā mantrais sarvārthasiddhaye //" iti [Saṅkarṣaṇasaṃhitā]

div.p: !{249}! So auch zitiert in DHN[D] 44.25-45.1. !{250}! So auch zitiert in DHN[D] 45.2-3. !{251}! PauṣkaraS: viprā ekāyanākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvato 'cyute; dieser Halbvers ist als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" ähnlich zitiert in DHN[D] 42.25, 48.18, 1118.12, als "Purātantra" ähnlich in DHN[D] 36.24. !{252}! Lies: ekāntinas. !{253}! PauṣkaraS: kartavyatvena ye viṣṇuṃ saṃyajanti phalaṃ vinā; der erste Halbvers ist auch als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" zitiert in DHN[D] 48.18, ähnlich als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.1; der ganze Vers als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 42.26-43.1 und 118.13-14.

div.l: [25.11] vaidikaṃ tad iti proktaṃ rājarāṣṭravivardhanam* //{256}*" iti. [SuprabedhĀ ]

lg.l: [25.17] vaiṣṇavañ ca tridhā proktaṃ tathā samayabhedavat // [Bhīmasaṃhitā]
[25.19] śuddhaṃ miśraṃ tathā saumyaṃ yathā saṃkhyakrameṇa tu // [Bhīmasaṃhitā]
[25.22] grāmādīnāṃ samīpe tu miśroktaṃ sthāpayed budhaḥ /

div.l: [25.24] viprāvāseṣu sarveṣu saumyoktenaiva kārayet //" iti [Bhīmasaṃhitā]

div.p: !{254}! DHN[T] 145: niṣekādyādisaṃskṛtaiḥ. !{255}! DHN[T] 145: vedavedānta(ṅgasaṃbhavai)ḥ. !{256}! Vgl. SuprabhedĀ, kriyāpāda 23.65: sahasrabhūsurād ūrdhve brahmeśo vāyudeśake / pañcamūrtividhānena sthāpayed vaijanādmanaṃ, !{257}! DHN[T] 146: abdi(dri)nadyāditīreṣu.

lg.l: [26.1] tathā gāruḍe: "adhvaryubhir vipravarair mate vikhanasas sthitaiḥ /
[26.10] yajed dhariṃ surapatiṃ bhūmer vivarago 'pi san //" iti [GaruḍaP ]
[26.13] praṇamanty anvahaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam anāmayam //" iti [GaruḍaP ]
[26.15] "phullaśiṣyās tu yakṣās te pūjayanti yuge yuge /

div.l: [26.17] mānuṣāḥ pūjayantīha vaikhānasamate sthitāḥ //" iti [AgniP ]

lg.l: [26.20] varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇāś śreṣṭhā āśramāṇāṃ yatir yathā // [BrahmakaivartaP ]
[26.22] vyūhānām ādibhūtas tu vāsudevo yathā varaḥ /
[26.23] trimūrtīnāṃ yathā viṣṇuś śivānān tu sadāśivaḥ* //{261}* [BrahmakaivartaP ]
[26.24] dharmāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavo dharmaḥ smṛtīnāṃ mānavī smṛtiḥ /

div.p: !{258}! DHN[D] 7.26: vastreṇocchādya. !{259}! DHN[D] 8.1: tadā. !{260}! Auch zitiert als "Gāruḍapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 7.25-8.2. !{261}! Diese Verse sind ähnlich auch als "Brahmakaivartapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 42.1-6 zitiert. !{262}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Brahmakaivartapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 42.7-8.

lg.l: [27.1] sūtrāṇāṃ tatpraṇītan tu yathā śreṣṭhatamaṃ smṛtam /

div.l: [27.3-6] iti ca pratipādanāt īdṛśānāṃ vaikhānasānām eva śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇādiṣu caturmukhāt sāmānyatvena vinā sarvotkṛṣṭatvenotpattiśravaṇāt brahmasabhāpraveśasūryapathādyāśrayaṇādipratipādanāc ca vaikhānasā na tṛtīyāśramaniṣṭhāḥ, na vā brahmaṇā sāmānyataḥ sṛṣṭā bhavitum arhanti.

lg.l: [27.8] yato hi karmabhūr eṣā hy ato 'nyā bhogabhūmayaḥ // [Viṣṇu.P 2.2.22]
[27.9] kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparañ ca kaliścānyatra na kvacit /
[27.10] tapas tapyanti yatayo juhvate cātra yajvanaḥ // [ViṣṇuP ]

div.l: [27.13] yajñair yajñamayo viṣṇur anyadvīpeṣu cānyathā // [ViṣṇuP ]

[27.16-19] iti bhāratakhaṇḍavyatiriktasthaleṣu brahmacaryādyāśramādivyavasthāvyavahārādyabhavāt pāñcarātraśilpajyautiṣādiṣu eṣām advārakabhagavadyajanādhikāritvaparamavaidikaparamaikāntitvādeḥ pratipādanāṅ ca eṣv eva vaikhānasatvaṃ naisargikam. vānaprastheṣu vaikhānasatvaṃ na naisargikam.

[27.20-22] kintu teṣāṃ sūtrāntareṣv anuktānāṃ vānaprasthāśramasvīkāraprayogaśrāmaṇakāgnikuṇḍavidhānādīnāṃ vikhanas sūtre pratipāditānāṃ tatsūtroktaprakāreṇa vānaprasthāśramasvīkārādinaiva vaikhānasatvasiddhir iti.
[27.23] idam evāha baudhāyanaḥ:

[27.24-28.2] "vānaprastho vaikhānasaśāstrasamudācāro vane mūlaphalāśī tapaśśīlas savaneṣūdakam upaspṛśan śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāyāgrāmyabhojī devapitṛmanuṣyabhūtarṣipūjakaḥ sarvātithiḥ pratiṣiddhavarjaṃ bhaikṣam apy upayuñjīta. na phālakṛṣṭam adhitiṣṭhet grāmaṃ vā na praviśet"*{264}* iti.

div.p: !{263}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Brahmakaivartapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 42.10-11. !{264}! BaudhDhS 2.11.16-17.

div.l: [28.3] manuḥ: "ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ vaikhānasāśrayam //"*{265}* ity ārabhya

lg.l: [28.5] kālapakvais svayaṃ śīrṇair vaikhānasamate sthitaḥ //"*{266}* iti [ManuDhŚ 6.21]

div.l: [28.6-8] hārīta: "vānaprastho grāmyā oṣadhīḥ parivarjayet. tretāgnīnāṃ sthāne śrāmaṇakaṃ vāgnim ādhāya valkalaśāṇacarmakuśamuñjādivalkalaṃ vā vasāno vaikhānasaproktena vidhinā vānaprastho bhavati. anujñāyiko 'nuprasthāyika" iti.
[28.9] yama: "śrāmaṇakena vidhānena sāyaṃ prātar upaspṛśed" iti.
[28.10-11] śaṅkhalikhitau: "śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāya kāle kuruvindaveṇuśyāmākanīvārādibhir vartayed"*{267}* iti.
[28.12] vasiṣṭho 'pi: "śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāyāhitāgnir vṛkṣamūlika" iti.
[28.13] asya yajñasvāmivyākhyāne:
[28.14] "śrāmaṇakaṃ nāma vaikhānasaśāstram. taduktena vidhināgnim ādhāya" iti.
[28.15] śukānuśāsane vyāso 'pi:
[28.16] "mūlair eke phalair eke puṣpair eke dṛḍhavratāḥ / [MBh 12.236.13cd]
[28.17] vartayanti yathānyāyaṃ vaikhānasamate sthitāḥ* //{268}*" iti [MBh 12.236.14ab]

lg.l: [28.18] smṛtyantaram api: "yasminn eva tu samproktaṃ sūtre vikhanasā param /
[28.20] vānaprasthās tatas sarve ye dvijās tv anyasūtriṇaḥ /
[28.21] tatsūtravidhyanuṣṭhānāt smṛtā vaikhānasās tu te* //{270}*" iti ca varṇayanti.*{271}* [ĀS 11.4]

div.l: [28.22] ataś ca vānaprasthā mukhyatvena vaikhānasaśabdavācyā na bhavanti.*{272}*
[28.23] ānuśāsanike ca:
[28.24] "taṃ patantam abhiprekṣya*{273}* prekṣya ca rṣigaṇānatha / [MBh 13, App. 1A.313]
[28.25] āsīnāna*{274}* vasubhis sārdhaṃ satreṇa jagatīpateḥ // [MBh 13, App. 1A.314]

div.p: !{265}! ManuDhŚ 6.1ab v.l. Dieser Halbvers ist ähnlich als "Manu" zitiert in DHN[D] 92.5. !{266}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Manu" zitiert in DHN[D] 92.6-7. !{267}! S.u., DHN[D] 92.12-13. !{268}! MBh: vaikhānasamataṃ sthitāḥ. !{269}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 34.21-22 zitiert. !{270}! ĀS: smārtā vaikhānasās smṛtāḥ; dieser Vers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 34.22-23 zitiert. !{271}! DHN[T] 157 om. ca varṇayanti. !{272}! DHN[T] 157 umgestellt: ata eva mukhyatvena vaikhānasaśabdavācyā vānaprasthā na bhavanti. !{273}! MBh: tāṃ patantīm abhiprekṣya. !{274}! DHN[T] 157: āsīnān; MBh: āsīnān vasu.

div.l: [29.1] vaikhānasānām eteṣāṃ*{275}* vālakhilyagaṇān api / [MBh 13, App. 1A.315]
[29.2] tasya bhīrāviśattatra patagendrasya bhārata // [MB.h 13, App. 1A.316]
[29.3] tuṇḍena gṛhya tāṃ śākhām utpapāta khageśvaraḥ //" iti [MBh 13, App. 1A.318]
[29.4] tatraivomāmaheśvarasaṃvāde:
[29.5] "vaikhānasānāṃ vai dharmaṃ śrotum icchāmi dharmataḥ* //{276}* ity ārabhya
[29.6] teṣu vaikhānasā nāma vānaprasthāś śubhekṣaṇe / [MBh 13, App. 15.702]
[29.7] tīvreṇa tapasā yuktā*{277}* dīptimantas sutejasaḥ //" iti [MBh 13, App. 15.703]
[29.8] harivaṃśe ca akrūrāgamanasamaye:
[29.9] "śakapotrāvyayā? mode pradoṣe 'bhyāśatas*{278}* kare* /{279}* [HariV 68.4]
[29.10] kiñcid abhyudite some śātiteṣu tamas su ca* //{280}* [Hariv 68.9]
[29.11] vanyair vaikhānasair mantraiḥ hūyamāne hutāśane //" iti. [HariV 68.5cd]
[29.12] pādme ca: "brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddhahārītaṃ vaikhānasamate sthitam //" iti ca varṇanāt*{281}* [PadmaP ]

[29.13-15] vānaprasthasya śrautaviṣaye pṛthaktvena mantrapratipādanābhāvāc ca bodhāyanādibhir uktaprakāreṇa*{282}* vānaprasthasya vaikhānasatvaṃ vaikhānasasūtroktavānaprasthāśramasvīkārād evety avagantavyam.*{283}* etāvatā vikhanaś śabdārtho nirṇītaḥ.*{284}*
[29.16] (ādyahetunirūpaṇaprakāraḥ)

lg.l: [29.20] tasyāpi kila tatpitrā tasmai cāha kilośanāḥ* //{287}* [ViṣṇuDh 1.38]

div.p: !{275}! MBh: vaikhānasān nāma yatīn. !{276}! MBh 13, App. 15.701: śrotum icchāmi ahaṃ prabho; DHN[T] 157: maheśvaraḥ. !{277}! DHN[T] 157: yukto. !{278}! DHN[T] 158: pradoṣābhyāśatas. !{279}! HariV: śakragopāhvayāmode pradoṣe 'bhyāśatas kare / saṃdhyām mayīm iva guhāṃ saṃpraviṣṭe divākare //. V.l. zu a: śakragotrāhvayāmode, śakragopāhvayābhāse, cakragotrāhvayāmode, cakragotrāhvayā goṣu. !{280}! HariV: kiñcid abhyutthite some mandaraśmau virājati; v.l. zu a: kiñcid abhyudite, abhyudyate; b nicht im Harivaṃśa. !{281}! DHN[T] 158 om. ca varṇanāt. !{282}! DHN[T] 158: uktatvāc ca. !{283}! DHN[T] 158 om. etāvatā vikhanaś śabdārtho nirṇītaḥ. !{284}! Anmerkung des Herausgebers: vikhanovaikhānasādiśabdānāṃ (1) nārāyaṇe (2) tannābhinalina saṃbhūte caturānane (3) maharṣipravare, (4) tannāmasu mantradraṣṭṛṣu, (5) bhrgvādiṣu vaikhānasavaṃśakartṛṣu bhagavanmānasaputreṣu, (6) vaikhānasasūtreṇa aṣṭādaśasaṃskāravatsu bhagavatpriyatameṣv arcakeṣu, (7) tatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhātṛṣu kalpasūtrāntarasaṃskṛteṣu hārītādiṣu, (8) tatsūtroktavidhinā tṛtīyāśramadharmānuṣṭhātṛṣu saubharyādiṣu, (9) vikhanasā sṛṣṭe samaste jagati, ca yathāyathaṃ mukhyayā vṛtyyā upacāreṇa vā prakṛtir bhavatīti iyatā ganthena pratipāditaṃ bhavati. !{285}! DHN[T] 160 ins. sūtrasya praṇetā vikhanā akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaḥ. !{286}! DHN[T] 160 om. vaikhānasasūtraśāstrayoḥ. !{287}! ViṣṇuDh: pravakṣyāmi.

lg.l: [30.1] tenāpi bhṛgum ārādhya prāptam*{288}* ārādhanaṃ hareḥ /

[30.11] gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīre sīmni tasyāntike 'pi ca* //{291}* [GaruḍaP ]

lg.l: [30.13] pāñcarātre: "ādye kaliyuge prāpte somakena hṛtā trayī /
[30.17] śaṅkaraś caiva pañcaite papracchuḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
[30.18] kṣaṇam apy acyutasyārcāṃ tyaktum eva na śaknumaḥ //
[30.21] ity uktas sa haris tebhyaḥ*{294}* pañcarātravidhiṃ kramāt /

div.l: [30.23] pañcalakṣapramāṇena pañcarātraṃ prapañcitam //" ity upakramya

lg.l: [31.2] rātribhiḥ pañcabhiḥ proktaṃ śrutaṃ śiṣyaiś ca pañcabhiḥ //

div.l: [31.3] tasmāt tat pañcarātrākhyāṃ labdhvā tiṣṭhati bhūtale //"
[31.4-5] ity antena*{296}* pāñcarātrasyotpattyādikaṃ nirūpya paramavaidikasya śrīvaikhānasasyotpattyādikaṃ pratipādyate.*{297}*

lg.l: [31.9] uvāca vacanaṃ premṇā daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca //
[31.10] tāntrikeṇa tvayā proktaṃ mārgeṇa bhavad arcanam*{298}* /
[31.12] vaidikena tvad arcāṃ me yathāpūrvaṃ vadācyuta /
[31.13] ity ukto bhagavān devaḥ śāstraṃ śrutipathāgatam //
[31.16] uvāca jagatāṃ prītyai yajñānāṃ pūraṇāya ca /
[31.17] mūlaṃ sarvāgamānāñ ca purāṇānāṃ tathaiva ca //
[31.19] vedāś ca vikhanaśśāstraṃ pramāṇam iti cerayan //
[31.21] ye nakhā bhuvi sañjātās te vai vaikhānasā iti //

div.p: !{296}! DHN[T] 162: (iddham). !{297}! DHN[T] 162: pratipādyati. !{298}! DHN[T] 163: tāntrikeṇa mayā proktaṃ mārgeṇābhavad arcanam. !{299}! DHN[T] 163: 'hant sthāmabhavatīti. !{300}! DHN[T] 164: munibhṛndaniṣevitam.

lg.l: [32.1] tapas taptvā ciraṃ kālaṃ dhyāyaṃs tejas tu vaiṣṇavam /
[32.2] paścād apaśyad viṣṇūktam āgamaṃ vistarāt tadā //
[32.3] saśrautañ ca sagṛhyañ*{301}* ca vedamantrair abhiṣṭutam /
[32.7] kalpe kalpe purā viṣṇur udbhūtaḥ pūrvavat sadā /
[32.8] tasmād vaidikam ācāraṃ yaḥ kartuṃ bhuvi vāñchati //

div.l: [32.9] tasyedaṃ śāstram ity uktaṃ netareṣābhitīritam //"

lg.l: [32.11] ṛṣaya ūcuḥ: "vaikhānasasya sūtrasya kiṃ māhātmyaṃ mahāmune /
[32.13] tatsūtriṇāñ ca māhātmyaṃ śrotum icchāmahe vayam /
[32.14] samūrtasyāsya yajñasya ye yogyāḥ iti kīrtitāḥ // [Purātantra.]
[32.15] bhṛguḥ: yuṣmābhiḥ paripṛṣṭaṃ yat samyag vakṣyāmi suvratāḥ /
[32.18] sasmāra vedān akhilān na sṛṣṭis sampravartate // [Purātantra.]
[32.20] vismṛtā nikhilā vedā hṛdaye tasya saṃsthitāḥ // [Purātantra.]
[32.21] cintāturas tadā brahmā nālaṅkartuṃ kim apy abhūt /
[32.22] tataś cintān tu tāṃ tyaktvā svasthacittaḥ prajāpatiḥ // [Purātantra.]

div.p: !{301}! DHN[T] 164: sasūtraṃ. !{302}! DHN[T] 164 ins. (sa dhātā vikhano nāma). !{303}! DHN[T] 164 ins. munibhis taiś ca saṃkṣiptaṃ caturlakṣapramāṇataḥ.

lg.l: [33.5] tatas tu bhagavān brahmā chandomūlam avāptavān /
[33.6] tasya dakṣiṇato vaktrāt tuṣṭāva jagataḥ patim // [Purātantra]
[33.10] sa vibhuḥ procyate sarvair vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ // [Purātantra.]
[33.11] vaikhānasaś ca bhagavān procyate sa pitāmahaḥ*{304}* /
[33.14] prāṇāc ca cakṣuṣas tadvad abhimānāc ca karmaṇaḥ*{305}* // [Purātantra]
[33.15] hṛdayāc chirasaś śrotrād udānād vyānatas tataḥ /
[33.17] dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgum eva ca /
[33.18] tathāṅgirasam atriñ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ tathā* //{307}* [Purātantra]
[33.19] vasiṣṭhañ ca kratuñ caiva kramād asṛjad abjabhūḥ /
[33.20] nava brahmāṇa evaite vinā syur nīlalohitam* //{308}* [Purātantra]
[33.21] vedānāṃ vyasanād arvāk prāgrūpaṃ militan tu yat /
[33.22] tān tu vaikhānasīṃ śākhāṃ ādāvadhyāpayan munīn* //{309}* [Purātantra]

div.l: [33.23] (nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhur yañ ca vaikhānasaṃ tathā* //{310}* [Purātantra]
[33.24] bhṛgvaṅgiromarīcyatripulastyapulahāḥ kratuḥ /

div.p: !{304}! Von antarhitānāṃ bis pitāmahaḥ auch zitiert als "Ānandasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 8.4-6. !{305}! Lies: ṛṣiśreṣṭhānimān daśa; dieser Vers ist auch als "Ānandasaṃhitā" (ĀS 4.23) zitiert in DHN[D] 12.7-8. !{307}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Ānandasaṃhitā" (ĀS 4.24) zitiert in DHN[D] 12.9-10. !{308}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert als "Ānandasaṃhitā" (ĀS 4.25) in DHN[D] 12.11-12; die zweite Vershälfte ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 34.2 zitiert. !{309}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 71.5-6 zitiert. !{310}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Ānandasaṃhitā" zitiert in DHN[D] 4.9.

div.l: [34.1] tathā vasiṣṭho dakṣaś ca nava brahmāṇa īritāḥ* //{311}* [Purātantra]
[34.2] nava brahmāṇa evaite vinā syur nīlalohitam* //{312}* [Purātantra]

lg.l: [34.6] kecit sūtraṇi vai cakruḥ gṛhyaśrautātmikāni tu // [Purātantra]
[34.7] dharmaśāstrāṇi kecit tu purāṇāni ca kecana /
[34.9] tān tu vaikhānasīṃ śākhāṃ svasūtre viniyuktavān /
[34.11] tān tu vaikhānasīṃ śākhāṃ vyāsas tu bhagavān muniḥ /
[34.12] cakre ṛgādibhedais tu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak // [Purātantra]
[34.13] audgātraṃ sāmabhir yāge brāhmam ātharvaṇena ca /
[34.14] hautram ṛgbhir yajur mantrair ādhvaryavam akārayat // [Purātantra.]
[34.15] āmnāyasya vidhir brāhmaḥ pañcakāṇḍātmikā tu sā /
[34.16] sā ca vaikhānasī śākhā taittirīyā ca kīrtitā // [Purātantra]
[34.17] ādikāle tu bhagavān brahmā tu vikhānā muniḥ /
[34.20] yasminn eva tu samproktaṃ sūtre vikhanasā param // [Purātantra]

div.l: [34.21] vanasthānān tu sarveṣāṃ vidhiś śrāmaṇakābhidhaḥ* /{314}*

lg.l: [34.22] vānaprasthās tatas sarve ye dvijāś cānyasūtriṇaḥ /

div.l: [34.24] yatsūtrādyantamadhyeṣu bhagavān viṣṇur avyayaḥ /

div.p: !{311}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Mahābhārata" in DHN[D] 20.2-3. !{312}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" zitiert in DHN[D] 30.20 und als "Ānandasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 12.12. !{313}! ĀS 11.4; der Vers ist ähnlich in DHN[D] 28.20-21 zitiert.

div.l: [35.1] yaṣṭavyo gīyate yasmāt sarvasūtrottaman tu tat // [Purātantra]

lg.l: [35.2] vede vaikhānase sūtre yo dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
[35.3] sarvais sa dharmo 'nuṣṭheyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā*{316}* // [Purātantra]
[35.5] sadyaḥ patati vai vipro na vedasya samāśraye* //{317}* [Purātantra]

div.l: [35.6] etad vaikhānasaṃ sūtram anyaśāstrānapekṣitam // [Purātantra]

lg.l: [35.12] tathā sūtreṣu sarveṣu sūtram etad praśasyate // [Purātantra]
[35.13] agnir vaikhānasaṃ śāstraṃ viṣṇur vedāś ca śāśvatāḥ /
[35.16] tatphalaṃ labhate sadyaḥ sūtram etat paṭhan dvijaḥ // [Purātantra]

div.l: [35.17] agnīṣomādayo devā ye yajñāṃśahavir bhujaḥ /

lg.l: [35.21] ādyatvāt sarvasūtrāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavatvāc ca tat tu vai /

div.l: [35.23] gṛhe puruṣapūjāyā vidhānam ṛṣisattamāḥ /

div.l: [37.1] ekāntinas susattvasthā dehāntaṃ nānyayājinaḥ* //{324}* [Purātantra]

lg.l: [37.3] aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvas tulasī vikhanās tathā*{325}* // [Purātantra.]
[37.4] dvijeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ brāhmaṇeṣu ca vaiṣṇavāḥ /
[37.6] vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā /
[37.10] purā tu pṛṣṭavān brahmā devadevaṃ janārdanam // [Purātantra]

div.l: [37.11] "kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa pūjanīyo 'si kair api /"
[37.12] ity evaṃ bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ prāha vai caturānanam // [Purātantra]

lg.l: [37.13] "ālaye ty arcanaṃ syāt tu parivārānvitasya me /
[37.15] vaikhānasais tu viprendrair arcanaṃbis hier noch Telugu vergleichen mama tuṣṭidam /
[37.16] amūrtañ ca samūrtañ ca dvidhā vaidikam ucyate // [Purātantra]
[37.18] yathā karmaṇa ekasya kalpitāḥ pañca vahnayaḥ // [Purātantra]
[37.21] anena vidhinā pūjyo viprair vaikhānasais tathā /
[37.22] pūjā vaikhānasair viprair ālaye syād viśeṣataḥ // [Purātantra]

div.p: !{324}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 43.1, 48.19, 118.13. !{325}! ĀS 19.10ab; dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert als "Varāhapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 41.10 und 118.6. !{326}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Vṛddhayājñavalkya" in DHN[D] 41.15-16 zitiert. !{327}! DHN[T] 174: aihikāmuṣmikaṃ pradam.

lg.l: [38.3] anuṣṭheyo vidhis so 'yaṃ viprair vaikhānasais tataḥ // [Purātantra]
[38.6] ajñānād arthalobhād vā bhayād vā 'py ālayārcanam /
[38.9] ṣaṇmāsāt patanaṃ yāti narakañ caiva gacchati // [Purātantra]
[38.11] ālaye tv arcanaṃ kuryāt sadyaḥ patati devalaḥ // [Purātantra]
[38.14] ālāpaṃ darśanañ caiva sparśanañ ca viśeṣataḥ /

[38.18] evam eva tathā kuryād viprair anyaiḥ prapūjite /
[38.19] kalaśais snāpayitvā tu dhruvoktāṃ śuddhim ācaret // [Purātantra]

div.l: [38.20] tryahan tu pūjite tadvad vāstuhomaṃ samāpya ca* /{331}*
[38.21] paryagnipañcagavyābhyāṃ mahāśāntiñ ca kārayet* //{332}* [Purātantra]

lg.l: [38.22] arcane*{333}* tu mahāviṣṇos saptāhan tu viśeṣataḥ /
[38.23] mahāśāntiṃ yajitvā tu śuddhiṃ pūrvavad ācaret // [Purātantra]

div.l: [38.24] dvādaśāhaṃ samārabhya māsāntan tu viśeṣataḥ /

div.p: !{328}! DHN[T] 175: ālaye statt kriyate. !{329}! DHN[T] 175: sa vai devalako nāmā havyakavyabahiṣkṛtaḥ; dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Bhavacchāstra" zitiert in DHN[D] 63.56; vgl. PrA 18.24: avaikhānasavipras tu pūjayed ālaye hariṃ / sa vai devalako nāma sarvakarmabahiṣkṛtaḥ. !{330}! DHN[T] 175: avaikhānasavipreṇa. !{331}! DHN[T] 175-6: vāstuhomāvasānake. !{332}! DHN[T] 176: mahāśāntiś ca hūyatāṃ. !{333}! DHN[T] 176: (te) arcanaṃ.

div.l: [39.1] avaikhānasapūjāyāṃ tantrasaṅkara*{334}* eva ca // [Purātantra]

lg.l: [39.2] māsatrayaṃ ca ṣaṇmāsam anyaviprais tu pūjane /
[39.3] na tatra bimbe sānnidhyaṃ devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // [Purātantra]

div.l: [39.8] tasmāt tatkarṣaṇādyañ ca niṣkṛtyantālayārcanam /

lg.l: [39.11] pūjanīyo hariḥ samyak vipraiḥ nānyaiḥ kadācana /
[39.12] anyena vidhinā mantrair anyair anyārcakena vā // [Purātantra]
[39.13] ālaye tvarcanaṃ syāc cen mahādoṣo bhaved dhruvam*{337}* /
[39.14] tasmāt tu vaidike tv asminn ālayārcāvidhau dvijāḥ // [Purātantra.]

div.l: [39.15] pratiṣṭhādiṣu saṅgrāhyāḥ proktā vaikhānasā dvijāḥ* /{338}*
[39.16] brahmāpi bhagavān devo harir nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // [Purātantra]

lg.l: [39.17] nāviṣṇur jāyate viṣṇur nāviṣṇur viṣṇum arcayet*{339}* /
[39.20] arcakaṃ toṣayed viṣṇuṃ yas toṣayitum icchati // [Purātantra]

div.l: [39.21] tuṣṭe 'rcake jagannāthas tuṣṭha eva na saṃśayaḥ // [Purātantra]
[39.22] svapne svarūpaṃ bhaktāya pratyakṣayati mādhavaḥ* /{340}*
[39.23] pravakti bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sukhaduḥkhadvayaṃ nṛṇām //" iti [Purātantra]
[39.24] skānde:
[39.25] "vaikhānasīṃ mahāśākhāṃ svasūtre viniyuktavān /

div.p: !{334}! DHN[T] 176: tantrasaṅkaraṃ. !{335}! DHN[T] 176: adhivāsatrayāṃ te tu. !{336}! DHN[T] 176: abhicārikam ity uktaṃ. !{337}! DHN[T] 177: mahādoṣo bhavet tataḥ. !{338}! DHN[T] 177: sapratiṣṭhādike grāhyāḥ proktā vaikhānasānvyāḥ und ins. (sa pratiṣṭhādike grāhyā ye 'py avaikhānasādvijāḥ?). !{339}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Bṛhannāradīya" zitiert in DHN[D] 119.9; vgl. KhA 22.162ab: nāviṣṇur arcayed viṣṇuṃ nāviṣṇuḥ dhyāyate harim. !{340}! DHN[T] 177: svapne bhaktaṃ svarūpeṇa pratyakṣayati pūjanāt.

div.l: [40.1] padmabhūḥ paramo dhātā tasminn ārādhanatrayam* //{341}* [SkandaP ]
[40.2] uktavān nigamārthānām ācāraṃ pravibhāgaśaḥ //"*{342}* iti [SkandaP ]
[40.3] brahmakaivartavacanāni pūrvam evoktāni.
[40.4-5] nanu ṛgyajussāmātharvāṇa iti vedānāṃ loke prasiddheḥ sarvaśākhāmūlabhūto yajurveda iti pūrvoktaṃ katham upapadyate iti ced ucyate.

lg.l: [40.8] na śakyā vistarād vaktuṃ*{344}* saṅkṣepeṇa śṛṇuṣva tam // [Viṣṇu.P 3.3.4]

div.l: [40.9] dvāpare dvāpare viṣṇur vyāsarūpī mahāmune // [Viṣṇu.P ]
[40.10] vedam ekaṃ subahudhā karoti jagatāṃ hitaḥ*{345}* // [Viṣṇu.P 3.3.5]

lg.l: [40.11] vīryaṃ tejo balañ cālpaṃ manuṣyāṇām avekṣya ca /
[40.14] "eka āsīd yajurvedas taṃ caturdhā hy akalpayat /
[40.15] cāturhotram abhūd yasmiṃs*{346}* tena yajñam athākarot // [Viṣṇu.P 3.4.11]
[40.16] ārdhvaryavaṃ yajurbhis tu ṛgbhir hautraṃ tathā muniḥ*{347}* /
[40.17] audgātraṃ sāmabhiś cakre*{348}* brahmatvañ cāpy atharvabhiḥ // [Viṣṇu.P 3.4.12]
[40.18] tatas sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ kṛtavān muniḥ /
[40.19] yajurbhiś ca yajurvedaṃ*{349}* sāmavedañ ca sāmābhiḥ // [Viṣṇu.P 3.4.13]

div.l: [40.20] rājñāntvatharvavedena*{350}* sarvakarmāṇi sa prabhuḥ /
[40.21] kārayāmāsa maitreya brahmatvañ ca yathāsthiti /// [ViṣṇuP 3.4.14]

lg.l: [40.22] so 'yam eko mahān vedatarus tena pṛthakkṛtaḥ*{351}* /

div.l: [40.24-25] ity antena spaṣṭaṃ pratipāditatvāt yajurveda eka eva prathamāsītity avagamyate.

div.p: !{341}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Skandapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 71.10-11; als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 34.9-10. !{342}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Skandapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 71.12. !{343}! ViṣṇuP: śākhābhedaiḥ sahasraśaḥ. !{344}! ViṣṇuP: na śakyo vistaro (vistarād) vaktuṃ. !{345}! ViṣṇuP: vedam ekaṃ sa bahudhā karoti (subahudhā kurute) jagatī (jagato) hitaḥ. !{346}! ViṣṇuP: caturhotram abhūd yasmiṃs. !{347}! ViṣṇuP: ādhvaryyavaṃ yajurbhis tu ṛgbhir hotraṃ tathā muniḥ. !{348}! ViṣṇuP: audgotraṃ sāmabhiś cakre. !{349}! ViṣṇuP: yajūṃṣi ca yajurvedaṃ. !{350}! ViṣṇuP: rājñastvatharvavedena. !{351}! ViṣṇuP: so 'yam eko mahāvedatarus tena pṛthakkṛtaḥ.

div.l: [41.1-3] sa ca yajurvedaḥ: "bahuśṛṅgaś catus sānuḥ pṛthulo vedaparvataḥ" ity ārabhyoktarītyā vedavyāsarupiṇā bhagavatā yadā vyastaḥ, tataḥ pūrvam ekarūpeṇāvasthitasya tasya vedaparvatasya vaikhānasaśākhātvaprasiddhir āsīd iti pūrvam eva pratipāditam.
[41.4] vaikhānasānāṃ śraiṣṭhyam
[41.5-6] *{352}*prasaṅgāt vaikhānasaśākhāmūlakatvena*{353}* praṇītasūtrānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ śreṣṭhatvam acchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇatvādikañ ca pratipādyate.
[41.7] yathā sāmabrahmaṇe:
[41.8] "vaikhānasā vā ṛṣaya indrasya priyā āsan"*{354}* iti [ChāndogyaBr 2.23.1]
[41.9] vārāhe:
[41.10] "aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvas tulasī vikhanās tathā* /{355}*
[41.11] catvāro matpriyā rājaṃs teṣāṃ vaikhānaso varaḥ* //{356}*" iti [VarāhaP]

lg.l: [41.14] taṃ brāhmaṇan tu dṛṣṭvaiva sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // [Vṛddhayājñavalkya.]
[41.15] vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā /
[41.16] gaṅgāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate* //{357}*" iti [Vṛddhayājñavalkya]

div.p: !{352}! DHN[T] 180 ins. vaikhānasānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ acchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇatvañ ca. !{353}! DHN[T] 180: vaikhānasaśākhāmūlatvena. !{354}! Auch zitiert in DHN[D] 21.8, 61.13-15 und 118.4. !{355}! DHN[T] 180: vaikhānasas tathā; dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.3 zitiert. !{356}! ĀS 19.10; dieser Vers ist ohne Herkunftsangabe in DHN[D] 21.12-13 zitiert, als "Varāhapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 118.6-7, vgl. KrA 36.37: aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvaḥ tulasī vikhano dvijaḥ / haripriyās tu catvāraḥ teṣu vaikhānaso varaḥ. !{357}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.6-7 zitiert. !{358}! Anm. des Herausgebers: mantriṇāṃ - adhītinām ity arthaḥ.

lg.l: [42.1] brahmakaivarte: "nimnagānāṃ yathā gaṅgā devānāṃ bhagavān hariḥ /
[42.2] varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ āśramāṇāṃ yatir yathā // [Brahmakaivarta.P ]
[42.4] tasyāṃ niṣadyātha yasyāṃ niṣaṇṇo bhagavān hariḥ // [BrahmakaivartaP ]
[42.5] vyūhānām ādibhūtas tu vāsudevo yathā paraḥ /
[42.6] trimūrtīnāṃ yathā viṣṇuḥ śivānān tu sadāśivaḥ // [Brahmakaivarta.P ]
[42.7] dharmāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavo dharmaḥ smṛtīnāṃ mānavī smṛtiḥ /

div.l: [42.9] yathā munīnāṃ vikhanā ādibhūta udāhṛtaḥ* /{359}*
[42.10] sūtrāṇāṃ tatpraṇītan tu yathā śreṣṭhatamaṃ smṛtam // [Brahmakaivarta.P ]
[42.11] tathaiva puṣkaro rājaṃs tīrthānām uttamottamaḥ //"*{360}* [BrahmakaivartaP ]

lg.l: [42.16] "yatra vaikhānasā viprā yatra santi gavāṃ gaṇāḥ /
[42.17] yatra bilvāḥ palāśāś ca tatra sannihito hariḥ* //{362}*"
[42.20] durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā pūjanīyā viśeṣataḥ //" [BṛhannāradaP]

div.l: [42.21] hārīte:
[42.22] tasmāt te śuddhasattvasthāś śuddhā vaikhānasāḥ smṛtāḥ* /{363}*
[42.23] yān lokān prāpnuvanty ete tān śṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ //"
[42.24] pāñcarātre pauṣkare:
[42.25] "viprā vaikhānasākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvam ucyate* //{364}* [PauṣkaraS 36.260cd]
[42.26] ekāntinas susattvasthā dehāntaṃ nānyayājinaḥ /

div.p: !{359}! Diese Zeile fehlt im Zitat in DHN[D] 26.19-27.2. !{360}! Die Verse bis hier sind ähnlich auch als "Brahmakaivartapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 26.19-27.2 zitiert. !{361}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 118.10-11. !{362}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 48.23-24 und 118.8-9. !{363}! DHN[T] 183: tasmāt te śuddhasatvasthāś śuddhā vaikhānasā smṛtāḥ /. !{364}! PauṣkaraS: viprā ekāyanākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvato 'cyute; dieser Halbvers ist als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" ähnlich zitiert in 24.6, 42.25, 48.18, 118.12, als "Purātantra" ähnlich in DHN[D] 36.24.

div.l: [43.1] kartavyam iti deveśaṃ saṃyajante phalaṃ vinā* //{365}* [PauṣkaraS 36.261]
[43.2] prāpnuvanti ca dehānte vāsudevatvam abjaja //" iti*{366}* [PauṣkaraS 36.262ab]

lg.l: [43.5] sūkṣmāt sūkṣmam avāpnoti paraṃ brahmāṇam avyayam //" iti

div.l: [43.6] āraṇyaparvaṇi: rameśaḥ:*{367}*
[43.7] "dhyātañ ca saindhavāraṇyaṃ munibṛndaniṣevitam*{368}* / [MBh 3.87.12cd]
[43.8] pitāmahasaraḥ puṇyaṃ puṣkaraṃ nāma bhārata // [MBh 3.87.12ef]
[43.9] vaikhānasānāṃ siddhānām ṛṣīṇām āśramaṃ priyam* //{369}*" iti [MBh 3.87.13]

lg.l: [43.12] puṣkareṣu mahārāja sarveṣu ca jalaṃ spṛśan //" ity ārabhya [MBh 3.125.12]

div.l: [43.13] "etac candrasaro nityam arpayanty ṛṣayas tathā* /{371}*
[43.14] vaikhānasaprabhṛtayo vālakhilyās tathaiva ca //" iti [MBh 3.125.14]

lg.l: [43.17] vaikhānasānāṃ japatām eṣa śabdo mahātmanām //" iti [MBh 3.114.15]
[43.20] akalpayac ca trīn grāmān vaikhānasamahātmanām //" iti [GaruḍaP ]

div.l: [43.21] parameśvare trayodaśādhyāye pavitraviniyogāvasare:*{373}*
[43.22] "pūjayed āptapūrvāṃś ca yatipūrvāṃs tapasvinaḥ* //{374}* [PārameśvaraS 12.437cd]
[43.25] ekāyanīyaśākhoktiśrotṝṇāṃ prathamaṃ tataḥ* //{376}*" iti [PārameśvaraS 12.439ab]

div.p: !{365}!
