PauṣkaraS: kartavyatvena ye viṣṇuṃ saṃyajanti phalaṃ vinā; der erste Halbvers ist auch als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" zitiert in DHN[D] 48.18, ähnlich als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.1; der ganze Vers als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 24.7-8, 42.26-43.1 und 118.13-14. !{366}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 43.2 und 118.15. !{367}! DHN[T] 183: romaśaḥ. !{368}! MBh: khyātaṃ ca saindhavāraṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ dvijaniṣevitam; DHN[T] 183: khyātaṃ. !{369}! MBh: āśramaḥ priyaḥ. !{370}! MBh: kulyānām kuru darśanam. !{371}! MBh: etac candramasas tīrtham arpayanty ṛṣayas tathā; DHN[T] 184: arpayantsṛṣayas. !{372}! MBh: sarvāṃl lokān prapaśyāmi. !{373}! Vgl. die folgende Stelle mit JayākhyaS 22.78-80: [pavitrotsavānte kṛtasya yatyādibhyo dānasya phalādhikyakathanam]: pañca vaikhānasāntāś ca yatipūrvāś ca nārada / āptādipañcabhedena catvāro brāhmaṇādayaḥ // pañca yogaratādyās tu śāstrasandhārakāntimāḥ <śāstrasaṃdhārakāntimāḥ> / asaṃkhyaṃ yataye dattaṃ vaiṣṇavāya prakīrtim <prakīrtitam> // viddhi koṭiguṇañ <koṭiguṇaṃ> caiva dattam ekāntine tu yat / tasmād daśaśatāṃśonaṃ dattaṃ yac chikhine tu vai //. !{374}! PārameśvaraS: yatipūrvāṃs tathaiva ca. !{375}! PārameśvaraS: pañcavaikhānasasāntāṃś ca tathānyān vaiṣṇavān dvija. !{376}! PārameśvaraS: ekāyanīyaśākhottha mantrānāṃ prathamaṃ tataḥ.

lg.l: [44.1] nāradīye: "sāttvike tu sadādhikyaṃ pūjanaṃ mama nārada /
[44.2] viddhi vaikhānase dattaṃ dānaṃ brahmavidas tathā //"*{377}* [NāradaP]
[44.5] pūjayāmāsa dharmātmā rāmo vaikhānasān munīn //" iti [Vāsiṣṭharāmāyaṇa]

div.l: [44.6] vaikhānasānām pañcakālaparāyaṇatvam

lg.l: [44.9] ijyāmadhye tathā home yoge ca japakarmaṇi /
[44.12] sakāmās tatphalaṃ yānti niṣkāmāḥ paramaṃ padam // [Śāṇḍilyasmṛti]
[44.14] mām arcayanti madbhaktās tebhyo dattam ihākṣayam // [Śāṇḍilyasmṛti.]
[44.20] vyomāgnimarutaś cāpo varṇānāṃ tattvam īritam* //{379}*" ity uktāni. [PādmaS caryāpāda 24.19]

div.l: [44.21] caturvyūhavibhāgavit iti
[44.22] "puruṣañ ca tatas satyam acyutañ ca yudhiṣṭhira / [MBh 14, App. 4.1659]
[44.23] aniruddhañ ca māṃ prāhur vaikhānasavido janāḥ* //{380}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1660]
[44.24] anye tv evaṃ vijānanti māṃ rājan pāñcarātrikāḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.1661]
[44.25] vāsudevañ ca rājendra saṅkarṣaṇam athāpi vā* //{381}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1662]

div.p: !{377}! Vgl. JayākhyaS 22.81: sātvatāya śatāṃśonaṃ daśāṃśonaṃ tu nārada / viddhi vaikhānase dattaṃ dānaṃ pratisarāvadhau. !{378}! Vgl. PR 2, S. 52: dvādaśākṣaratattvajñaś caturvyūhavibhāgavit / achidrapañcakālajñaḥ sa tu bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ //. Vedānta Deśika gibt keine Quelle für diesen Vers an, zitiert aber im Anschluß "Śāṇḍilya" mit dem folgenden Vers: caturvyūhavibhāgajñaḥ pañcakālaparāyaṇaḥ / dvādaśākṣaraniṣṭho yaḥ sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ. !{379}! PādmaS: vyomāgnimarutaś cāpi. !{380}! Dieser Halbvers ist ähnlich in DHN[D] 23.22 zitiert. !{381}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 23.23-24 zitiert.

div.l: [45.1] pradyumnañ cāniruddhañ ca*{382}* caturmūrtiṃ pracakṣate / [MBh 14, App. 4.1663]
[45.2] etāś cānyāś ca rājendra saṃjñābhedena mūrtayaḥ* //{383}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1664]
[45.3] viddhi me 'rcāntarāṇy eva mām evañ cārcayed budhaḥ //"*{384}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1665]
[45.4] ityādy uktānāṃ caturṇāṃ vyūhānāṃ vibhāgāvit.
[45.5] evaṃ vaikhānase daivikamānuṣabhedena vāsudevo dvividhaḥ pratipādyate. yathā -

lg.l: [45.6-8] khile: "athordhvaṃ vāsudevasya mānuṣasya vidhiṃ paraṃ". ity ārabhya "mānuṣyavapuṣaṃ devaṃ dvibhujaṃ śaṅkhacakriṇam" ityādinā rukmiṇīpradyumnāniruddhasāmbabrahmagaruḍādiyutaṃ mānuṣavāsudevaṃ nirvarṇya punaḥ:
[45.15] ubhe devyāv ubhe pārśve pūrvavat kārayed budhaḥ /
[45.17] tattad devībis hier tnoch telugu vergleichensamāyuktaṃ vinā vā samyag ācaret /
[45.19] raktaṃ nīlaṃ tathā śyāmaṃ pītavarṇaṃ samācaret /
[45.21] evaṃ puṣpadharaṃ kuryād ekañ caiva prasāritam /
[45.22] devyā yuktaṃ vinā vāpi dvimārgaṃ samyag ācaret //"

div.l: [45.23-24] ity ārabhya "evaṃ daivikamārgan tu sthāpanārambham ācared" ityādinā daivikaḥ vāsudevaḥ*{386}* pradarśitaḥ.

div.p: !{382}! S.a. MBh 16.4.43c. !{383}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 24.1-2 zitiert. !{384}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 24.3-4 zitiert; MBh: viddhy anarthāntarā eva. !{385}! DHN[T] 188: kirīṭamakuṭair yuktās. !{386}! DHN[T] 188: daivikamānuṣabhedaḥ statt daivikaḥ vāsudevaḥ.

lg.l: [46.1-5] itthaṃ vāsudevādīnāṃ daivikamānuṣabhedena dvaividhyasya, "puruṣaṃ paramapuruṣaṃ paramātmānaṃ paraṃ brahmāṇam" ityādinā pratipāditānāṃ caturṇāṃ puruṣādīnāṃ mūrtivibhāgasya ca śrīvaikhānasaśāstre pratipādanāt, etas sarvavibhāgajña eva caturvyūhavibhāgavid ity anenocyate. ācchidrapañcakālajña iti:*{387}*

div.l: [46.9] iti vāsādhikāre pratipāditapañcakālaparāyaṇam adhikṛtya prakṛttāni*{388}* -

[46.10-14] "ye pāvayanti dharaṇīṃ" "ijyāmadhye tathāhome" "ye toṣayanty avirataṃ" iti vacanāni, sāmanyena pañcakālaparāyaṇasya darśanasparśanādibhis sarveṣāṃ pāvanatāṃ kṛtārthatāṃ, ijyāyogādisamayeṣu cāgatasya tasya pūjanāntaraṃ śeṣakarmācaraṇañ ca pratipādayanti, etādṛśaḥ pañcakālaparāyaṇaḥ kīdṛśā ity ākaṅkṣāyāṃ "dvādaśākṣaratattvajña" ityādinā "acchidrapañcakālajña" ity antena tallakṣaṇam ucyate.

[46.15-17] īdṛśācchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇā vaikhānasā eva. vaikhānasaśāstra eva pañcakālavibhāgasya pratipāditatvāt. svasvasūtre 'nuktatvād āpastambīyādayas tu na. pañcakālapratipādanarahitasūtrāntaraniṣṭhānāṃ:*{389}*
[46.18] "brāhme muhūrte buddhyeta dharmārthāv anucintayan* /{390}*" ity ārabhya
[46.19] "dvitīye ca tathā bhāge vedābhyāso vidhīyate //

lg.l: [46.21] bhāge caturthe kurvīta snānam ambhasy akṛtrime //
[46.22] pañcame tu tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārhataḥ /
[46.24] aṣṭame lokayātrāñ ca vicārya ca gṛhī tataḥ //"

div.p: !{387}! DHN[T] 188-189 statt DHN[D] 46.1-5: itthaṃ vāsudevādīnāṃ vyūhabhūtāṇāṃ daivikamānuṣabhedena vyūhacaturmūrtipratipādanāt "puruṣaṃ paramapuruṣaṃ paramātmānaṃ paraṃ brahmāṇam" ityādinā caturṇāṃ puruṣādīnāṃ mūrtivibhāgasya ca śrīvaikhānasaśāstre pratipāditatvāt. "acchidrapañcakālajñaḥ". !{388}! DHN[T] 189 statt DHN[D] 46.9 iti vāsādhikāre pratipāditvāt. !{389}! DHN[T] 189-190 statt DHN[D] 46.10-17: "ye pāvayanti dharaṇīṃ" "ijyāmadhye viśeṣataḥ" "ye toṣayanty avirataṃ" pañcakālaparāyaṇān iti sāmānyena pañcakālaparāyaṇasya darśanasparśanādibhis sarveṣāṃ pāvanatāṃ kṛtārthatāṃ, coktvā ijyāyogādisamayeṣu cāgataṃ pañcakālajñaṃ saṃpujyānantaraṃ śeṣakarmācaraṇam uktvā etad guṇaviśiṣṭāḥ ka ity ākaṅkṣāyāṃ aviratapañcakālaparāyaṇā ity anenācchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇā? evety uktaṃ. acchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇa vaikhānasā eva. svaśāstre pratipāditatvāt. svasvasūtreṣv anuktatvād āpastambādīnām tu na. !{390}! Diese Verszeile ist als "Manu" (ManuDhŚ 4.92ab) zitiert in TPC 14.16-17.

div.l: [47.1-2] ity antena dakṣādismṛtyantareṣu brāhmaṇajāteḥ sāmānyena tattatkāleṣu kartavyatvena pratipāditakarmācaraṇa eva yathāyogyaṃ yogyatāsambhavāt.*{391}*

lg.l: [47.4] "vidharmaḥ paradharmaś ca ābhāsa upa vā cchalaḥ*{392}* /
[47.8] yas tv icchayā kṛtaṃ pumbhir ābhāso hy āśramād bahiḥ //".

div.l: [47.12] iti bhagavadvacanavirodhaś ca.*{396}*

[47.13-19] kiñca tatsūtreṣu dvādaśākṣaratattvādipratipādanam api nāsti. evaṃ "sati kuḍye citrakarme"ti nyāyena yajñopavītadhāraṇasandhyopāsanabhagavadārādhanādividhipratipādanarahitasūtrāntaraniṣṭhānāṃ, tathā śrīmannārāyaṇasya samānatvena rudrādidevatāntarārādhanavidhipratipādakasūtraniṣṭhānāñ ca caturvyūhavibhāgajñānāsambhavāt bhagavadārādhanasvarūpajñānābhāvena pañcakālaparāyaṇatvādigandhaleśo 'pi na sambhavati. sūtrāntaroktamārgeṇa vā pañcarātroktamārgeṇa vā bhagavadārādhanaṃ kurvato 'nadhikāriṇo devalakatvaṃ pratipādyate.*{397}*

lg.l: [47.20] tathā hi - pañcarātre viṣvaksenasaṃhitāyāṃ nāradaṃ prati viṣvaksenoktiḥ:
[47.21] "idan tu tava vakṣyāmi guhyād guhyatamaṃ mune /
[47.22] yo 'sau nārayaṇas*{398}* sākṣāt sa hi vighneśa ucyate* //{399}* [ViṣvaksenaS 10.114]

div.l: [47.23] yo vai vighneśa ity uktas sa vai nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // [Viṣvaksena.S 10.115ab]
[47.24] naiva bhedaṃ vijānanti munayas tattvadarśinaḥ* //{400}*" ity ārabhya [ViṣvaksenaS 10.116ab]

div.p: !{391}! DHN[T] 191 statt DHN[D] 47.1-2: ity pañcakālapratipādanarahita sūtrāntaraniṣṭhānāṃ brāhmaṇajāti sāmānyatvena dakṣādismṛtyantareṣu yathāyogyaṃ kālāntareṣu pratipāditakarmācaraṇa yogyatāsaṃbhavāt. !{392}! DHN[T] 191: upamāccalaḥ. !{393}! DHN[T] 191: pāṣaṇḍaḥ dambhovāśaṃsurbhiścalaḥ. !{394}! DHN[T] 191: iti bhāgavatavacanena paradharmāśrayaṇadoṣaprasaṅgāt. !{395}! DHN[T] 192: bhayāvaha; dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 67.7-8 zitiert. !{396}! DHN[T] 192: bhagavadvacanavirodhāt. !{397}! DHN[T] 192-193 statt DHN[D] 47.13-19: kiñca sarvasūtreṣu dvādaśākṣaratattvādipratipādanābhāvāt evaṃ "sati kuḍye citrakarme"ti nyāyena yajñopavītadhāraṇasandhyopāsanabhagavadārādhanādividhipratipādanarahitasūtrāntaraniṣṭhānāṃ, caturvyūhavibhāgajñānāsambhavāt bhagavadārādhanasvarūpapratipādanābhāve pañcakālaparāyaṇatvādigandhaleśāsaṃbhavāt. bhagavatā śrīmannārāyaṇena samānatvena rudrādidevatāntarārādhanavidhipratipādakasūtraniṣṭhasya pañcakālaparāyanatvāsaṃbhavāt sūtrāntaroktamārgeṇa vā pañcarātroktamārgeṇa vā bhagavadārādhanaṃ kurvato 'nadhikāriṇaḥ devalakatva pratipādanāt. !{398}! Lies: nārāyaṇas. !{399}! ViṣvaksenaS: idaṃ tu tava vakṣyāmi guhyād guhyataraṃ mune. !{400}! ViṣvaksenaS: naiva jānanti tadbhedaṃ munayas tatvadarśinaḥ.

div.l: [48.1] "kuryāt pāśāṅkuśau vāpi śaṅkhacakrāv athāpi vā* /{401}*
[48.2] ākhuṃ vāpi khagendraṃ vā tasya vāhanam ācaret* //{402}* [ViṣvaksenaS ]
[48.3] nārāyaṇāśakatvāc cāvyāvṛttatvān mahāmune* /{403}*
[48.4] vīśas tadvāhanaṃ proktaṃ ākhuṃ vāpi samācaret // [Viṣvaksena.S ]

lg.l: [48.5] tasmāc chriyañ ca durgāñ ca vāṇīṃ vighneśam eva ca /
[48.6] svatantreṇārcayed dhīmān sarvakāryārthasiddhaye //" ityādi ca dṛśyate. [ViṣvaksenaS ]

div.l: [48.7-10] devatāntarāṇāṃ aṅgabhāvenārcanaṃ na niṣiddhyate. "svatantrabuddhyā kurvan vai brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajet" ityādi vacanaiḥ aṅgatvena vinā svātantryeṇāṅgivyatiriktadevatāntarārādhanaṃ niṣiddhyate. tathāvidhaniṣiddhadevatāntarārcanapratipādakaśāstraniṣṭhasya pañcakālaparāyaṇatvaṃ na sambhavati.*{404}*

lg.l: [48.12] nūnaṃ tatra mato devo yathā tair vāgudīritaḥ //" ity uktarītyā

[48.13-15] paramaikāntitvāsambhave tad(pañcakālaparāyaṇatvā)sambhavāt. paramaikāntitvañ ca bhagavadekaparatvam eva. tac ca svātantryeṇānyadevatāyājināṃ vaikhānasavyatiriktānāṃ hi na sambhavati.*{405}*
[48.16-17] atra "yair iṣṭaḥ pañcakālajñair" ity anena pañcakālavyatiriktakālāntarapratipādakaśāstraniṣṭhānāṃ*{406}* vyavṛttiḥ. "ekāntibhir narair" ity anena
[48.18] "viprā vaikhānasākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvam ucyate* //{407}* [PauṣkaraS 36.260cd]

div.l: [48.19] ekāntinas susattvasthā dehāntaṃ nānyayājinaḥ* //{408}* [PauṣkaraS 36.261ab]

lg.l: [48.20-23] ityādi pauṣkarasaṃhitāvacanānusāreṇa*{409}* svātantryeṇa durgādidevatāntarārcanapratipādakapāñcarātraśāstraniṣṭhānāṃ*{410}* vyāvṛttiḥ. "nūnam atra mato deva" ity anena - "yatra vaikhānasā viprā yatra santi gavāṃ gaṇāḥ /
[48.24] yatra bilvāḥ palāśāś ca tatra sannihito hariḥ* //{411}*"

div.l: [48.25-26] ity asyārtho jñāpyate iti "yair iṣṭa" iti kṛtsnam api vacanaṃ vaikhānasaparam ity evāvagamyate.*{412}*

div.p: !{401}! DHN[T] 193: cakraśaṅkhāv; vgl. ViṣvaksenaS 11.294: evaṃ cakrādisaṃproktam aparaṃ cādhunā śṛṇu / dakṣiṇe paraśuṃ nyasya hy adhaḥ pāśāṅkuśaṃ nyaset. !{402}! Vgl. ViṣvaksenaS 11.297cd: ākhus tadvāhanaṃ proktaṃ garuḍaṃ vāgrataḥ smaret. !{403}! Vgl. ViṣvaksenaS 11.298ab: nārāyaṇāṃśakatvāc ca proktas tatra khageśvaraḥ /; DHN[T] 193: nārāyaṇāṃśakatvāc ca vyāvṛtatvān?. !{404}! DHN[T] 194 statt DHN[D] 48.6-10: iti tatra aṅgabhāvena devānāṃ arcanam na niṣiddhyate. "svatantrabuddhyā kurvan vai brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajet" ityādi vacanaiḥ aṅgatvena vinā svatantryeṇāṅgivyatiriktadevatāntarārādhanavidhipratipādakaśāstraniṣṭhasya pañcakālaparāyaṇatvābhavādidoṣasaṃbhavāt. !{405}! DHN[T] 194-195 statt DHN[D] 48.13-15: paramaikāntitvāsambhave pañcakālaparāyaṇatvāsambhavāt. (pañcakālasya) bhagavadekaparatvāc ca pañcakālasyācchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇatvaṃ śrīmadvaikhānasavyatiriktānāṃ na sambhavati. !{406}! DHN[T] 195: -kālāntarapratipādakaśāstraniṣṭānāṃ. !{407}! PauṣkaraS: viprā ekāyanākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvato 'cyute; dieser Halbvers ist als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" ähnlich zitiert in 24.6, 42.25, 48.18, 118.12, als "Purātantra" ähnlich in DHN[D] 36.24. !{408}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 43.1, 48.19, 118.13, als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.1. !{409}! DHN[T] 195: pauṣkarasaṃhitāvacanena (vaikhānasaparatvaṃ). !{410}! DHN[T] 195: durgādidevatāntarapratipādakapāñcarātraśāstraniṣṭhānāṃ. !{411}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Varāhapurāṇa" zitiert in DHN[D] 118.8-9 und als "Purāṇa" in DHN[D] 42.16-17. !{412}! DHN[T] 196: ity asyārtho jñāpitaḥ iti vākyatrayam api vaikhānasaparatvenāvagamyate.
[pāñcarātriṇām api pañcakālaparāyaṇatvam ity ākṣepaḥ parihāraś ca]
div.l: [49.2] brahmā: "pañcakālavidhijñānaprāśastyaṃ bhagavann iha* /{413}*
[49.3] kathitaṃ pañca ke kālā vidhayaś cāpi pañca ke* //{414}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.1]

lg.l: [49.5] na ced rahasyam atyantaṃ yad ahaṃ pṛṣṭavān iha* //{415}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.2]

div.l: [49.6] śrībhagavān:

lg.l: [49.8] ijyā tapaś ca svādhyāyas tathā yogaḥ prakīrtitaḥ* //{417}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.3]
[49.9] pañcaite vidhayas teṣāṃ kālāḥ pañcaiva te kramāt /
[49.12] brāhme muhūrte buddhyeta dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ param // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.5]
[49.14] krameṇa sṛṣṭvā tattvāni deham utpādya tattvavit // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.6]

div.l: [49.15] svasya*{418}* dehe ṣaḍaṅgāni mantram uccārya mānasam //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.7]
[49.16] ityādinā abhigamanam upakramya
[49.17] "añjanālepanais sragbhiḥ vāsobhir bhūṣaṇais tathā // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.29ab]

lg.l: [49.19] upeto maṅgalair anyair nayed abhigamakriyām //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.30]

div.l: [49.20] ity abhigamanam uktā

lg.l: [49.22] puṣpāṇi phalamūlāni vividhāny oṣadhīr api // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.31]
[49.23] dadhyādi ca haviryogyaṃ taṇḍulādi guḍādi ca*{421}* /
[49.24] snānīyāni ca vastrāṇi svādūni salilāni ca // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.32]

div.p: !{413}! PādmaS: pañcakālavidhijñānaṃ praśastaṃ bhagavann iha. !{414}! PādmaS: vihitaṃ (kathitaṃ v.l.) pañca ke kāle. !{415}! PādmaS: idam statt iha. !{416}! PādmaS: ataḥ. !{417}! PādmaS: ijyā ca paścāt svādhyāyas tato yogas tataḥ paraṃ; DHN[T] 196: ijyā ca paścāt svādhyāyas tato. !{418}! PādmaS: nyasya. !{419}! PādmaS: tāmbūlamukhaśodhanaiḥ. !{420}! PādmaS: yathāvidhi. !{421}! PādmaS: taṇḍulāni gulāni ca.

lg.l: [50.2] āhṛtya yājñiyān daivān pūjāsthāne niveśayet* //{422}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.33]

div.l: [50.3] nītvopādānasamayam itthaṃ tad anupūjayet /"
[50.4] ity upādānam uktam.
[50.5] "prāpte madhyāhnasamaye snānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.34]
[50.6] ity ārabhya
[50.7] "uttīrya karma nikhilaṃ madhyāhnasamayocitam / [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.41cd]
[50.8] kṛtvā yajeta deveśaṃ homāntaṃ kamalāsana // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.42ab]
[50.9] ijyāyās samayas tasyāḥ kathitaḥ kamalāsana //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.66ab]
[50.10] iti bhagavadyajanam uktvā
[50.11] "mandire vā harer nadyās tīre vāmarabhūmiṣu*{423}* // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.66cd]

lg.l: [50.12] vivikte vipine vāpi parvate vā gṛhe 'pi vā /
[50.13] ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni vidyamānāny anekadhā* //{424}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.67]

div.l: [50.16] svādhyāyam uktvā
[50.17] "tataḥ paścimasandhyāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ tatra coditam // [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.72cd]

lg.l: [50.21] ācamya prayato bhūtvā dhyātvā paramapūruṣam // [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.74]
[50.25] ātmānañ cāpi hṛtpadme paramātmani niṣṭhite // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.76]

div.p: !{422}! PādmaS: āhṛtya yājñikāryair vā. !{423}! PādmaS: tīre vā maṭhabhūmiṣu. !{424}! PādmaS: bhidyamānāny anekadhā; so auch DHN[T] 198. !{425}! PādmaS: ekāyanasamāśrayām. !{426}! PādmaS: bhuktvā saṃviśya śayane. !{427}! PādmaS: sukhāsīno yuñjītātmānamātmani. !{428}! Lies: saṃhārakramam.

lg.l: [51.1] saṃhared itthato*{429}* yogāt svāpaṃ kleśāpahaṃ vrajet /
[51.2] ity eṣa kathito brahman yogaḥ kālaś ca pañcamaḥ // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.77]
[51.4] ittham eteṣu kāleṣu darśitaiḥ karmabhir naraḥ // [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.78]
[51.6] varṣeṣu dvādaśasu*{431}* evam anutiṣṭhan samāhitaḥ // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 13.79]
[51.8] ṣaṭsu varṣeṣu sārūpyaṃ sāmīpyaṃ triṣu niścitam* //{432}* [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.80]

div.l: [51.9] sālokyaṃ phalam ekasmin vatsare nātra saṃśayaḥ //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 13.81ab]
[51.10-11] iti pādme caryāpāde trayodaśe 'dhyāye avicchinnatayā pañcakālānāṃ*{433}* pratipāditatvāt teṣām apy acchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇatvaṃ sambhavatīti cet*{434}* - tad asat.
[51.15] eteṣu hīnāḥ pratyūṣaṃ*{437}* (?) vijñeyāś caturānana //"

[51.16-20] ity abhigamanādīnām ekarūpeṇa vinā nyūnātiriktakālatvenoktatvāt "kālaṃ madhyandinacchidra*{438}*pañcakālaparāyaṇair" ity āgamasiddhānte "sāntarālam anuṣṭhānaṃ pañcakāloditaṃ tathā" iti tantrasiddhānte ca chidrapañcakālaparatvasyoktatvāt*{439}*, kālacatuṣṭayapratipādanena niyatapañcakālaparāyaṇatvābhāvāt, dvādaśavarṣam ārabhya ekavarṣaparyantaṃ parimitapañcakālaparatvasyoktatvāt*{440}* dvādaśavarṣād ūrdhvaṃ pañcakālaparatvābhāvāc ca.*{441}*

lg.l: [51.23] tasyāṃ snānaṃ na kurvīta samyag ācamanaṃ tathā //" [MarkaṇḍeyaP]

div.p: !{429}! PādmaS: utthito; so auch DHN[T] 199. !{430}! PādmaS: pañcaite hi mayā pañcavidhayas. !{431}! PādmaS: dvādaśasv; so auch DHN[T] 199 !{432}! PādmaS: sārūpya sāmīpyādiṣu niścitam. !{433}! DHN[T] 199: vicchedarahitatvena (pañcakālānāṃ). !{434}! DHN[T] 199 ins. (satyam). !{435}! Lies: pratyūṣam. !{436}! DHN[T] 199: prātarmandhyaṃ. !{437}! Lies: pradoṣa? !{438}! DHN[T] 200: kālamadhyandinacchidraṃ. !{439}! DHN[T] 200: cchidrapañcakālaparatvenoktatvāt. !{440}! DHN[T] 200: parimitapañcakālaparatvenoktatvāt. !{441}! DHN[T] 200: pañcakālaparatvābhāvāt. !{442}! DHN[T] 201: madhyadvitīyayoḥ (?).

div.l: [52.1] ity ācamanasya mahāniśāyāṃ niṣedhāt.*{443}*
[52.2] "yāmadvayaṃ śayānas tu brahmabhūyāya kalpate //"
[52.3-4] iti dharmaśāstroktanidrākāle yogasyāyuktatvāc ca. yogakālasyārdharātrikatve svādhyāyakālād vyavahitatvena chidrapāñcakālikatvāpātāc ca.*{444}*
[52.5-6] kālacatuṣtvāsyaivoktatvena abhigamanādiṣv ekasya lopasambhavena aniyatapañcakālaparasya pañcakālaparāyaṇaśabdābhilāpāsambhavāc ca.*{445}*

lg.l: [52.9] aṅgāni samatāṃ yānti uttamāny adhamais saha* //{446}*"

div.l: [52.10] iti dharmaśāstreṣu prātar ārabhya sāyaṅkālaparyantam eva karmācaraṇakālatvena pratipādanāt.

lg.l: [52.13] sravaty eva divārātraṃ prātas snānaṃ viśodhanam //
[52.15] snātvādhikārī bhavati daive pitrye ca karmaṇi //"

div.l: [52.16-20] iti smṛteḥ snānāt pūrvaṃ tattvasṛṣṭer ayuktatvāc ca. pretaprāyasya saṃhṛtatattvasya svāpayogyatāsambhavāc ca. tasmāt "abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa" ityādiśabdavadavadhāraṇagarbhasya pāñcakālikaśabdasya aniyataparimitapāñcakālikeṣu pāñcarātrikeṣu prayogāsaṃbhavād aniyataparimitachidrapāñcakālikāḥ pāñcarātriṇo na niyatāchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇavaikhānasatulyā bhavitum ahantīti*{448}* siddham.*{449}*

[52.24-53.2] iti devatāpūjakasya devalakatvaṃ sambhavatīti cet - tad asat. sāmānyataḥ devatārādhanaṃ ye kurvanti te devalakā iti vā? uta śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇādiṣu mukhyādhikāritvena pratipāditā apīti vā?. sāmānyataḥ devatārādhanaṃ ye kurvanti te iti cet - tarhi gṛhadevatāpūjakānām api devalakatvaprasaṅgaḥ. kiñca:*{451}*

div.p: !{443}! DHN[T] 201 om. ācamanasya mahāniśāyāṃ niṣedhāt. !{444}! DHN[T] 201: yogasyāyuktatvāt. yogakālasya vyavahitatvāt tatrāpi chidrapāñcakālikatvāt. !{445}! DHN[T] 201 statt DHN[D] 52.5-6: kālacatuṣṭaye 'bhigamanādiṣv ekasya lopasambhavād aniyamitacchidrapañcakālaparasya pāñcakālikasya parāyaṇaśabdā(bhilāpā)sambhavāt. !{446}! DHN[T] 201 führt diesen Vers erst einige Sätze später an (s.u.). !{447}! DHN[T] 201: sāyaṅkālaparyantānām eva (kālānāṃ) ācaraṇakālatvena pratitatvāt. (yathā): hier wird der Śloka, der mit kliśyantīha beginnt, in DHN[T] 201 angeführt. !{448}! Lies: arhantīti. !{449}! DHN[T] 202 statt DHN[D] 52.16-20: ti snānāt pūrvaṃ tattvasṛṣṭer ayuktatvāt. pretaprāyasya saṃhṛtatattvasya svāpayogyatāsambhavāt. "abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣa" ityādi śabdāvadavadhāraṇagarbhasya pāñcakālika(pañcakāla)śabdasya ... aniyamitaparimita pāñcakālikeṣu pāñcarātrikeṣu saṃbhavayogyatābhāvāc cāniyataparimitaviṣam acchidrapāñcakālikāḥ pāñcarātriṇo niyatāchidrapañcakālaparāyaṇo vaikhānaso iti (ca) siddham. !{450}! DHN[T] 234: havyakavyabahiṣkṛta; Kane, HD 2.1, S. 109, Anm. 232, gibt an, daß dies ein Zitat von Devala in Smṛticandrikā II (S. 396) und bei Aparārka (S. 450 und 923) sei. Dort liest er allerdings: devārcanaparo vipro vittārthī vatsaratrayam / asau devalako nāma havyakavyeṣu garhitaḥ //. Vgl. Colas, 1996, S. 135, Anm. 2. Dieser Vers wird im Text Devalakanirṇaya einem Gautama zugeschrieben. !{451}! DHN[T] 234 statt DHN[D] 52.24-53.2: iti devatāpūjakasya devalakatvaṃ sambhavatīti cet - tad asat. sāmānyatvena devatārādhanaṃ ye kurvanti te devalako iti vā? uta śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇādiṣu mukhyādhikāritvena pratipāditāḥ. sāmānyatvena kurvantīti cet - tarhi gṛhadevatāpūjakānām api devalakatvaprasaṅgaḥ. kiñca.

div.l: [53.3] "brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vipro vaikhānasas tathā* /{452}*
[53.4] kurvanti*{453}* nijakarmāṇi viṣṇum eva yajanti te //"

[53.5-11] iti sandhyopāsanādīnāṃ bhagavadārādhanarūpatvoktyā*{454}* teṣāñ ca tyāgas sambhavati. atas sāmānyataḥ iti*{455}* vaktum ayuktam. śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu*{456}* mukhyādhikāritvena pratipāditā devalakāḥ*{457}* iti cet - tad asat. "'agnir vai devānām avamo viṣṇuḥ paramas tadantareṇa sarvā anyā devatā'; iti brāhmaṇam. tasmād gṛhe paramaṃ viṣṇuṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sāyaṃ prātar homānte 'rcayati" iti vaikhānasasūtre*{458}*, "pravaḥ pāntam andhaso dhiyāyate maheśūrāya viṣṇave cārcata"*{459}* iti ṛgbrāhmaṇam anusṛtya*{460}* viṣṇupradhānatayā "sa vā eṣa puruṣaḥ pañcadhā pañcātmā" ityādiśrutyuktaviṣṇvādipañcamūrtīnām*{461}* ārādhanasya pratipāditatvāt*{462}*.
[53.12-13] āśvamedhike "kathaṃ tvam arcanīyo 'sī"*{463}*tyādeḥ, vṛddhamanau "vedāntavedibhir"*{464}* ityādeś coktatvāt.
[53.14-15] evam eva pāñcarātraśaivaśilpajyautiṣādiṣu utkṛṣṭamukhyādhikāripratipādakānāṃ vacanānāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt tanmūlabhūtaśrutismṛtipurāṇādīnām aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgo duṣpariharaḥ.*{465}*
[53.16-17] evaṃ ca pramāṇabhūteṣu śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu pratipāditānām ācārādīnāṃ tyāgaḥ prasajyet, niṣphalatvāt. nanu paradravyoṇālayārcanaṃ*{466}* kurvatāṃ devalakatvam iti cet na.*{467}*
[53.18-19] śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu tattacchāstreṣu ca ālayārcakānāṃ*{468}* mukhyādhikāritvena taddravyopabhogārhatvena ca pratipādanāt.*{469}*

lg.l: [53.22] yad bhaved doṣa utpanna iti cintākulo 'smy aham* //{470}*" [ĀS 4.77]

div.l: [53.23] iti bhagavaddravyopajīvanadoṣabhīroḥ vikhanasaḥ*{471}* bhagavantaṃ prati praśne -
[53.24] "athovāca hṛṣīkeśo bhīruṃ taṃ munisattamaṃ* /{472}* [ĀS 4.78ab]
[53.25] vaikhānasānāṃ tad doṣo nāsti matkṛtakarmaṇām* //{473}* [ĀS 4.83ab]

div.p: !{452}! Dieser Halbvers ist ähnlich in DHN[D] 21.2 zitiert. !{453}! DHN[T] 235: kurvanto. !{454}! DHN[T] 235: bhagavadārādhanarūpatvāt. !{455}! DHN[T] 235: sāmānyatveneti. !{456}! DHN[T] 235: śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇādiṣu. !{457}! DHN[T] 235 om. devalakāḥ. !{458}! DHN[T] 235 om. vaikhānasasūtre. Bezug auf VaikhSmS 4.10, darin ist AitareyaBr 1.1.1 als "Brāhmaṇaṃ" zitiert. !{459}! Bezug auf ṚV 1.155.1.1{25}. !{460}! DHN[T] 235: ṛgbrāhmaṇānusāreṇa sūtre. !{461}! Lies: ityādiśrutyuktaviṣṇvādipañcamūrtīnām. !{462}! DHN[T] 235: śrutyanusāreṇa viṣṇvādipañcamūrtīnām ārādhanaṃ pratipāditaṃ statt ityādi śrutyaktaviṣṇvādipañcamūrtīnām ārādhanasya pratipāditatvāt. !{463}! MBh App. 4.1652a; auch zitiert in DHN[D] 23.15. !{464}! Bezug auf den in DHN[D] 23.12-13 zitierten Vers. !{465}! DHN[T] 236 statt DHN[D] 53.14-15: evam eva pañcarātraśaivaśilpajyotiṣādiṣu mukhyādhikāritvena utkṛṣṭatvena ca pratipādita?vacanānāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt tanmūlabhūtaśrutismṛtipurāṇādīnām aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgo duṣpariharaḥ. !{466}! Lies: paradravyeṇālayārcanaṃ. !{467}! DHN[T] 236 statt DHN[D] 53.16-17: kiṃ ca, apramāṇabhūteṣu śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu pratipāditānām ācārādīnāṃ tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ niṣphalatvāt. paradravyeṇālayārcanaṃ kurvatāṃ devalakatvam iti cen na. !{468}! DHN[T] 236 om. ālayārcakānāṃ. !{469}! DHN[T] 236: pratipāditaṃ. !{470}! ĀS: tavānujīvane caiva tvad dravyānubhavād api / utpatsyate doṣo iti bhṛśaṃ cintākulosmy ahaṃ; vgl. ĀS 16.43cd/44ab: sadā tvad anujīvitvāt tvaddravyānubhavād vibho // doṣābhaveyu.s sarveṣām iti cintākulo 'smy ahaṃ. !{471}! DHN[T] 237: bhagavaddravyadoṣabhīruṇā vikhanasā. !{472}! ĀS: ity ukto munisattamaṃ; DHN[T] 237: athovāca hṛṣīkeśa ity uktaṃ munisammataṃ. !{473}! ĀS: vaikhānasānāṃ tad doṣo nāsti matkṛtajanmanāṃ; vgl. ĀS 16.45cd: vaikhānasānāṃ tad doṣo nāsti matkṛtakarmaṇāṃ.

div.l: [54.1] maddravyaṃ havyakavyārthe dānābhyāgatapūjane / [ĀS 4.84cd]
[54.2] mukhyam evāstu bhavatāṃ sadā matkarma kurvatām // [Ā.S 4.85ab]
[54.3] kim ebhir bahubhir vākyair anyat te kathayāmy aham* //{474}* [ĀS 4.85cd]
[54.4] maddravyakṣetrabimbānām ālayānāṃ tathāpadi* /{475}*
[54.5] vikrīṇanādikāryeṣu nāsti doṣo madājñayā* //{476}* [ĀS 4.87]
[54.6] tasmād bhavān abhimatas sarvaṃ karma sadā kuru // [ĀS ]
[54.9] iti bhagavadvacanodāharaṇena bhagavaddravyopabhogādiṣu doṣābhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ.*{478}*

[54.10-14] atra "ahaṃ bhaktaparādhīno hy asvatantra iva dvija" ityādivacanānusāreṇārcakaparādhīnatāṃ darśayituṃ, bhagavatprītiviṣayīkṛtānāṃ vaikhānasānāṃ taddravyopabhogādiṣu doṣagandho nāstīti pratipādanāvasare "maddravyaṃ kṣetrabimbādī"tyādinā kaimutikanyāyam abhipretya bhagavadvigrahavikraye kṛte 'pi doṣo nāstīty ucyate. tāvatā na tad abhipretam.*{479}*
[54.15-16] nanv evam api devadravyopabhogadoṣas sāmānyataḥ mukhyāmukhyādhikāriṣu sarveṣv āpadyate eva iti cet na.*{480}*

lg.l: [54.18] bhakṣyante te 'pi tais sarvair iti brahmābravīt svayam* //{482}* [MBh 13.117.33]
[54.19] māṃ sa bhakṣayitām utra yasya māṃsam ihādmy aham /
[54.21] na hi māṃsaṃ tṛṇāt kaṣṭhād upalād vāpi jayate /
[54.22] hatvā jantuṃ bhaven māṃsaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet* //{484}* [MBh 13.116.26]
[54.23] hantā caivānumantā ca viśas tā krayavikrayī /
[54.24] saṃskartā copakartā ca khādakaś cāṣṭa ghātukāḥ* //{485}* [MBh 13.116.47]

div.p: !{474}! Vgl. ĀS 16.47ab: kiṃ ebhir bahubhir vākyais satyam eva vadāmy ahaṃ. !{475}! ĀS: maddravyaṃ kṣetrabimbādīn vālayāni yathāpadi; vgl. ĀS 16.49ab: maddravyaṃ kṣetrabiṃbāni ālayāni ? yathāpadi; DHN[T] 237: maddravyakṣetrabimbādisālayāni yathāpadi. !{476}! Vgl. ĀS 16.49cd: vikrīṇanādikāryeṣu nāsti doṣo mamājñayā; DHN[T] 237: yadājñayā. !{477}! Vgl. ĀS 16.50: madīyadhanabhogena matkriyālāpanena ca / maccharīratayā satyam apacāro na vidyate //. !{478}! DHN[T] 237: iti bhagavaddravyopabhogādiṣu doṣo bhāvamuktvā. !{479}! DHN[T] 237-8 statt DHN[D] 54.10-14: "ahaṃ bhaktaparādhīnā hy asvatantra iva dvije"tyādivacanānusāreṇārcakādhīnatāṃ darśayituṃ, bhagavatprītiviṣayākṛtānāṃ vaikhānasānāṃ taddravyopabhogādiṣu doṣagandhatāpi nāstīti jñāpayituṃ kaimutikanyāyābhiprāyeṇa maddravyaṃ kṣetrabiṃbādītyādinā bhagavadvigrahe vikraye kṛte 'pi doṣo nāstīty uktaṃ. !{480}! DHN[T] 238 statt DHN[D] 54.15-16: kiṃ ca devaddravyopabhogadoṣas sāmānyatvena sarveṣv āpādyate cet tarhi. !{481}! MBh: bhūtānāṃ. !{482}! MBh: bhūtair iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥ. !{483}! MBh: māṃ sa bhakṣayate yasmād bhakṣayiṣye tam apy aham / etan māṃsasya māṃsatvam ato budhyasva bhārata. !{484}! MBh: hatvā jantuṃ tato māṃsaṃ tasmād doṣo 'sya bhakṣaṇe. !{485}! MBh: āhartā cānumantā ca viśastā krayavikrayī / saṃskartā copabhoktā ca ghātakāḥ sarva eva te.

lg.l: [55.2] ghātuko vadhabandhābhyām ity eṣa trividho vadhaḥ* //{486}* [MBh 13.116.38]
[55.4] nāradaḥ prāha dharmātmā narake sa vipacyate* //{487}*" [MBh 13.117.10]

[55.5-6] ityādi vacanaiḥ māṃsabhakṣaṇena narakapatanasmaraṇāt bhagavatprītyarthaṃ kriyamāṇeṣu yajñeṣv api māṃsabhakṣaṇasattvāt yājñikānām*{488}* api narakapatanaṃ sambhavatīti yāgasyāpi tyāgaprasaṅgāt*{489}*.

div.l: [55.9-12] iti bhagavadvacanāt śāstroktānāṃ karmaṇāṃ doṣo nāstīti cet. "maddravyopabhogādau doṣo nāstī"ti bhagavatā pratipāditvāt prakṛte 'pi doṣo nāsty eva. "vacanāt pravṛttir vacanān nivṛttir" iti khalu śiṣṭoktiḥ. evaṃ kutracid dharmo 'dharmaḥ adharmaś ca dharmo bhavati.*{491}*

lg.l: [55.15] anṛtaṃ tatra satyaṃ syāt satyam atrānṛtaṃ bhavet //

div.l: [55.18-19] "yadbrāhmaṇaś cābrāhmaṇaś ca praśnam eyātāṃ brāhmaṇāyādhibrūyāt yadbrāhmaṇāyādhyātmane*{493}* 'dhyāha yad brāhmaṇaṃ parāhātmānaṃ parāha tasmād brāhmaṇo na parocyaḥ" ity śrutiś ca.

lg.l: [55.20-21] śrautasūtre ca: "sarva evam abhivādayanti nābhivādayati na juhoty anyatra somāṅgebhyaḥ" ityādi pratipādyate.*{494}*
[55.23] godvijārthe vivāde ca śapathe nāsti pātakam //"

div.l: [55.24] ityādi smṛtiś ca.*{495}*
[55.25] evaṃ ca śāstroktaprakāreṇa bhagavadarcanaṃ kurvatāṃ taddravyopabhoge*{496}* na doṣaḥ.

div.p: !{486}! MBh: ghātako. !{487}! MBh: svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsair yo vivardhayitum icchati / nāsti kṣudrataras tasmān na nṛśaṃsataro naraḥ. !{488}! DHN[T] 239: māṃsabhakṣaṇasaṃbhavāt statt māṃsabhakṣaṇasattvāt yājñikānām. !{489}! DHN[T] 239: yāgasya tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ. !{490}! DHN[T] 239: kāryākāryāvyavasthitau. !{491}! DHN[T] 239-240 statt DHN[D] 55.9-12: iti bhagavadvacanāt śāstroktānāṃ doṣo nāstīti cet. "maddravyopabhogādidoṣo nāstī"ti bhagavatā pratipāditvāt "vacanāt pravṛttir vacanān nivṛttir" iti vihitasya doṣo nāsty eva. kutracid dharmo 'dharmaḥ adharmaś ca dharmo bhavati. !{492}! DHN[T] 240: gatāṃ. !{493}! DHN[T] 240: yadbrāhmaṇāyādhyāhātmane. !{494}! DHN[T] 241 om. pratipādyate und ins. (adharmarūpāyā hiṃsāyā māṃsabhakṣaṇasya ca kratuṣu dharmatvaṃ mahāvrate brahmacāripuṃścalyos saṃparkādikaṃ). !{495}! DHN[T] 241 om. smṛtiś ca. !{496}! DHN[T] 241: taddravyopabhogān.

div.l: [56.1-2] kiñca - kiṃ devalakatvaṃ jātiparam, uta karmaparam? jātiparam iti vaktuṃ na śakyate. tathānuktatvāt*{497}*. icchayā kalpitum aśakyatvāc ca.*{498}*
[56.3-4] atha karmaparam iti cet. vihitakarmaparam, uta avihitakarmaparam?*{499}* vihitakarmaparam iti vaktum aśakyam - śrutismṛtītihāsasūtrapurāṇādīnām*{500}* apramāṇyaprasaṅgāt.

lg.l: [56.7] ājñāc chedī mama drohī madbhakto 'pi na vaiṣṇavaḥ* //{502}*"

div.l: [56.8] iti bhagavadājñābhaṅgadoṣāc ca. evaṃ ca avihitakarmaparam iti hi pariśiṣyate.*{503}*

lg.l: [56.9-10] nanu - paradravyeṇa kṛtaṃ bhagavadārādhanaṃ kratuvat parārtham eva bhavatīti cet maivam.*{504}*
[56.15] tuṣṭo dadāti svapadam aho vatsalatā*{506}* hareḥ //" iti.
[56.18] ṛtvijān tu tadardhaṃ syāt tadardham itarasya ca //"

div.l: [56.19] iti dakṣiṇādānaṃ pratipādyate.*{507}*
[56.20] nanu - "pratigraheṇa viprasya brāhmaṃ tejo vinaśyati* //{508}*" iti manuvacanāt*{509}* [ManuDhŚ 4.186cd]

[56.21-25] "pratigraheṇa tejo hi viprāṇāṃ śāmyate" ity ānuśāsanikavacanāc ca pratigraheṇa brahmatejonāśanaṃ smaryate. śrūyate pratigrahe prāyaścittam api. "yo yājayati prati vā gṛhṇāti yājayitvā pratigṛhya vānaśnaṃs tris svādhyāyam adhīyīta trirātraṃ sāvitrīṃ gāyatrīm anvatirecayati varo dakṣiṇā vareṇaiva varaṃ spṛṇoty ātmā hi varaḥ" iti.
[56.25] ataḥ pratigrahe doṣo 'stīti cet - na.*{510}*

div.p: !{497}! DHN[T] 242: anuktatvāt. !{498}! DHN[T] 242 ins. (jātiparam na bhavati). !{499}! DHN[T] 242: vihitakarmaparam (vā), utāvihitakarmaparam?. !{500}! DHN[T] 242: śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇādīnām. !{501}! DHN[T] 242: vihitakarmaparatvenānuktatvāt. !{502}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 65.13-14 zitiert. !{503}! DHN[T] 243: iti bhagavadājñābhaṅgadoṣāś ca. (tathā vaktum ayuktam). (avihitakarmaparam iti hi pariśiṣyate.) !{504}! DHN[T] 243: cen naivam. !{505}! DHN[T] 243 om. iti bhagavadvacanāt. !{506}! DHN[T] 244: vatsalitā. !{507}! DHN[T] 244: dakṣiṇādānapratipādanāt. !{508}! ManuDhŚ: pratigraheṇa hy asyāśu brāhmaṃ tejaḥ praśāmyati. !{509}! DHN[T] 244 om. manuvacanāt. !{510}! DHN[T] 244-245 statt DHN[D] 56.21-25: "pratigraheṇa tejo hi viprāṇāṃ śāmyate" na tu? ity ānuśāsanikavacanāc ca pratigraheṇa brahmatejonāśanaṃ, prāyaścittam api śrūyate. "yo yājayati prati vā gṛhṇāti yājayitvā pratigṛhya vānaśnaṃs tris svādhyāyam adhīyīta trirātrīṃ sāvitrīṃ gāyatrīm anvātirecayati varo dakṣiṇā vareṇaiva varaṃ spṛṇoty ātmā hi vara" iti. prāyaścittasmaraṇāc ca doṣāstīti cet.

lg.l: [57.2] api matkarma viguṇaṃ trāyate mahato bhayāt //
[57.4] keśavaṃ vaidyam āsādya ab hier noch Telugu vergleichendurvyādhir iva naśyati //
[57.5] nidhisthānaṃ khanan dveṣāt mṛdarthaṃ vāpnuyān nidhim /
[57.6] ajñaḥ kāmāc ca doṣāc ca smṛtvaivaṃ mokṣabhāktathā //
[57.8] katham abhyarcito viṣṇuḥ na dahet sarvakilbiṣam //
[57.9] yathājño vajrakāyas syāt spardhann api sudhāṃ piban /
[57.10] evaṃ viruddhabhāvo 'pi mucyaty eva hariṃ smaran //" iti
[57.11] nāradīye: "kṛtāpi dambhahāsyādyair yat sevā tārayej janān /
[57.17] saiṣā harismṛtiṛ daityaṃ krodhād api kṛtā satī /
[57.18] ānayet sadgatiṃ vipraṃ sānugaṃ kimu varṇyate // [NāradaP.]
[57.22] bhavanti siddhayo divyāḥ puṇya*{511}* puṇyānubandhi yat //" ityādi [NāradaP]
[57.24] sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt na tu duṣyet svayaṃ tataḥ //" [NāradaP]

div.l: [58.1-2] iti ca smaraṇāt. ataḥ śāstroktamārgeṇa bhagavadyajanavidhau pravṛttānāṃ tattatkarmasu dakṣiṇāpratigrahe kṛte 'pi na doṣaḥ.
[58.3] gṛhārcanāvyatirekeṇālayārcanā bhāratādiṣu pratipāditā dṛśyate. yathā -
[58.4] mahābhārate āśvamedhike "kathaṃ tvam arcanīyo 'sī"ty ādi. [MBh 14 App. 4.1652pr]

lg.l: [58.7] sa tu svargaṃ samāsadya vimānādhipatir bhavet // [Viṣṇudharmottara.P ]
[58.8] yas tu devālayasyāgre śilādārubhir eva vā /
[58.9] karoti toraṇaṃ ramyaṃ sa tu svargādhipo bhavet // [Viṣṇudharmottara.P ]
[58.10] yas tu devālayaṃ viṣṇor dāruśailamṛdā tathā /
[58.11] iṣṭakākalpitaṃ vāpi kuryāt tasya phalaṃ bahu // [Viṣṇudharmottara.P ]
[58.13] prāpnoti maṇḍapaṃ viṣṇoḥ yaḥ kārayati mānavaḥ // [Viṣṇudharmottara.P ]

div.l: [58.16] ṣaṣṭirvarṣasahasrāṇi svargaloke mahīyate //" iti. [ViṣṇudharmottaraP ]
[58.17-19] eteṣāṃ ca prākāratoraṇamaṇḍapavigrahaśilādīṇāṃ gṛhadevatāsvasaṃbhavaḥ śrīvaikhānasasaṃhitāsu pratipāditaḥ. prasaṅgād arcakamahimādīha kathyate.
[58.20] bṛhannāradīye: "sa kadācin mahāpāpo jantūnāmantakopamaḥ //" [BṛhannāradaP]

lg.l: [58.23] chāditaṃ hemakavacaiḥ dṛṣṭvā vyādho mudā yayau // [BṛhannāradaP]
[58.24] harāmy atra suvarṇāni bahūnīti sa niścitaḥ /

div.l: [59.5] devasya dravyajātan tu samādātumanā niśi //" [BṛhannāradaP]
[59.6-7] ityādināpṛthagālayārcakasadbhāvādikaṃ uktvā svakāryāntarāya bhūtārcakahiṃsāyāṃ pravṛttasya tasya maraṇam api pratipādya.
[59.12] iti bhagavatpādodakamāhātmyaṃ ca pratipāditam.
[59.13] tatraiva - yajñadhvajavītihotrasaṃvāde:

lg.l: [59.15] śūnyaṃ pūjādibhir viṣṇor mandiraṃ prāptavān niśi //
[59.19] tāvaj janmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tadaiva kṣayam āgatam //
[59.21] tenāpi tasya duṣkarma niśśeṣaṃ kṣayam āgatam //
[59.23] bhaktimadbhiḥ praśāntaiś ca kiṃ punas samyagarcanāt //
[60.9] jagraha māṃ svavaktreṇa śvabhir anyair abhidrutaḥ //
[60.12] mama cāpi śunaś cāpi dattavān paramaṃ padam /
[60.13] pradakṣiṇākāratabis hier noch Telugu vergleichenyā gatasya sadṛśaṃ phalam //
[60.14] samprāptaṃ tu mayā śakra*{512}* kiṃ punas samyag arcanāt /
[60.16] tān arcayanti vibudhā brahmādyā devatāgaṇāḥ //"*{513}* iti

div.l: [60.17] evam āśvamedhike: "loke trīṇy apavitrāṇi pañcāmedhyāni bhārata / [MBh 13, App. 4.3249]
[60.18] śvā ca śūdraś śvapākaś ca tryapavitrāṇi pāṇḍava* /{514}* [MBh 13, App. 4.3250]
[60.19] devalaḥ kukkuṭo yūpaḥ udakyā vṛṣalīpatiḥ //" [MBh 13, App. 4.3251]
[60.20] pañcamedhyāni*{515}* iti.
[60.23] pāparogayutāś caiva tathaiva gurunindakā /
[60.24] arcanaṃ devadevasya havirdānañ ca vīkṣitum /

div.p: !{512}! DHN[T] 253: samprāptaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha. !{513}! Ähnlich zitiert als "Bṛhannāradīyapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 119.3-4. !{514}! MBh: śvā ca śūdraś śvapākaś cety apavitrāṇi pāṇḍava. !{515}! DHN[T] 253 om. pañcamedhyāni.

div.l: [61.1] nārhanti tasmāt kurvīta dvāraṃ yavanikāvṛtam //"
[61.2-3] iti pratipādanāt bhagavadarcanadarśanādiṣu yogyatārahitānāṃ nikṛṣṭānāṃ (devalakānāṃ) autkṛṣṭyaṃ na sambhavati.*{516}*

lg.l: [61.4-6] śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣūktaprakāreṇa kalpasūtre*{517}* yeṣām advārakabhagavadyajanādhikāro vidhīyate te utkṛṣṭā jñeyāḥ*{518}*. yathā śrutiḥ: "yathā kratur asmin loke bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati"*{519}* iti.
[61.8] mām arcayanti ye bhaktās*{522}* sāyujyaṃ yānti te mama //
[61.9] tasmād yāvaj jano jīvet tāvat sampūjayed dharim /
[61.10] pāpair na lipyate martyo*{523}* harimandiram āpnuyāt //
[61.11] jagat pavitrās te nityaṃ viṣṇum abhyarcayanti ye /
[61.12] durvṛttā vā suvṛttā vā pūjanīyā viśeṣataḥ //"

div.l: [61.13-16] vyāsenapi*{524}* ānuśāsanike (90. adhyāye) pātrakathanāvasare*{525}* devalakānām apātratāṃ satkarmaniṣṭhānāṃ pātratāñ ca pratipādya svavacanadṛḍhīkaraṇārthaṃ "vaikhānasā vā ṛṣaya indrasya priyā āsan"*{526}* iti bhagavatprītiviṣayāṇāṃ*{527}* vaikhānasānāṃ vacanam api śrūyate iti pratipāditam. yathā:
[61.17] *{528}*"ṛṣīṇāṃ samayaṃ nityaṃ ye rakṣanti yudhiṣṭhira* /{529}*
[61.18] niścitāḥ sarvadharmajñās tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ // [MB.h 13.9.42]

lg.l: [61.20] taponiṣṭhāś ca boddhavyāḥ karmaniṣṭhāś ca bhārata // [MBh 13.9.43]
[61.22] tatra ye brāhmaṇān ke cin na ca nindanti te varāḥ* //{531}* [MBh 13.9.44]
[61.23] ye tu nindanti jalpeṣu na tāñ śrāddheṣu bhojayet /
[61.24] brāhmaṇā ninditā rājan hanyus tripuruṣaṃ kulam* //{532}* [MBh 13.9.45]

div.p: !{516}! DHN[T] 254 statt DHN[D] 61.2-3: (iti) bhagavaddarśanādiṣu yogyatārahitānāṃ nikṛṣṭānāṃ utkṛṣṭatvādikaṃ na sambhavati. bhagavadarcakānām autkṛṣṭyaṃ. !{517}! DHN[T] 254: sūtrādiṣu. !{518}! DHN[T] 254: te utkṛṣṭāḥ. !{519}! Vgl. ŚatapathaBr 10.6.3.[1]: yāvat kratur ayam asmāl lokāt praity evaṃ kratur hāmuṃ lokam pretyābhisambhavati. !{520}! DHN[T] 255 om. smṛtiś ca. !{521}! Lies mit DHN[T] 255: mārgeṇa. !{522}! DHN[T] 255: madbhaktās. !{523}! DHN[T] 255: pāpair na lipyatre martyā. !{524}! Lies: vyāsenāpi. !{525}! DHN[T] 256: ānuśāsanike pātravidhau. !{526}! ChāndogyaBr 2.23.1; ebenfalls zitiert in DHN[D] 21.8, 41.8 und 118.4. !{527}! DHN[T] 256: bhagavatprītiviṣayākṛtāṇāṃ. !{528}! DHN[T] 256 ins. ānuśāsanike. !{529}! MBh: ye caranti yudhiṣṭhira. !{530}! DHN[T] 256: ṛṣayā. !{531}! MBh: tatra ye brāhmaṇāḥ ke cin na nindati hi te varāḥ. !{532}! DHN[T] 257: hantānstripuruṣaṃ.

lg.l: [62.3] priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ teṣu tac chrāddham āvapet* //{533}* [MBh 13.9.46]
[62.4] yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ bhojayed anṛcāṃ naraḥ /
[62.5] ekas tān mantravit pūtaḥ sarvān arhati bhārata* //{534}*" [MBh 13.9.47]
[62.6-7] evaṃ aṣṭākṣara dvādaśākṣara puruṣasūktādimantrajapaniṣṭhānāṃ darśanena brahmahā 'pi śuddhyatīti purāṇoktam. yathā*{535}*:
[62.10] sāṣṭākṣarañ ca mantreśaṃ ye japanti narottamāḥ /
[62.11] tān dṛṣṭvā brahmahā śuddhyet kiṃ punar vaiṣṇavas svayam //" iti [PadmaP ]

div.l: [62.12-14] śruyate 'pi. "yo ha vai nārāyaṇasyāṣṭākṣaraṃ padam adhyeti anupabravas sarvam āyur eti vindate prājāpatyaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyaṃ tato 'mṛtatvam aśnute tato 'mṛtatvam aśnuta iti".
[62.18] āśrame vā vane vā 'pi sa vaikhānasa ucyate* /{538}*
[62.19] grāmyadharmāṇi sarvāṇi varjayed vanavāsakaḥ //"*{539}* iti. [KapiñjalaS]

lg.l: [62.21] sa vadet pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ jalasthaś cintayed dharim* //{541}*"

div.l: [62.22-24] iti kevalāṣṭākṣaramantrajapaniṣṭhānām apy evaṃ vidhāḥ prabhāvāḥ śrūyanta iti cet śrutismṛtivihitais tair eva mantraiḥ advārakabhagavadarcane mukhyādikāriṇāṃ vaikhānasānāṃ kaimutikanyāyasiddham autkṛṣṭyaṃ kenāpodituṃ śakyam.*{542}*

div.p: !{533}! MBh: priyān vā yadi vā dveṣyāṃs. !{534}! MBh: ekas tān mantravit prītaḥ; DHN[T] 257: ekas tān mantravit putas sarvam arhati bhārateti (10 adhyāye). !{535}! DHN[T] 258: brahmahā śuddhyatītyuktaṃ. !{536}! DHN[T] 258-259 verschiebt das Padmapurāṇa-Zitat weiter nach hinten und liest somit statt DHN[D] 62.8-19: śruyate hi. "yo ha vai nārāyaṇasyāṣṭākṣaraṃ padam adhyeti anapabruvas sarvam āyur eti vindate prājāpatyaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyaṃ tato 'mṛtatvam aśnute tato 'mṛtatvam aśnuta iti". aṣṭākṣaraparā vaikhānasāḥ. kapiñjalasaṃhitāyām: yājanādhyāpanayutaḥ śiṣyān ugrahakārakaḥ / ācārya iti vijñeyo mantratantraparāyaṇaḥ // āśram.e vā vane vā 'pi sa vaikhānasa ucyate / grāmyadharmāṇi sarvāṇi varjayed vanavāsaka // iti. padmapurāṇe: sāṅgaṃ samantraṃ sanyāsaṃ sarṣicchandadaivatam / sadīkṣāvidhi sadhyānaṃ sayajñaṃ (yantraṃ?) dvādaśākṣaram // aṣṭākṣarañ ca mantreśaṃ ye japanti narottamāḥ / tān dṛṣṭvā brahmahā śuddhyet kiṃ punar vaiṣṇavas svayam // iti. !{537}! Ebenfalls zitiert als "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 93.4-5. !{538}! Vgl. das Zitat aus "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 93.6-7: āśrame vā vane vā 'pi putradārasamāhitaḥ / aṣṭākṣaraparo nityaṃ sa vaikhānasa ucyate //. !{539}! Ebenfalls zitiert als "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 93.8. !{540}! DHN[T] 260: 'nūcānaṃ. !{541}! DHN[T] 260: cintayan harim. !{542}! DHN[T] 261-263 statt DHN[D] 62.22-24: kevalāṣṭākṣarādimantrajapaniṣṭhānām evaṃvidhāḥ prabhā hiś śrūyante (iti) cet śrutismṛtisūtravihitais tair eva mantraiḥ advārakabhagavadarcane mukhyādikāriṇāṃ kaimutikanyāya siddham utkṛṣṭatvādikaṃ neti. śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇādyarthatattvān abhijñād aprāmāṇikodanākalitapūrvottarān mahāsāhasikodunmattādanyaḥ vā brūyāt? punardevalakatvādivicāraḥ.

div.l: [63.1-3] kiñca - yathā vaikhānasānām utpattyādikaṃ śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu viśeṣeṇa pratipāditaṃ tathā itareṣāṃ viśeṣeṇa pratipāditañ cet tadā vaikhānasasāmyam itareṣāṃ syāt. tathā na dṛśyate hi.
[63.7] vaikhānasakule jātaḥ pāñcarātreṇa dīkṣitaḥ /
[63.8] na dīkṣito na sañjāto (?) lobhān mohān madarcanam* /{545}*
[63.9] kuryāc cet tu viśeṣeṇa bhaved devalakas to saḥ //"*{546}*

lg.l: [63.12] arthārthī kālanirdeśī yo devaṃ pūjayet sa hi /

div.p: !{543}! DHN[T] 263-4 statt DHN[D] 63.1-4: punar devalakatvādivicāraḥ. kiñca - yathā vaikhānasānām utpattyādikaṃ śrutismṛtipurāṇādiṣu viśeṣeṇa pratipāditaṃ evam itareṣāṃ brāhmaṇasāmānyatvena vinā viśeṣeṇa pratipāditaṃ cet tadānīmetādṛguṇaviśiṣṭā vayam iti. tair vaktum ucitam anyathā asaṃtaṃ? nindyām ātmastutiṃ mūḍhetarāḥ svaparagataviśeṣajñāḥ ke vā brūyaḥ? devalakalakṣaṇaṃ nirūpyate yathā. !{544}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Purātantra" zitiert in DHN[D] 38.12-13. !{545}! DHN[T] 273: madarjanam. !{546}! Vgl. ĀS 19.15: vaikhānasakule jātaḥ pañcarātreṇa dīkṣitaḥ / na dīkṣito na jāto vai sa vai devalakas smṛtaḥ. !{547}! DHN[T] 274: rudrkāḷyupajīvakaḥ.

lg.l: [64.1] adīkṣitaḥ svayaṃ tantre karmadevalakas tu saḥ /
[64.3] kalpadevalakaḥ proktaḥ sa vai śailasute dhruvam // [Śivaśekharatantra]
[64.4] ananujñātam ācāryāt āgamaṃ śuśruve ca yaḥ /
[64.5] śīlataḥ tasya śiṣyaś ca śuddhadevalakāv ubhau // [Śivaśekharatantra]
[64.6] tridhā devalakatvaṃ tu na viṣṇuviṣaye kvacit /
[64.8] smṛtyantare: "śarvaṃ sūryaṃ tathā candraṃ durgādī rudradevatāḥ /
[64.9] yo 'rcayet paṇapūrvaṃ saḥ sadyaḥ patati mānavaḥ //
[64.10] durgā ca bhadrakālī ca buddhaś ca kṣetrapālakaḥ /
[64.11] pañcapūjā ca ity ete pañcadevalakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
[64.13] gṛhe pūjā ca ity ete pañcadevalakāḥ smṛtāḥ (?) //" iti*{548}*
[64.15] rudrasya pūjakā ye vai te vai devalakāḥ smṛtāḥ //" iti [ViṣṇudharmottaraP ]
[64.17] caturvedadharo vipraḥ sa caṇḍālasamo bhaved* //{551}*" iti [ViṣṇuP ]
[64.18-19] *{552}*evam ebhir vacanaiḥ śāstrānanumatamārgeṇa pūjakānāṃ devatāntarapūjakānām eva ca devalakatvaṃ siddhyatīti sphuṭam avagamyate.
[64.20] kiñca: "vṛṣo dharmas samākhyataḥ tasya yaḥ kurute layam /
[64.21] vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devā nikṛṣṭaṃ śvapacād api //"

div.p: !{548}! DHN[T] 275 ins. iti kiñca hārīta: vaikhānasās ti ye viprā haripūjanatatparāḥ. na te devalakā proktā viṣṇupādābjasaṃśrayāḥ iti. smṛtiratnākare atri: vaidikenaiva vidhinā daṃbhalobhavivarjitaḥ pūjayed bhaktito viṣṇuṃ sa hi devalako na vai iti. Zitiert als "Hārīta" in DHN[D] 65.3-4 und als "Smṛtyarthasāra" in DHN[D] 65.5-6. !{549}! DHN[T] zieht hier das Zitat von Hārīta aus DHN[D] 65.3-4 und aus Smṛtyarthasāra aus DHN[D] 65.5-6 vor: hārīta: vaikhānasās ti ye viprā haripūjanatatparāḥ /na te devalakā proktā viṣṇupādābjasaṃśrayāḥ // iti. smṛtiratnākare atri: vaidikenaiva vidhinā daṃbhalobhavivarjitaḥ pūjayed bhaktito viṣṇuṃ sa hi devalako na vai iti. !{550}! DHN[T] 276: devārcanaparo hy āsīt. !{551}! DHN[T] 276: sa caṇḍālīsamo bhaśet. !{552}! DHN[T] 276 statt DHN[D] 64.18-65.7: kiñca devaśabdasya dhātvarthe vicāryamāṇe "div" krīḍāvijigīṣāvyavahāradyutistutimodamadasvapnakāntigatiṣv" iti devaṃ vedaśāstroktamārgaṃ liyata iti devalakaḥ svārthe "ka" pratyayaḥ. "vṛṣo dharmas samākhyataḥ tasya yaḥ kurute layam / vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devā nikṛṣṭaṃ śvapacād api //" iti vṛṣalaśabdavyutpattir darśitā.

lg.l: [64.22-65.2] iti vṛṣalaśabdo yathā vedaśāstroktamārgalayakārake vyutpāditaḥ, tathā devalakśabdo 'pi "div krīḍāvijigīṣāvyavahāradyutistutimodamadasvapnakāntigatiṣv" iti dhātvarthānusāreṇa gatyaparaparyāyamārgārthakadivdhātughaṭitassan vedoktamārgalayaprāpake vyutpādayituṃ śakyate iti tatpratīpeṣu vedamārgapratiṣṭhāpakeṣu vaikhānaseṣu na sarvātmanā pravartate. tathā ca:
[65.4] na te devalakāḥ proktā viṣṇupādābjasaṃśrayāt* //{553}*" iti [Vṛddhahārīta 8.78]
[65.6] pūjayed bhaktito viṣṇuṃ sa hi devalako na vai* //{554}*" iti

div.l: [65.7-8] *{555}*anyathā śrutyuktamārgeṇālayārcakānām api devalakatve tādṛśālayārcanapratipādakānāṃ śrutismṛtipurāṇādivacanānāṃ vyarthatā syāt.

lg.l: [65.9-10] *{556}*nanu - ajñānataḥ kṛtam api bhagavadārādhanam apavargapradañ cet. vinā śāstraṃ anadhikāriṇāpi kṛtaṃ tatapavargapradaṃ kiṃ na syād iti cet. na. bhagavadājñābhaṅgāpatteḥ.
[65.11] yathoktaṃ bhagavatā: "yaś śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ /
[65.12] na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim //" iti [MBh 6.38.23]
[65.14] ājñācchedī mama drohī madbhakto 'pi na vaiṣṇavaḥ* //{557}*" iti
[65.16] mānuṣo vaidikācāraṃ manasā 'pi na laṅghayet //" iti
[65.17-18] *{558}*ataḥ anadhikāriṇā kṛtaṃ śāstrāsammatam iti tantroktaprakāreṇa kṛtam api tat nāpavargapradam.*{559}*
[65.19] nanu: "brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś ca kṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ /
[65.20] arcanīyaś ca sevyaś ca pūjanīyaś ca mādhavaḥ /
[65.21] sāttvataṃ vidhim āsthāya gītaḥ saṅgarṣaṇena*{560}* yaḥ //"

div.l: [65.22-24] *{561}*iti śūdrādīnām api pāñcarātroktamārgeṇārcane adhikāre siddhe kathaṃ tāntrikoktaprakāreṇārcanaṃ kurvataḥ brāhmaṇādeḥ (anadhikāriṇaḥ) tat apavargapradaṃ na bhavatīty ucyata iti ced ucyate.

div.p: !{553}! Vṛddhahārīta: na te devalakāḥ jñeyā haripādābjasaṃśrayāt. !{554}! Nach Kane, HD 2.1: Atri in "Smṛtyarthasāra". Vgl. Kane, HD 2.1, und HD 1.2, S. 1156. !{555}! DHN[T] 277 statt DHN[D] 65.7-8: anyathā śrutismṛtipurāṇapañcarātrādiṣu pratipāditānāṃ vacanānāṃ vyarthatā syāt. śarvādyarcanāvidhipratipādakasya bodhāyanasyāpi patitatvaṃ saṃbhavati, tatsūtropajīviṣu tacchiṣyeṣv āpastambādiṣv atyantapātityaṃ kaimutikanyāyasiddhaṃ. !{556}! DHN[T] 277 statt DHN[D] 65.9-10: nanu - ajñānataḥ kṛtam bhagavadārādhanam apavargapradañ ced. anadhikāriṇaś śāstroktamārgeṇa vinā 'py apavargapradaṃ kiṃ na syād iti cen naivaṃ bhagavadājñābhaṅgakṛttvāt. !{557}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 56.6-7. !{558}! DHN[T] 278 statt DHN[D] 65.17-18: ato 'nadhikāriṇas tāntrikoktaprakāreṇa kurvato 'pavargapradatvaṃ? na saṃbhavati. !{559}! In DHN[D] 69.1-2 wird auf diese Aussage Bezug genommen. !{560}! Lies mit DHN[T] 278: saṅkarṣaṇena. !{561}! DHN[T] 278 statt DHN[D] 65.22-24: iti śūdrādīnām api pāñcarātre 'dhikāro vidhīyate kathaṃ vā tāntrikoktena prakāreṇa kurvato 'pavargapradaṃ na bhavatīty ucyata iti ced ucyate.

div.l: [66.1] "prathamaṃ mantrasiddhāntaṃ dvitīyañ cāgamāhvayam / [PādmaS caryāpāda 19.112cd]
[66.2] tṛtīyaṃ tantrasiddhāntaṃ tantrāntaramataḥ param* //{562}*" [PādmaS caryāpāda 19.113ab]
[66.3] iti caturvidheṣu siddhānteṣu
[66.4] "ekatra dīkṣitas tantre siddhānte vā dvijottama* /{563}*
[66.5] kriyāṃ na kuryād anyatra karṣaṇādi caturmukha // [Pādma.S caryāpāda 19.131]

lg.l: [66.7] mantre deve ca siddhānte tad evāsya hi yujyate* //{564}*" [PādmaS caryāpāda 19.132]

div.l: [66.8] iti caturvidhatantreṣu ekatra dīkṣitasya tantrāntare praveśayogyatābhāvasya pratipādanāt*{565}*.
[66.9] "ekagotrasamutpannaṃ pañcagotraṃ pṛthak pṛthak / ity ārabhya
[66.10] sūtraṃ kātyāyanaṃ śākhāṃ yājuṣaṃ*{566}* śuklam eva ca //
[66.13] ity adhikāribhedasya vidhīyamānatvāt.

lg.l: [66.15] dīkṣā samaiva sarveṣām ācāras tantravartmanā //" [PādmaS caryāpāda 21.55]

div.l: [66.16-18] ityāpastambādisūtraiḥ*{568}* saṃskṛtasya pāñcarātroktamārgeṇa niṣekādisaṃskārayogyatābhavakathanāt.*{569}* tāntrikoktaprakāreṇa dīkṣitānām eva tantroktārcanāyām adhikāritva sambhavāt.

lg.l: [66.20] apramāṇam ṛṣiṃ kṛtvā so 'ndhe tamasi majjati //"

div.l: [66.21] "svakīyadharmam utsṛjya paradharmaṃ ya āśrayet* /{570}*
[66.22] patitas sa bhaved āśu sadya eva na saṃśayaḥ //"

lg.l: [66.24] sadyaḥ patati vai vipro na vedasya samāśraye //"*{571}*

div.p: !{562}! PādmaS: turyaṃ tantrāntaraṃ bhavet. !{563}! PādmaS: dvijottamaḥ. !{564}! DHN[T] 278: tad evāpi na yujyata. PādmaS: ācāryatvam athārtvijyaṃ pūjāyāṃ madhuvidviṣaḥ / tantrabhede ca siddhāntabhede cāpi na yujyate //; v.l.: tantrabhede ca siddhānte tad evāpi na yujyate. !{565}! DHN[T] 278: praveśayogyatābhāt. !{566}! DHN[T] 279: śākhā yajuṣāṃ. !{567}! Vgl. ĪśvaraS 21.519: pañcāyudhāṃśāste pañca śāṇḍilyaś caupagāyanaḥ / mauñjyāyanaḥ kauśikaś ca bhāradvājaś ca yoginaḥ //. !{568}! DHN[T] 279: āpastambādisūtreṣu. !{569}! DHN[T] 279: niṣekādisaṃskārayogyatābhāvāt. !{570}! DHN[T] 280: samāśrayet. !{571}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich zitiert in DHN[D] 35.4-5.

lg.l: [67.1] "śākhāṃ śikhāṃ tathā puṇḍraṃ samayācāram eva ca /
[67.2] pūrvair ācaritaṃ kuryād anyathā patito bhavet //"
[67.6] pāṣaṇḍinaṃ tam āhur vai nikṛṣṭaṃ śvapacād api //" iti.
[67.8] svadharme nidhanaṃ śreyaḥ paradharmo bhayāvahaḥ* //{573}*" iti. [MBh 6.25.35]

div.l: [67.11-12] *{574}*ityādibhiś ca vacanaiḥ paradharmānuṣṭhātuḥ patitatvādismaraṇāc ca anyasūtroktaprakāreṇa tāntrikoktena mārgeṇa vā bāhmaṇādibhir*{575}* api anadhikāribhiḥ bhagavadārādhanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate.
[67.13] tarhi "brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ" ityādi *{576}*bhāratavacanasya kā gatir iti cet - ucyate.
[67.14] *{577}*mādhavāḥ: mukhyatvena advārakabhagavadyajanādhikāritvena nirūpitaiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjanīyaḥ.

lg.l: [67.15-16] *{578}*itaraiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiś cārcanīyaḥ. śūdraiḥ strībhiś ca yathārham ijyas sevyaś ca iti tasya vacanasyārthaḥ.
[67.18] yathārham ijyas sevyaś ca nityaṃ sarveśvaro hariḥ //"

div.l: [67.19-22] iti bhāradvājavacanāt "arghyāntam arcanaṃ proktaṃ havirantañ ca pūjanam //" ity arcanapūjanayoḥ bhinnārthakatvapratipādanāt, sarvair ekarītyā pūjane 'bhimate ekapadasyaiva paryāptatvāt itarayoḥ padayor vaiyarthyāpātāc ca. anyathā śūdrasyāpi pūjārcanādiṣv adhikārāṅgīkāre śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇādivirodho bhavet.
[67.23-25] śūdrasyānadhikārapratipādakāni vacanāni caitāni. śruti "tasmāc chūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ. sa hi devatā anvasṛjata tasmāc chūdro bahupaśur ayajñīyo daiva" iti.

div.p: !{572}! ĀS: svaśākhāṃ samparityajya paraśākhānusārataḥ / śākhāraṇḍas sa vijñeyas sarvakarmabahiṣkṛtaḥ //. !{573}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 47.10-11 zitiert. !{574}! DHN[T] 280 statt DHN[D] 67.11-12: iti paradharmānuṣṭhātuḥ patitatvādisambhavāc ca anyasūtroktamārgeṇa vā tāntrikoktena mārgeṇa vā bhagavadārādhanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate. !{575}! Lies mit DHN[T] 280: brāhmaṇādibhir. !{576}! DHN[T] 281 om. tarhi "brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ" ityādi. !{577}! DHN[T] 281 statt DHN[D] 67.14: mukhyatvenādvārakabhagavadyajanādhikāritvena nirūpitaiḥ pūjanīyaḥ. !{578}! DHN[T] 281 statt DHN[D] 67.15-25: itaraiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiś cārcanīyaḥ. śūdraiḥ strībhirathetaraiḥ yathārham ijyas sevyaś ca nityam sarveśvaro harir" iti anyathā. śrutismṛtiḥ sūtrapurāṇādīnāṃ virodhaḥ. "arghyāntam arcanaṃ proktaṃ havirantañ ca pūjanam /" ity vacanād ekatarapadavaiyarthyaṃ. śūdrasyārcanādāv anadhikāraḥ kā vā śrutir iti cet "tasmāc chūdro yajñe nānaklīptaḥ. sa hi devatā anvasṛjata tasmāc chūdro bahupaśur ayajñīyā daivaḥ iti.

lg.l: [68.4] tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdraprakṛtayas tv imāḥ* //{580}*" iti [BhāgavataP 11.17.19]
[68.5] manau: "brāhmaṇasya tapo jñānaṃ tapaḥ kṣatrasya rakṣaṇam /
[68.6] vaiśyasya tu tapo vārtā tapaś śūdrasya sevanam //" iti [ManuDhŚ 11.235]
[68.7] anyatra*{581}*: "yadi śūdras tapaḥ kuryād vedadṛṣṭena vartmanā /
[68.8] iha cāsya parikleśaḥ pretya cāsyāśubhā gatiḥ //" iti.

div.l: [68.9-11] kimarthaṃ śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā sarvadā abhihiteti cet - ucyate. janmāntarīyakarmavaśāt jananakāle 'pi tamoguṇair abhibhūtasya tasya śūdrasya tamonirasanārthaṃ dvijaśuśrūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇā prayuktam.*{582}*
[68.12] āśvamedhike: "udite savitar yasya kriyāyuktasya dhīmataḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.1690]
[68.13] caturvedadharasyāpi dehe ṣaḍvṛṣalāḥ sthitāḥ* //{583}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1691]
[68.14] kṣatriye sapta vijñeyā vaiśye tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ* /{584}* [MBh 14, App. 4.1692]
[68.15] niyatāḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha śūdre 'ṣṭāviṃśatiḥ khalu* //{585}*" ity ārabhya [MBh 14, App. 4.1693]
[68.16] "rāgadveṣau ca mohaś ca pāruṣyañ ca nṛśaṃsatā* /{586}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3340]
[68.17] śāṭhyañ ca dīrghavairañ ca atimānamanārjavam* //{587}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3341]
[68.18] anṛtañ cāpavādaś ca paiśunyam atilobhatā* /{588}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3342]
[68.19] hiṃsā steyaṃ mṛṣāvādo vañcanā roṣalobhate* //{589}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3343]
[68.20] abuddhatā ca nāstikyaṃ bhayam ālasyam eva ca* /{590}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3344]
[68.21] aśaucañ cākṛtajñatvaṃ dambhatā stambha eva ca* //{591}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3345]
[68.22] niṣkṛteś cāpy avijñānaṃ janane śūdram āviśan* /{592}* [MBh 14, App. 4.3346]
[68.23] dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaḥ śūdram abhibhūtan tu tāmasaiḥ // [MBh 14, App. 4.3347]
[68.24] dvijaśuśrūṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ śūdrāṇān tu prayuktavān / [MBh 14, App. 4.3348]
[68.25] naśyanti tāmasā bhāvāḥ śūdrasya dvijabhaktitaḥ //" iti. [MBh 14, App. 4.3349]

div.p: !{579}! DHN[T] 282: śūdrasya śuśrūśa: bhāgavate. !{580}! BhāgavataP: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ dvijagavāṃ devānāṃ cāpy amāyayā / tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdraprakṛtayas tv imāḥ. !{581}! DHN[T] 282: ṛtaṃ tapa ityādi. !{582}! DHN[T] 283 statt DHN[D] 68.6-11: śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣāvidhāne hetuḥ. kimarthaṃ śūdrasya dvijaśuśrūṣā sarvadā abhihiteti cet - janmāntarakarmavaśāt jananakāle 'pi tamoguṇair abhibhūtasya tamoguṇanirasanārthaṃ dvijaśuśrūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇo prayuktam. !{583}! MBh: caturvedavidaś cāpi dehe ṣaḍvṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ. !{584}! DHN[T] 283 mit MBh: kṣatriyāḥ sapta vijñeyā vaiśyās tv aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ. !{585}! DHN[T] 283 mit MBh: niyatāḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha śūdrāṇām ekaviṃśatiḥ. !{586}! MBh: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca. !{587}! MBh: śāṭhyañ ca dīrghavairitvam; DHN[T] 283: śārthañ. !{588}! DHN[T] 294: anṛtañ cāpavādaṃ ca . !{589}! MBh: roṣalobhata; DHN[T] 284: roṣalobhatā. !{590}! MBh: abuddhitā. !{591}! MBh: ḍambhatā. !{592}! MBh: nikṛtiś cāpi avijñānam jātake śūdram āviśet; DHN[T] 284: aviśat;

div.l: [69.1] ataḥ tamoguṇābhibhūtasya śūdrasya bhagavadyajanādhikāro nāsty eva.*{593}*

[69.2-7] nanv eṣāṃ*{594}* śaunakādyuktaprakāreṇa bhagavadārādhane 'dhikāro bhaved iti cet*{595}* - tad asat. tatra adhikāriviśeṣapratipādanābhavāt; sāmānyenoktatve 'pi śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇamahābhāratavaikhānasapāñcarātraśaivaśilpajyautiṣādiṣu adhikāriṇāṃ viśiṣya pratipāditatvāt*{596}* sarvaśākhāpratyayanyāyena sāmānyaviśeṣanyāyena "matprakaraṇādhītaṃ sarvaṃ madartham" iti nyāyena prakaraṇasāmyena*{597}*, upāsya devataikyāt guṇopasaṃhāranyāyena ca śaunakādibhir uktārcanāvidher api atraiva paryavasānaṃ yuktam.

lg.l: [69.8-9] *{598}* itarasūtriṇām katham iti cet - svāśramadharmācaraṇenaiva bhagavadārādhanaphalam siddhyati. yathocyate:
[69.10] smṛtiṣu: "bahvalpaṃ vā svagṛhyoktaṃ yasya karma pracoditam /
[69.11] tasya tāvati śāstrārthe kṛte sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet //" iti
[69.15] teṣu tiṣṭhan naro viṣṇum ārādhayati nānyathā* //{599}* [ViṣṇuP 3.8.19.1-2?]
[69.16] ye yajanti pitṝn devān brāhmaṇāṃś ca hutāśanam /
[69.17] sarvabhūtāntarātmānaṃ viṣṇum eva yajanti te //" iti
[69.18] purāṇāntare: "agnikāryaṃ japaṃ snānaṃ tapas svādhyāyam eva ca /
[69.19] tam evoddiśya deveśaṃ kuru nityam atandritaḥ //
[69.20] prātar utthāya vidhivat snātvā nityaṃ samāhitaḥ /
[69.21] yajet karmabhis tais taiḥ viṣṇuṃ devādisaṃjñitam //"

div.p: !{593}! DHN[T] 285: nāsyaiva !{594}! DHN[T] 285 om. nanv eṣāṃ. !{595}! DHN[T] 285: bhagavadārādhanādhikāro 'stīti; vgl. DHN[D] 65.17-18. !{596}! DHN[T] 285: sāmānyatvenoktatvāt śrutismṛtisūtrapurāṇabhāratavaikhānasapañcarātraśilpajyautiṣaśaivādiṣu śiṣyapratipāditatvāt. !{597}! DHN[T] 285: prakaraṇasāmyāt. !{598}! Anm. des Herausgebers: māstu śūdrāṇām adhikāraḥ, vaikhānasetarabrāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vaiśyānāṃ ca kena mārgeṇa bhagavadārādhanam iti pṛcchati itarasūtriṇām ityādinā. praśnasyāsya pūrvam eva samādhānam uktam. adhunā prakārāntareṇa samādhānam āha - svāśrametyādinā. !{599}! Vgl. DHN[D] 69.14-15.

lg.l: [70.1] śāṇḍilya:"prakṛttaiś ca nivṛttaiś ca svargadair mokṣadair api /
[70.4] ubhābhyāṃ jñānakarmabhyām ārādhyo bhagavān hariḥ //" iti [Śāṇḍilyasmṛti]

div.l: [70.5] śāntiparvaṇi: "svayambhūvihito*{600}* dharmo yo yasya hi*{601}* nareśvara / [MBh 14, App. 4.222]
[70.6] sa tena kṣapayet pāpaṃ samyag ācaritena hi //" iti [MBh 14, App. 4.223]

lg.l: [70.7] pādme: "dharmān nijāṃś ca śāstroktān varṇadharmān aśeṣataḥ /
[70.8] pālayantīha ye vaiśyā na te yānti yamālayam //" iti [PadmaP ]

div.l: [70.11-12] "nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāye" 'ti "brāhmaṇā vividaśanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena" iti ca śrutir imam arthaṃ draḍhayanti.

[70.13-15] ataḥ advārakabhagavadyajanādhikāribhiḥ śrīmadvaikhānasasūtribhis sāmyaṃ keṣāñcid api nopapadyate iti kṛtaṃ pallavitena. etāvatā "akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtena vikhanasā praṇītatvāt" iti prathamo hetuḥ nirūpitaḥ.
[70.16] iti prathamahetunirūpaṇam
[71.1] atha dvitīyahetunirūpaṇam
[71.2] athāsya vaikhānasasūtrasya sarvasūtrāṇām āditvaṃ nirūpyate. tathā hi:

lg.l: [71.3] brahmakaivarte: " yathā munīnāṃ vikhanā ādibhūta udāhṛtaḥ /
[71.4] sūtrāṇāṃ tatpraṇītan tu tathā śreṣṭatamaṃ smṛtam //"*{602}* iti [BrahmakaivartaP ]
[71.5] purātantre bhṛgu: "vedānāṃ vyāsanād arvāk prāgrūpaṃ militan tu yat /
[71.6] tān tu vaikhānasīṃ śākhām iti vedavido viduḥ //"*{603}* ity ārabhya [Purātantra]
[71.8] ādyatvāt sarvasūtrāṇāṃ vaiṣṇavatvāc ca tat tu vai // [Purātantra]

div.l: [71.9] mayānuvartitaṃ tadvat kāśyapātrimarīcibhiḥ //"*{604}* iti [Purātantra]
[71.12] uktavān nigamārthānām ācāraṃ pravibhāgaśaḥ*{606}* //" iti [SkandaP ]
[71.13-14] sūtrārthaparyālocanayāpi sarvasūtrāditvam asyāvagamyate. yathā -"mukhyād indraś cāgniś ce" ti bhagavanmukhād agnisṛṣṭiḥ śrūyate. tathā:
[71.15] āśvamedhike - bhagavadvacanam:
[71.16] "prathamaṃ manmukhāt sṛṣṭo lokārthe pacanaḥ prabhuḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.2572]
[71.17] sṛṣṭamātro jagatsarvam attum aicchat purā khalu* //{607}* [MBh 14, App. 4.2573]
[71.18] tataḥ praśamitas so 'yam upāsīno mayā purā* /{608}* [MBh 14, App. 4.2574]
[71.19] satatopāsanāt so 'yam aupāsana iti smṛtaḥ //" iti [MBh 14, App. 4.2575]
[71.20-21] evaṃ paramapuruṣamukhāj jātasyaupāsanāgneḥ kuṇḍavidhānādikam atraiva sūtre pratipāditam.

[71.22-24] kiñ ca navagrahamakhe savitṛmaṇḍalasya caturaśratvam ucyate "caturaśraṃ vṛttam ityādinā (sūtre). ādau caturaśrasya sato ravimaṇḍalasya kālāntare vṛttatvakalpanaṃ pramāṇair avagamyate. yathā:

div.p: !{602}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert als "Brahmakaivartapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 42.9-10. !{603}! Dieser Vers ist als "Purātantra" ähnlich zitiert in DHN[D] 33.21-22. !{604}! Diese drei Halbverse sind auch zitiert als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 35.20-22. !{605}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich als "Purātantra" zitiert in 34.9-10. !{606}! Diese drei Halbverse sind als "Skandapurāṇa" auch zitiert in DHN[D] 39.25-40.2. !{607}! MBh: uttamaicchat purā khalu. !{608}! MBh: tataḥ praśamitaḥ so 'gnir upāsyaiva mayā purā.

lg.l: [72.1] viṣṇupurāṇe: "tejasaś śamanañ cāsya viśvakarmā cakāra ha /
[72.3] kṛtavān aṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ sa vyaśātayad avyayam /

div.l: [72.5] jājjvalyamānam apatat tadbhūmau munisattama //"iti [ViṣṇuP ]
[72.6] evaṃ ca sūryasāvarṇikamanvantaramārabhya ravimaṇḍalasya vṛttākārapratītiḥ.
[72.7-8] tad anusāreṇa bodhāyanādibhiḥ vṛttākāratvaṃ ravimamaṇḍalasyoktam. tataḥ pūrvaṃ caturaśratvam va. tad evāsmin sūtre pratipāditam.
[72.9-10] evaṃ "vānaprastho vaikhānaśāstrasamudācāro vaikhānasa"*{609}* iti vaikhānasasūtram anusmṛtya tṛtīyāśramadharmān bodhāyanaḥ pratipādayati. [BaudhDhS 2.6.11.14]

[72.11-17] tathā āgnivaiśyasūtre "athātas sūtragaṇanāṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. bodhāyanam āpastambaṃ satyāṣāṭhaṃ drāhyāyaṇam āgastyaṃ śākalyam āśvalāyanaṃ śāmbhavīyaṃ kātyāyanam iti navāni pūrvasūtrāṇi. vaikhānasaṃ śaunakīyaṃ bhāradvājam āgnivaiśyaṃ jaiminīyaṃ *{610}* vādhūlaṃ mādhyandinaṃ hiraṇyakeśīyaṃ kauṣītakam iti navāny aparasūtrāṇi. evam aṣṭādaśasūtrāṇy aṣṭādaśasūtrakārāś ca. etāni caturvedamūlāni. pūrvasūtrāṇi śārīrāṇi sāmānyāni bhavanti. uttarasūtrāṇi vaikhānasādīni viṣṇusaṃbandhīni daivikānī" ti vaikhānasasūtrasyāditvaṃ vaiṣṇavatvañ cocyate.
[72.18-19] asya sūtrasyādhikyaṃ ca "ye vaikhānasasūtreṇa saṃskṛtās dvijātaya"*{611}* ityādinā pūrvam eva pratipāditam.
[72.20-21] ataḥ sarvasūtrāṇām ādir idaṃ sūtram iti siddham. tataḥ sarvasūtrottamatvañ cāsyopapadyate iti nirūpito dvitīyo hetuḥ.
[72.22] iti dvitīyahetunitūpaṇam.

div.p: !{609}! BaudhDhS: vānaprastho vaikhānasaśāstrasamudācāraḥ. !{610}! Anm. des Herausgebers: atra vādhūlasthāne mādhuryam iti hiraṇyakeśīyasthāne kauṇḍinyam iti ca pāṭhāntaram upalabhyate. !{611}! Dieser Halbvers ist als "Purātantra" zitiert in DHN[D] 36.10.

div.l: [73.1-3] athāsya śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya sūtrāntarāpekṣayā vailakṣaṇyāpādakaṃ pratyakṣaśrutimūlakatvam astīti jñāpayituṃ "sarvakarmasu śrutimārgānusāritvād" iti tṛtīyo hetur nirūpyate. tathā hi:

[73.4-9] śuddhācamanavidhau "yattrir ācāmati tena ṛcaḥ prīṇāti" ityādi śrutyanusāreṇa sūtre "ṛgvedaḥ prīṇātv" ityādinā śuddhācamanam uktam. nanu bodhāyanenāpi śuddhācamanavidhir ukta iti cet satyam. "ācamanavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ" ity ārabhya "gokarṇabaddhahastena trir ācamet, prathamaṃ yat pibati tena ṛgvedaṃ prīṇāti yad dvitīyaṃ tena yajurvedaṃ yat tṛtīyaṃ tena sāmavedaṃ prīṇātī"ty ācamanena ṛgvedādīnāṃ prītir bhavatīty uktam. na tu mantraḥ.
[73.10-11] śrutismṛtisūtravihitasya sandhyopāsanasya pradhānabhūtam arghyapradānādikam atraiva pratipāditam. "prātas sūryaś cetyādinācamya āpo hiṣṭhādibhis tisṛbhiḥ prokṣya
[73.12] gāyatryā 'po 'bhimantrya ādityābhimukhaṃ vikṣipya pradakṣiṇaṃ karoti" ityādi.

lg.l: [73.13-17] bodhāyanenāpi sandhyāvandanavidhir uktaḥ iti cet naivam. "athātas sandhyopāsanavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. tīraṃ gatvāprayato 'bhiṣiktaḥ prayato vā nābhiṣiktaḥ*{612}* prakṣālipādapāṇir*{613}* apa ācamya surabhimatyā abliṅgābhir vāruṇībhiḥ hiraṇyavarṇābhiḥ pāvamānībhiḥ vyāhṛtibhir anyaiś ca pavitrair ātmānaṃ prokṣya prayato bhavati. athāpy udāharanti." [BaudhDhS 2.4.7.1-3]

div.l: [73.20-74.3] sarvakarmaṇāñ caivārambheṣu prāksandhyopāsanākālāc caitenaiva pavitrasamūhenātmānaṃ prokṣya prayato bhavati. athāpy udāharanti. "darbheṣv āsīno darbhān dhārayamāṇaḥ sodakapāṇinā*{615}* pratyaṅmukhaḥ sāvitrīṃ sahasrakṛtvaḥ āvartayet. prāṇāyāmaśo vā śatakṛtvaḥ. tribhiś ca prāṇāyāmaiḥ tato (tānto) brahmahṛdayena. vāruṇībhyāṃ rātrim upatiṣṭhate." ityādinā mārjanādikam uktam. pradhānabhūtam arghyapradānādikam anuktam. [BaudhDhS 2.4.7.4-9]

div.p: !{612}! BaudhDhS: vānabhiṣiktaḥ. !{613}! BaudhDhS: prakṣālitapādapāṇir. !{614}! BaudhDhS: mantravatprokṣaṇaṃ cāpi dvijātīnāṃ viśiṣyate. !{615}! BaudhDhS: sodakena pāṇinā.

div.l: [74.4-9] brahmayajñaḥ. talavakāropaniṣadi "tasyā vā eṣa prathamaḥ pādaḥ oṃ bhūs tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ oṃ bhuvaḥ bhargo devasya dhīmahi oṃ suvaḥ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt iti pacchaḥ, oṃ bhūr bhuvas tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi oṃ suvaḥ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt ity ardhacaśaḥ, oṃ bhūrbhuvassuvas tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt iti samastāñ ca sāvitrīṃ japtveti yathodiṣṭaḥ, tathātra sūtre 'pi ukto 'sti.
[74.10-11] āghārādiṣu sarvam api śrautavat. atra brahmavaraṇānantaraṃ somavaraṇam apy uktam asti. "somo 'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ rājā - somarājāno brāhmaṇā" iti.
[74.12-13] "viṣṇuś ca vai somaś ca brahmav ādyam avadetāṃ 'ahaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhe'ti viṣṇur abravīt 'ahaṃ pratiṣṭhe'ti somaḥ. tau prajāpatiṃ praśnam aitāṃ so 'bravīt prajāpatiḥ
[74.14] 'chandāṃsi viṣṇum adhigacchanti, nakṣatrāṇi somaṃ. tāv ubhau brahmaṇyāv'; iti so 'bravīt.

[74.15-17] pūjitau pūjayantau stutau stunvantau priyau priyavantau brahmaṇyau brahmavittau brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhātārau bhavata iti yan māṃ brahmaṇā vakṣyanti yajñeṣu so 'ham iti viṣṇur abravīt. tasmād viṣṇur yajño brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhā iti. vijñayate ca.

[74.18-22] "brāhmaṇo vai chandāṃsī"ty etasmāt brāhmaṇāt yan māṃ brāhmaṇā vakṣyanti nakṣatreṣu tatrāham iti so 'bravīt. tasmāt brāhmaṇānāṃ somo rājeti tasmād vijñāyate ca brāhmaṇe vā aṣṭāviṃśo nakṣatrāṇāṃ tasya vacaḥ puṇyam iti tāv ubhau brahmaṇyau brahmavittau brāhmaṇānāṃ pratiṣṭhātārau brāhmaṇeṣu pratiṣṭhitau ya evaṃ brāhmaṇapuraskṛtāni karmāṇi karoti yajñasya samṛddhyā" iti ca śrutiprasiddhatvāt.

[74.23-25] evam atra śāntikapauṣṭikādiṣu pradhānakarmatvāt navagrahamakhasya pañcāgnikuṇḍavidhānam uktam. "atha grahaśāntiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. grahyāyattā lokayātrā tasmād ātmaviruddhe prāpte grahān samyak pūjayatī" ti.

[75.1-8] grahaśānteḥ kathaṃ prādhānyam iti ced ucyate. "udyantam astaṃyantam ādityam abhidhyāyan kurvan brāhmaṇo vidvān sakalaṃ bhadram aśnute 'sāv ādityo brahmeti brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti ya evaṃ veda" iti "ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate" iti "yo 'sau tapann udeti" ityādi "viṣṇuśakter avasthānaṃ sadāditye karoti ca" iti "dhyeyas sadā savitṛmaṇḍalamadhyavartī" tyādibhiś ca vacanaiḥ yat pratipāditaṃ savitṛmaṇḍalamadhyavartino bhagavato nārāyaṇasya yajanaṃ tad evedam ity abhiprāyeṇa sūtrakārair asya grahayajñasya prādhānyam uktam. tathānte "anyathā mahattaro doṣo bhavatī"ty apy uktam.
[75.9] bodhāyanaś ca: "athāto grahātithyabalikarmopahārān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ"

lg.l: [75.14-16] māsi māsy ṛtāv ṛtau candragrahe sūryagrahe viṣuve 'yane śubhāśubhe janmanakṣatre tadgrahāṇām ātithyaṃ saṃvatsarād api prayuñjānaḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnoti" iti grahaśāntikālaṃ nirūpya.
[75.17] "grahā gāvo narendrāś ca brāhmaṇāś ca viśeṣataḥ /

div.l: [75.19] ity akaraṇe pratyavāyam api darśitavān.

[75.20-22] tasmād eva sūtrakāraiḥ sūryacandrau vinā lokapravṛtty asambhavāt sūryapradhānatvāc ca grahāṇāṃ sarvakarmaṇām ādau grahapuraskāram uktvā tatra pañcāgnikuṇḍavidhānam upadiśya pradhāne sabhye viṣṇurūpasya savituḥ homaḥ "sabhye savitur" iti pratipāditaḥ.
[75.23-24] evam - "nārāyaṇa paraṃ brahma" - "brahmaiva bhūtānāṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ tena ko 'rhati spardhitum" - "agnir vai devānām avamo viṣṇuḥ paramaḥ tadantareṇa sarvā anyā devatāḥ"
[76.1] ityādi śrutyanusāreṇa "tasmād gṛhe paramaṃ viṣṇuṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sāyaṃprātarhomānte 'rcayati"
[76.2-3] iti nārāyaṇaparatvena sūtrāntareṣv anuktam ārādhanavidhim uktvā tatra "sa vā eṣa puruṣaḥ pañcadhā pañcātmā" ityādi śrutyanusāreṇa pañcamūrtividhānam apy uktam.
[76.4-5] āghārādiṣu śrautavad eveti pratyakṣasiddham iti pūrvam evoktam. evam anyatrāpi draṣṭavyam.

lg.l: [76.6-7] śrutimārgānusāritve ko viśeṣa iti cet - ucyate. śrutimūlatve hi prāmāṇyātiśayasambhavaḥ. yathāha
[76.8] manu: "vedaḥ smṛtiḥ sadācāraḥ svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ /
[76.9] etac catuṣṭayaṃ prāhuḥ*{616}* sākṣād dharmasya lakṣaṇam // [ManuDhŚ 2.12]
[76.13] vedo nārāyaṇas sākṣāt svayambhūr iti śuśrumaḥ //" [MBh ]
[76.15] yattadbrūyur na tatkuryād vedād dharmo vidhīyate //"

div.l: [76.16] smṛtyantare: "dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ prathamaṃ śrutiḥ / [MBh 14 App. 4.2492]
[76.17] dvitīyaṃ dharmaśāstrān tu*{618}* tṛtīyaṃ lokasaṅgrahaḥ* //{619}*" iti [MBh 14 App. 4.2493]
[76.18-20] etāvatā sarvakarmasu śrutimārgānusāritva rūpaḥ tṛtīyo hetur nirūpito bhavati. tathā ca śrutimārgānusāritvād asya sūtrasya sarvasūtrottamatvaṃ siddhyati iti nirūpitas tṛtīyo hetuḥ.
[76.21] iti tṛtīyahetunirūpaṇam.

div.p: !{616}! ManuDhŚ: etac caturvidhaṃ prāhuḥ. !{617}! ManuDhŚ: sarvaṃ tu samavekṣya-idaṃ nikhilaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā. !{618}! MBh: dharmaśāstrāṇi. !{619}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Mahābhārata" zitiert in DHN[D] 93.17-18.

div.l: [77.1-2] idānīṃ tāvat vaikhānasasūtroktadharmānuṣṭhānena anantasthiraphalaprāptiḥ satkulīnatvaṃ phalabhūyastvam api bhavatīti jñāpayituṃ "samantrakasarvakriyāpratipādakatvād" iti caturtho hetu nirūpyate. tad yathā:

[77.4-10] atra sūtra*{620}* nityānuṣṭhānavidhau "indro 'ham ubhābhyām" ity ārabhya karaprakṣālanādīni samantrakatvenoktāni. brahmayajñe "ṛtañ ca satyañ ce" ty ādi viśeṣaḥ. puṇyāhe samantrakatvaṃ spaṣṭam. sūtrāntareṣv anuktam aupāsanāgnikuṇdavidhānaṃ pratipāditam. āghāravidhau samantrakatvaṃ siddham. antahome tathaiva. nāndīmukhapūrvakopanayanādiṣu śārīreṣu saṃskāreṣu samantrakatvaṃ pratyakṣam. sthālīpākādiṣu "pūrvavad" ity anena pūrvaṃ vistareṇa pratipāditasyāghāravidheḥ prayogasaukaryārthaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pratipādanam.

[77.11-15] aparakriyāyām apy asti samantrakatvam. tatra kvacit "tūṣṇīm" ity uktvatvāt samantrakatvaṃ nāstīti svayam evāśaṅkya prakārāntareṇa samantrakatvaṃ pratyapādayat. tatra tatra kvacit mantrayogyatābhāve 'pi vihitaviśaye sarvatra samantrakatvam astīty avagamyate. sūtrāntareṣu vihitaviśayeṣv api samantrakatvānukteḥ teṣāṃ samantrakasarvakriyātvaṃ nāsti. tatra aparakriyāyām api sūtrāntarānapekṣā dṛśyate.

[77.16-19] bodhāyanena agnimukhādiṣu paridhiparistaraṇādikṣepaṇam tūṣṇīm evoktam. samantrakatvena karmaṇām uktau ko viśeṣa iti cet - ucyate. karmaṇāṃ mantravattve hi vīryavattaratvaṃ karmārādhya bhagavatprīṇanadvārā anantasthiraphalaprāptiḥ satkulīnatvañ ca bhavantīti smṛtipurāṇādiṣv avagamyate. yathā
[77.20-22] chāndogye: "yad eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī"ti. tatraivaṃ vyākhyātam. "mantraprakāśitāni karmāṇi kriyante nāmantra kam asti karme"ti.

lg.l: [78.1] ātharvaṇe: "ṛgyajussāmākhyā (?) mantreṣu karmāṇi kavayo yāny apaśyann iti"
[78.3] kriyāmantraiś ca saṃyukto brāhmaṇas syān na saṃśayaḥ //" [MBh 3.81.134]
[78.4] tatraiva: "guṇābhāve phalaṃ nyūnaṃ bhavaty aphalam eva vā /
[78.5] anārambhe tu na phalaṃ na guṇo dṛśyate hy utaḥ* //{621}*" iti [MBh 3.33.48]
[78.6] bṛhannāradīye: "amantrato havir yat tu hūyate jātavedase /
[78.7] apātre dīyate yac ca tad ghoraṃ bhogasādhanam // [BṛhannāradaP.]
[78.8] hutaṃ haviś cāśucinā dattaṃ yatkarma yatkṛtam /
[78.11] bodhāyana: "gobhir aśvaiś ca yānaiś ca kṛṣyā rājopasevayā /
[78.12] kulāny akulatāṃ yānti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ* //{622}* [BaudhDhS 1.5.10.28]
[78.14] kulasaṃkhyāṃ ca gacchanti karṣanti ca mahad yaśaḥ* //{624}*" [BaudhDhS 1.5.10.29]
[78.18] gobhir aśvaiś ca yānaiś ca kṛṣyā rājopasevayā* //{626}* [ManuDhŚ 3.64]
[78.20] kulāny akulatāṃ yānti yāni hīnāni mantrataḥ*{628}* // [ManuDhŚ 3.65]

div.l: [78.21] mantratas tu samṛddhāni kulāny alpadhanāni ca* /{629}*
[78.22] kulasaṃkhyāṃ ca gacchanti karṣanti ca mahad yaśaḥ* //{630}*" [ManuDhŚ 3.66]

div.p: !{621}! MBh: na guṇo dṛśyate 'cyuta. !{622}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Manu" zitiert in DHN[D] 78.18+20. !{623}! BaudhDhS und ManuDhŚ: mantratas tu samṛddhāni. !{624}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Manu" zitiert in DHN[D] 78.21-22. !{625}! ManuDhŚ: śūdrāpatyaiś ca kevalaiḥ. !{626}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Baudhāyana" zitiert in DHN[D] 78.11. !{627}! ManuDhŚ: ayājyayājanaiś caiva nāstikyena ca karmaṇām. !{628}! Dieser Halbvers ist als "Baudhāyana" zitiert in DHN[D] 78.12. !{629}! ManuDhŚ: kulāny alpadhanāny api. !{630}! Dieser Vers ist als "Baudhāyana" zitiert in DHN[D] 78.13-14.

lg.l: [79.1] mantrapūtan tu yac chrāddham" iti somotpattau smaryate.
[79.3] śraddhāvirahitaṃ yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate //" ity uktam. [BhGī = MBh 6.39.13]

div.l: [79.4-5] yathopāsanaṃ phalam iti ca śrutisiddhaṃ "yathā kratur asmin loke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavatī"ti.
[79.6-7] ataḥ śārīreṣu saṃskāreṣu samantrakasarvakriyāpratipādanāt pūrṇatvaṃ, pūrṇatvād eva sarvasūtrottamatvaṃ cāsya sūtrasya siddham iti nirūpitaḥ caturtho hetuḥ.
[79.8] iti caturthahetunirūpaṇam.
[80.1] atha pañcamahetunirūpaṇam.

[80.2-5] athāsya śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya sarvottamatve tatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhātṝṇām api sarvotkṛṣṭatve ca itarasūtriṣu mukhyatvenānupapannaṃ niṣekādisaṃskārādimattvam*{631}* asya sūtrasya mukhyata evopapadyata iti jñāpayituṃ niṣekādisaṃskārādimatvād iti pañcamo hetur nirūpyate. yathā:
[80.6] "atha niṣekādisaṃskārān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ, ṛtusaṅgamane"ty upakramya
[80.7] "pāṇigrahaṇānī"*{632}*ty antena śārīrasaṃskārā niṣekasaṃskārapūrvakatvena pratipāditāḥ.

lg.l: [80.8-11] nanu: jātakopanayanavivāhānāntarabhāvino*{633}* niṣekasya katham āditvaṃ pratipādyate? tathā "brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīt"*{634}* "manasā tv eva bhūtāni pūrvaṃ dakṣo 'sṛjat tadā" ityādi śrutismṛtiṣu niṣekena vinā utpattidarśanāc ca niṣekasya kim artham āditvaṃ pratipādyate? jātakasyāditvaṃ śrībhārate cāvagamyate.
[80.15] nityavratas*{637}* satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate //" iti [MBh 12.182.3]
[80.16] evaṃ harivaṃśe: *{638}*"kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃsargaḥ*{639}* kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
[80.17] yadiyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // [HariV 35.42]
[80.18] yady asti tapaso vīryaṃ yuṣmākaṃ viditātmanāṃ*{640}* /

div.l: [80.20] iti niṣekaṃ vināpi utpattiḥ śrūyate iti niṣekasyāditvaṃ na saṃbhavati iti cet -

[80.21-23] tad asat. "niṣekavirahe 'pi utpattis saṃbhavatī"ty etan nopapadyate. tapobalād yogabalāc ca bhagavato nārāyaṇasya brahmaṇo maharṣīṇāṃ vā mānasaprajāsṛṣṭau śaktis sambhavati. nānyeṣām. yathā:*{641}*

div.p: !{631}! Vgl. DHN[D] 2.7: niṣekasaṃskārādimatvāt. !{632}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 1.1: atha niṣekādisaṃskārān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. ṛtusaṃgamanagarbhādhānapuṃsavanasīmantaviṣṇubalijātakarmutthānanāmakaraṇānnaprāśanapravāsāgamanapiṇḍavardhanacauḍakopanayanapārāyaṇavratabandhavisargopākarmasamāvartanapāṇigrahaṇānīty aṣṭādaśa saṃskārāḥ śārīrāḥ. !{633}! Lies mit DHN[T] 370: jātakopanayanavivāhānantarabhāvino. !{634}! Bezug auf ṚV 10.090.12.1{19}: brāhmaṇo asya mukham āsīd. !{635}! MBh: yas tu. !{636}! MBh: śaucācārasthitaḥ samyag [die Lesart DHN[D] ist jedoch v.l.] vighasāśī gurupriyaḥ /. !{637}! MBh: nityavratī. !{638}! DHN[T] 389 ins. jaurvaḥ. !{639}! HariV: saṃyogaḥ. !{640}! DHN[T] 389: ajitātmanāṃ; HariV: amitātmanām. !{641}! DHN[T] 390-391 statt DHN[D] 80.21-23: iti (ity uktatvāt) niṣekaṃ vinotpattiśravanāc ca niṣekasyāditvaṃ na sambhava(tī)ti (yad uktaṃ niṣekavirahe 'py utpattis saṃbhavatīti) tan nopapapadyate. bhagavato nārāyaṇasya brahmaṇo maharṣīṇāṃ vā tapobalād yogabalāc ca teṣām eva mānasaprajāsṛṣṭau śaktis sambhavati.

div.l: [81.1] śrīviṣṇupurāṇe: "saṅkalpād darśanāt sparśāt pūrveṣām abhavan prajāḥ" [ViṣṇuP ]
[81.2] tapoviṣeśair iddhānāṃ tadātyantatapasvinām* //{642}*" [ViṣṇuP 1.15.79]

lg.l: [81.4] punaś caiva niruddhyante vidvāṃs tatra na muhyati // [ViṣṇuP 1.15.83]

div.l: [81.5] kāniṣṭhyaṃ śryaiṣṭhyam apy eṣāṃ pūrvaṃ nāsti dvijottama* //{643}* [ViṣṇuP 1.15.84ab]
[81.6] tapa eva garīyo 'bhūt prabhāvaś caiva kāraṇam //" iti [ViṣṇuP ]
[81.7] rudrotpattir api niṣekeneti śrūyate. śatapathe: "abhūd vā idaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhā"

[81.8-10] ity ārabhya "bhūtānāñ ca prajāpatis saṃvatsarāyādikṣata*{644}* bhūtānāṃ grahapatir āsīd uṣā patnī"*{645}*ty ādikam uktvā "bhūtānāṃ patiḥ saṃvatsara uṣasi reto 'siñcat saṃvatsare kumāro 'jāyata tasya rudrasya nāma karotī"*{646}*ty ādi.

[81.11-13] niṣekakriyāprakāro 'pi śrūyate hi. "nagnaṃ kṛtvorum upapravartayati yadā hi nagna ūrur bhavaty atha mithunībhavato 'tha retas sicyate 'tha prajāḥ prajāyante" iti, "retasa eva siktasya bahuśo rūpāṇi vikaroti sa vai prajāyate śvaḥ śvo*{647}* bhūyān bhavatī"ti,

[81.14-18] "reto mūtraṃ vijahāti yoniṃ praviśad indriyaṃ garbho jarāyuṇā vṛtaḥ ulbaṃ jahāti janmanā"*{648}* iti. muṇḍopaniṣadi - "pumān retas siñcati yoṣitāyāṃ bahvyaḥ*{649}* prajās sṛjamānās sarūpāḥ"*{650}* iti. chāndogye - "yoṣā vā va gautamāgnir" ity ārabhya "tasya upastha eva samid. yad antaḥ karoti te 'rciṣā.*{651}* abhinandā visphuliṅgās. tasminn agnau*{652}* devā reto juhvati. tasyā āhuter garbhas*{653}* sambhavatī"*{654}*ti ca.

lg.l: [81.19] śrīviṣṇupurāṇe: "prajās sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣas svayambhuvā /
[81.20] yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā śruṇu mahāmate* //{655}* [ViṣṇuP 1.15.86]
[81.21] manasā tv eva bhūtāni pūrvaṃ dakṣo 'sṛjat tadā /
[81.22] devān ṛṣīṃs tu gandharvān asurān pannagāṃs tathā* //{656}* [ViṣṇuP 1.15.87]
[81.23] yadā 'sya sṛjamānasya na vyavardhanta tāḥ prajāḥ /

div.p: !{642}! ViṣṇuP 1.15.79ab(?): tapoviṣeśaiḥ siddhānāṃ tadā 'tyanta tapasvinām. !{643}! ViṣṇuP 1.15.84ab(?): kāniṣṭhyaṃ jyaiṣṭhyam apy eṣāṃ pūrvaṃ nābhūd dvijottama. !{644}! Lies mit ŚatapathaBr: saṃvatsarādīkṣanta. !{645}! Bezug auf ŚatapathaBr 6.1.3.7: abhūd vā 'yaṃ pratiṣṭheti. tad bhūmir abhavat tām aprathayat sā pṛthivy abhavat tasyām asyāṃ bhūtāni ca patiḥ saṃvatsarādīkṣanta bhūtānāṃ patir gṛhapatir āsīd uṣā patnī; DHN[T] 392: uṣāḥ patnīḥ. !{646}! Bezug auf ŚatapathaBr 6.1.3.8-10: tad yāni tāni bhūtāni. ṛtavas te 'tha yaḥ sa bhūtānām patiḥ saṃvatsaraḥ so 'tha yā soṣāḥ patnyauṣasī sā tānīmāni bhūtāni ca bhūtānāṃ ca patiḥ saṃvatsara uṣasi reto 'siñcantsa saṃvatsare kumāro 'jāyata so 'rodīt [...] tam abravīd rudro 'sīti. !{647}! DHN[T] 393: śvaśvo. !{648}! Auch zitiert in DHN[D] 84.15. !{649}! Lies mit MuṇḍakaU und DHN[T] 394: bahvyīḥ. !{650}! Bezug auf MuṇḍakaU 2.1.5: pumān retaḥ siñcati yoṣitāyāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ puruṣāt samprasūtāḥ. !{651}! Lies mit DHN[T] 394: 'rciṣaḥ. !{652}! Lies mit DHN[T] 395: tasminn etasminn agnau. !{653}! ChāndogyaU: garbhaḥ. !{654}! Bezug auf ChāndogyaU 5.8.1-2: yoṣā vā va gautamāgnir. tasya upastha eva samit. yad upamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ. yonir arciḥ. yad antaḥ karoti te 'ṅgārāḥ. abhinandā visphuliṅgās tasminn etasminn agnau; devā reto juhvati. tasyā āhuter garbhas sambhavati. !{655}! ViṣṇuP: yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā śṛṇu mahāmune. !{656}! ViṣṇuP: manasāny eva bhūtāni pūrvaṃ dakṣo 'sṛjattadā / devān ṛṣīn sagandharvān asurān pannagāṃs tathā //. !{657}! ViṣṇuP: tataḥ saṃcinty sa punaḥ sṛṣṭihetoḥ prajāpatiḥ.

lg.l: [82.3] bhārate: "na caiṣāṃ maithuno dharmo babhūva bharatarṣabha /

div.l: [82.5] tatra tretāyuge kāle saṃsparśāj jāyate prajā* /{659}*
[82.6] na hy abhūn maithuno dharmas teṣām api narādhipa*{660}* // [MB.h 12.200.36]

lg.l: [82.7] dvāpare maithuno dharmaḥ prajānām abhavan nṛpa /
[82.8] tathā kaliyuge kāle*{661}* dvandvam āpedire janāḥ //" iti [MBh 12.200.37]

div.l: [82.9-10] evaṃ śrutismṛtiṣu sṛṣṭikālād ārabhya niṣekād evotpar*{662}* iti śravaṇāt niṣekena vinā utpādanasāmarthyābhāvāc ca niṣekādimatvād ity uktam.*{663}*

[82.11-13] atrāpastambīyā evam āhuḥ. "niṣeko nāma garbhādhānam eva, niṣekagarbhādhānayoḥ paryāyatvāt garbhādhānātirekeṇa niṣekaśabdasyārthāntarāsambhavāc ca.*{664}* garbhādhānaśabdasyārthe vicāryamāṇe 'garbho 'sminn ādhīyate'*{665}* iti vyutpattyā 'indriyaṃ vai garbha'*{666}*
[82.14-15] iti śrutyanusāreṇa retassecanam eva garbhādhānam ity avagateḥ*{667}* niṣekāditvam asmākam apy astī"ti.

[82.16-19] atra baudhāyanīyaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhante. "yad uktaṃ 'niṣeko nāma garbhādhānam niṣekagarbhādhānayoḥ paryāyatvād'; iti - tadasat. niṣekagarbhādhānayoḥ pṛthaktvena pratipādanāt paryāyatvaṃ na ghaṭate. yathā - 'caturthyāṃ snātāyāṃ niśāyām alaṅkṛtya śayane 'bhimantrayate 'viṣṇur yonim'; ity upakramya 'athainām upaiti'; - 'tvāṃ pūṣann ...'*{668}* iti.

[82.20-23] evaṃ niṣeka uktaḥ. 'atha garbhādhānavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. pūrvapakṣe puṇye nakṣatre brāhmaṇān annena pariviṣya puṇyāhaṃ*{669}* vācayitvā atha devayajanaprabhṛtyāgnimukhāt kṛtvā pakvāj juhoti - pravedhase kavaye medhyāye'*{670}*ti. iti garbhādhānam uktam. evaṃ niṣekagarbhādhānayoḥ pṛthaktvena kīrtanāt*{671}* niṣeka eva garbhādhānam iti vaktum ayuktam.
[82.24-25] kiñca āpastambasūtre*{672}* niṣekapūrvakatvenānuktatvāt catvāriṃśat saṃskāraparigaṇane agṛhītatvāc ca teṣāṃ niṣekādyās saṃskārā na bhavantīti.*{673}*"

div.p: !{658}! MBh: apatyam udapadyata; die Lesart des DHN[D] ist als v.l. angegeben; DHN[T] 396: garbhasamupapadyate. !{659}! MBh: saṃkalpājñāyate prajā. !{660}! MBh: janādhipa; DHN[D] ist v.l. !{661}! MBh: tathā kaliyuge rājan. !{662}! Lies: evotpattir. !{663}! DHN[T] 396-397 statt DHN[D] 82.9-10: atra śrutismṛtiṣu sṛṣṭikālād ārabhya niṣekād evotpattir iti śrūyamāṇatvāt niṣekena vinotpādanasāmarthyābhāvāc ca niṣekāditvenoktam. !{664}! DHN[T] 396: *bhvād garbhā. !{665}! Vgl. NVB 1.1: garbhaḥ ādhīyate anenāsyām iti garbhādhānam. !{666}! Vgl. DHN[D] 81.14 und 84.15: indriyam garbho. !{667}! DHN[T] 397: ato statt avagateḥ. !{668}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 1.7.37-44: caturtyāṃ snātāyāṃ niśāyām alaṅkṛtya śayane 'bhimantrayate viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu. āsiñ catuprajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te (37). yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī dyauryathendreṇa garbhiṇī. vāyur yathā diśāṃ garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhātu te (38). garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvālī garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati. garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv āghāttāṃ puṣkarasrajā (39). hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā. taṃ te garbhaṃ dadhāmy ahaṃ daśame māsi sūtave (40). nejam eṣa parāpata saputraḥ punar āpataḥ. asyai me putrakāmāyai garbham ādhehi yaḥ pumān. iti (41). athaināṃ pariṣvajati amūham asmi sā tvaṃ dyaur ahaṃ pṛthivī tvaṃ reto 'haṃ retibhṛt tvaṃ mano 'ham asmi vā tvaṃ sāmāham asmi ṛktvaṃ tāvehi sambhavāva saha reto dadhāvahai puṃse putrāya vettavai rāyaspoṣāya suprajāstvāya suvīryāya iti (42). ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate ahaṃ garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣv ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ. ahaṃ prajā ajanayanpitṛṇām ahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣu putrān iti (43). athainām upaiti tāṃ pūṣañchvitamomarayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyā vapanti. yā na ūrū uśatī visrayātai yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepham iti (44); s.a. DHN[D] 83.5. !{669}! DHN[T] 400 ins. in Übereinstimmung mit BaudhGṛŚeṣS: svastim ṛddhim iti. !{670}!
