Bezug auf BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.2.1: atha garbhādhānaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. pūrvapakṣe puṇye nakṣatre brāhmaṇān annena pariviṣya puṇyāhaṃ svasty ṛddhim iti vācayitvātha devayajanollekhanaprabhṛtyāgnimukhāt kṛtvā pakkāj juhoti: pravedhase kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe ... !{671}! DHN[T] 400: vidyamānatvān. !{672}! DHN[T] 401 om. āpastambasūtre. !{673}! DHN[T] 401: saṃskāreṣu (na) agṛhītatvān niṣekaśabdasmaraṇābhāvāc ca yuṣṃākaṃ niṣekādyasaṃskārā na bhavantīty statt saṃskāraparigaṇane agṛhītatvāc ca teṣāṃ niṣekādyās saṃskārā na bhavantīti.

div.l: [83.1-6] atra āpastambīyā ūcuḥ. "yady asmākaṃ niṣekādyāḥ saṃskārā na bhavantīty ucyate tarhi yuṣmākam api tathaiva, bhavat sūtre 'pi*{674}* >yato etad dhutaḥ prahutaḥ*{675}* āhutaḥ śūlagavo baliharaṇaṃ pratyavarohaṇam aṣṭakā pārvaṇahoma itī

<*{676}*ty ārabhya vivāhādyevoktam - na tu niṣekāditvena. kiñca sūtropakrame*{677}* saṃskāragaṇanāyām api niṣekas tu saṃskāratvena vā śabdamātreṇa vā na pratipāditaḥ. kiñca >caturyyāṃ snātāyom<*{678}* ityādinā pṛthaktvena vidhīyamānasya garbhādhānasya lakṣaṇapratipādanābhāvāt viśiṣya kālanirūpaṇābhāvāc ca.*{679}*>
[83.7] (vaikhānase sūtre eva niṣekāditvena uktatvāc ca vaikhānasānām niṣekāditvam),
[83.8] āvayoḥ*{680}* ubhayor api niṣekādyās saṃskārā na bhavanti iti. ayam eva siddhāntaḥ.*{681}*
[83.9] tathā ca: "niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntās teṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ / [YājñavalkyaDhŚ 1.10cd]
[83.10] garbhādhānam ṛtau puṃsasavanaṃ spandānāt purā* //{682}*" [YājñavalkyaDhŚ 1.11ab]

[83.11-14] iti yājñavalkyoktau teṣām iti śabdena "mukhye sambhavaty amukhyakalpanāyogād" iti nyāyena mukhyatvena śrīvaikhānasasūtre eva niṣekāditvasya vidyamānatvāt vaikhānasā eva parāmṛśyante iti - teṣām eva niṣekāditvam, itareṣāṃ niṣekāditvaṃ na sambhavati. api tu garbhādhānāditvam eva. ayam eva yājñavalkyābhiprāyaḥ.*{683}*

lg.l: [83.15-20] athocyete*{684}*. garbhādhānalakṣaṇam anuktaṃ viśiṣya kālaś cānukta iti yad uktam tatrocyate - sarveṣāṃ kāraṇabhūtena paramācāryeṇa vikhanasā praṇīte śrīvaikhānasasūtre "atha gṛhītagarbhāliṅgāni śarīrāṭopaḥ sakthisīdanaṃ dveṣo bhartur arucir āhāre lālāprakopaḥ kharatā vācaḥ sphuraṇaṃ yoner iti garbhasya daivānubandhaṃ jñātvā āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇye punnāmni śubhe nakṣatre"*{685}* ityādinā garbhādhānalakṣaṇakālayor api vaikhānasasūtre pratipāditvāt:*{686}*
[83.22] sarvaiḥ sa dharmo 'nuṣṭheyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā* //{687}*"

div.l: [83.23] iti bhṛguṇoktatvāt "anuktam*{688}* anyato grāhyam" iti nyāyāt vikhanasaḥ*{689}* ācāryatvena
[83.24-25] bhāratādiṣu pratipāditavyāc ca "anuktāṃśeṣu vaikhānasoktaprakāreṇa asmābhir api kartuṃ yuktam" iti. etad eva yuktataram. Tathāhi:*{690}*

div.note: !{676}! Bezug auf den ersten Satz im BaudhGṛS (1.1.1): yatho etad dhutaḥ prahuta āhutaś śūlagavo baliharaṇaṃ pratyavarohaṇam aṣṭakāhoma iti pākayajñasaṃsthā iti. S.a. DHN[D] 85.15.
!{678}! Lies: caturthyāṃ snātāyām. Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 1.7.37ff.; s.a. DHN[D] 82.18-19.
!{681}! DHN[T] 403 statt DHN[D] 83.7-8: niṣekāditvena śrīvaikhānase sūtre uktatvāc ca ubhayor api niṣekādyās saṃskārā na bhavanti.
!{682}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 85.3-4 zitiert.

!{683}! DHN[T] 404 statt DHN[D] 83.11-14: yājñavalkyena teṣām ity uktatvāt "mukhye sambhavaty amukhyakalpa nāyogād" iti nyāyena mukhyatvena śrīvaikhānasasūtre vidyamānatvāc ca itareṣāṃ niṣekāditvaṃ na sambhavati.

!{685}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 3.10: atha gṛhītagarbhāliṅgāni śarīrāṭopaḥ sakthisīdanaṃ dveṣo bhartur arūcirāhāro lālāprakopaḥ kharatā vācaḥ spuraṇaṃ yoner iti garbhasya daivānubandhaṃ jñātvāpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇye puṃnāmni śubhe nakṣatra ājyenāghāraṃ hutvā tāṃ maṅgalayuktām upaveśya pariṣicya dhātādi pañca vāruṇaṃ mūlahomaṃ sviṣṭākāraṃ ca hutvā vṛṣo 'sīti yavān dadāti.

!{686}! DHN[T] 405 statt DHN[D] 83.15-20: athocyate. garbhādhānalakṣaṇam apy anuktaṃ viśiṣya kālaś cānukta iti tat sarveṣāṃ kāraṇabhūtena paramācāryeṇa vikhanasā praṇīte vaikhānasasūtre "atha gṛhītagarbhāliṅgāni śarīrāṭopaḥ sakthisīdanaṃ dveṣā bhartur arucir āhāro lālāprakopaḥ kharatā vācaḥ sphuraṇaṃ yoner iti garbhasya daivānubandhaṃ jñātvāpūryamāṇapakṣe punnāmni śubhe nakṣatre" ityādinā garbhādhānalakṣaṇakālayor api pratipāditvāt.
!{687}! DHN[T] 406: vicāraṇeti; dieser Vers ist als "Purātantra" zitiert in DHN[D] 35.2-3 und als "Ānandasaṃhitā" (ĀS 4.49) zitiert in DHN[D] 14.11-12.
!{690}! DHN[T] 407: bhārate: "vaikhānasavikhanasācārye"ty ādi statt etad eva yuktataram. tathāhi.

div.l: [84.1-10] āpastambādīnām ācāryeṇa bodhāyanena svaśiṣyān prati*{691}* "athātra pākayajñānāṃ prāyaścittir" ity ārabhya "vyāhṛtīnāṃ prayoge ayathākṛtaṃ yathākṛtaṃ*{692}* bhavatīty ācāryā bruvate. tatrāpy udāharanti"*{693}* iti, "caturthīprabhṛtyā ṣoḍaśīm uttarām uttarām*{694}* upaiti. prajāniḥśreyasam ṛtugamanam ity ācāryāḥ. sarvāṇy upagamanāni mantravanti bhavantīti bodhāyanaḥ. yac cādau yac cartāv iti śālīkir"*{695}* iti - "athāsyātithayo bhavanti guros samānavṛttir vaikhānasaḥ snātako rājā vā dharmayuktaḥ. teṣām abhyutthāyāsanaṃ pādyam arhaṇam arghyaṃ vā prajuñjīta"*{696}* iti - "ekam agnihotraṃ sāyam upakramaṃ prātar apavargam ācāryā bruvate tatrodāharanti" iti, "vaikhānasānāṃ na druhyet" ityādi sūtreṣu "ācāryā bruvate" iti nirdiṣṭaḥ ācāryaḥ vaikhānasa eveti vaktuṃ yuktam*{697}* - manvādīnāṃ śārīrasaṃskāravaktṛtvābhāvāt, bodhāyanena pratipāditasya vaikhānasasūtre vidyamānatvāt,
[84.11] "guroḥ samānavṛttir vaikhānasaḥ"*{698}* iti bodhāyanenaivoktatvāt, "vikhanasācārye"ti.*{699}*

[84.12-13] bhārate pratipāditvāc ca. tathā ca sarveṣāṃ kāraṇabhūtena vikhanasā praṇītatvāt tatsūtroktaprakāreṇa sarvaiḥ*{700}* kartuṃ yuktam eva. kiñca araṇyādipātralakṣaṇam api tatraiva pratipāditam.
[84.14] anye 'py āhuḥ. "asmākam api niṣekāditvaṃ*{701}* samānam" iti. tad apy asat.
[84.15] garbhādhānaśabdasyārthe vicāryamāṇe "yoniṃ praviśad indriyaṃ garbho jarāyuṇā vṛta"*{702}* iti

[84.16-20] pramāṇena garbhagole praviṣṭasya retasa eva garbhaśabdavācyatvam avagamyate. na tv itarasya kevala retasaḥ. tathā - "āsiñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu" iti niṣekakriyānantarabhāvitvāt garbhādhānasya, niṣekasya tu pratyārtavaṃ kartuṃ vyogyatāsambhavāt adhṛtaretasaḥ srāvadoṣaprasaṅgāt śrutismṛtivirodhāt pratyakṣavirodhāṅ ca niṣeka eva garbhādhānam iti vaktum ayuktam.*{703}*
[84.21] atha niṣekāditve ko viśeṣa iti cet - ucyate*{704}*. niṣekādikriyāvatām eva

lg.l: [84.22] śrotriyatvaṃ dharmaśāstrādhikāritvaṃ brahmaśarīritvañ*{705}* ca bodhāyanādibhir uktam. yathā:
[84.25] śrotriyā iti vijñeyāḥ śākhāpārāś ca ye dvijāḥ /
[84.26] vidhivat gṛhyate pāṇim ṛtau cīrṇavratās tu te*{706}* //

div.p: !{691}! DHN[T] 407 bodhāyanaḥ statt āpastambādīnām ācāryeṇa bodhāyanena svaśiṣyān prati. !{692}! DHN[T] 407: yathāvad. !{693}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 4.4.1-4: atha pākayajñānāṃ prāyaścittiḥ (1). tad yathā: dravyahavir mantrakarmādīnām atipannaskannabhinnabhagnanaṣṭaduṣṭaviparītadagdhāśṛtyanikṛtānām anāmnā teṣu juhuyāt: 'mano jyotiḥ, ayāś cāgne, yadāsmin karmāṇi, svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ'; iti. vyāhṛtibhiś ca (2). vyāhṛtīnāṃ prayoge yathākṛtaṃ yathāvad bhavatīty ācārya bruvate (3). tatrodāharanti: bhūr ity ṛco bhuva iti yajuṃṣi suvar iti sāmāni (4). !{694}! DHN[T] 407 ins. yugmām. !{695}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 1.7.45-48: sa evam eva caturthīprabhṛtyā ṣoḍaśīm uttarām uttarāṃ yaugmām upaiti (45). prajāniśśreyasam ṛtugamanam ity ācāryāḥ (46). sarvāṇy upagamanāni mantravanti bhavantīti bodhāyanaḥ (47). yac cādau yac cartāv iti śālikiḥ (48). !{696}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 2.9.17-18: athāsmā atithir bhavati guros samānavṛttir vaikhānaso vā gṛhastho vānaprasthaḥ parivrājako gataśrīs snātako rājā vā dharmayuktaḥ (17). teṣām abhyutthāyāsanaṃ pādyam arhaṇam arghyaṃ vā prayuñīta (18); s.a. DHN[D] 10.6. !{697}! DHN[T] 408: ityādibhir āpastambādīnām ācāryeṇa bodhāyanena svaśiṣyān "pratyācāryā bruvata" iti vaktum yuktatvāt statt ityādi sūtreṣu "ācāryā bruvate" iti nirdiṣṭaḥ ācāryaḥ vaikhānasa eveti vaktuṃ yuktam. !{698}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 2.9.17. !{699}! MBh 12.325.004J-K. !{700}! DHN[T] 409 om. sarvaiḥ. !{701}! DHN[T] 409 om. niṣekāditvaṃ. !{702}! Auch zitiert in DHN[D] 81.14. !{703}! DHN[T] 411-412 statt DHN[D] 84.16-20: garbhagole praviṣṭasya retasa eva garbhaśabdavācyatvam na tv itarasya tathā "āsiñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu" iti niṣekakriyāntarbhāvitvāt pratyārtavaṃ kartavyayogyatā sambhavāt adhṛtaretasaḥ srāvadoṣaprasaṅgāc chrutismṛtivirodhāt pratyakṣavirodhāṅ ca niṣeka eva garbhādhānam iti vaktum ayuktam. !{704}! DHN[T] 412: niṣekādir vā astu ko viśeṣaḥ iti cet statt atha niṣekāditve ko viśeṣa iti cet - ucyate. !{705}! DHN[T] 412: brahmaśarīratvañ. !{706}! DHN[T] 413: cīrṇavratāv ubhau.

div.l: [85.3] yājñavalkya: "niṣekādyāḥ*{708}* śmaśānāntāḥ teṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ / [YājñavalkyaDhŚ 1.10cd]
[85.4] garbhādhānam ṛtau puṃsassavanaṃ spandanāt purā* //{709}*" iti [YājñavalkyaDhŚ 1.11ab]

lg.l: [85.6] tasya śāstre 'dhikāro 'smin jñeyo nānyasya kasyacit //" iti [ManuDhŚ 2.16]

div.l: [85.7-8] atra manuvākye "yasya - tasya - kasyacit" ityādi śabdānāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt "sarveṣāṃ niṣekāditvaṃ samānam" iti vaktum ayuktam.
[85.9] āśvamedhike bhagavān: "vaidikaiḥ karmabhiḥ puṇyaiḥ niṣekādir dvijanmanām* /{711}*
[85.10] kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ pāvanaḥ pretya ceha ca // [MB.h 14, App. 4.2513]
[85.11] gārbhair homair jātakarma*{712}*nāmacaulopanāyanaiḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.2514]
[85.12] svādhyāyaiś ca tapobhiś ca*{713}* vivāhasnātakavrataiḥ // [MBh 14, App. 4.2515]
[85.13] mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ /" iti [MBh 14, App. 4.2516]
[85.14] evam anyatrāpi draṣṭavyam.
[85.15] bodhāyanena "yato etad dhutam*{714}*" ityādinā sūtrādau vivāhapūrvakatvenoktam.

[85.16-21] āpastambena "atha karmāṇy ācārādyāni gṛhyante*{715}*" ity ārabhya "upanayanaṃ vyākhyāsyāma" iti. bhāradvājasatyāṣāḍhābhyām āśvalāyanena ca "uktāni vaitānikānī"*{716}*ty ārabhya vaiśvadevapūrvakatvena. drāhyāyaṇena*{717}* "athāto gṛhyakarmāṇi, udagayanapūrvapakṣa"*{718}* ity ārabhya ācārāditvena. kātyāyanaś ca "athāto gṛhyasthālīpākānāṃ karme"*{719}*ty ārabhya pratipāditavān. "atha niṣekādisaṃskārān vyākhyāsyāma"*{720}* ity ārabhya niṣekapūrvakatvena bhagavatā vikhanasaiva*{721}* pratipāditam.

[85.22-24] evaṃ ca niṣekapūrvakatvenoktatvād*{722}* asya sarvasūtrottamatvaṃ etatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhānenaiva tatsūtriṇāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatvañ copapadyate iti śrutismṛtipurāṇādimukhena pratipāditam iti nirūpitaḥ pañcamo hetuḥ.
[85.25] iti pañcamahetunirūpaṇam

div.p: !{707}! DHN[T] 413: mantravatsamprayoge tau. !{708}! DHN[T] 413: niṣekādiś. !{709}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 83.9-10 zitiert; DHN[T] 413 ins. (bahir iti). !{710}! DHN[T] 413 mit ManuDhŚ: mantrair yasyodito vidhiḥ. !{711}! MBh 14, App. 4.2512. !{712}! MBh: garbhahomair jātakarma. !{713}! MBh: svādhyāyais tadvrataiś caiva. !{714}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛS 1.1.1, auch in DHN[D] 83.1-3 zitiert (s.o.). DHN[T] 414 : dhuta. !{715}! DHN[T] 414: karmaṇyācārādhyāni gṛhyanta. !{716}! Bezug auf ĀśvalāyanaGṛS 1.1.1: uktāni vaitānikāni gṛhyāni vakṣyāmaḥ. !{717}! DHN[T] 415: drāhyāyaṇena. !{718}! Drāhyāyaṇagṛhyasūtra? !{719}! Kātyāyanagṛhyasūtra? !{720}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 1.1 (s.o.). !{721}! DHN[T] 416: vikhanasā. !{722}! Vgl. DHN[D] 2.7: niṣekasaṃskārādimatvāt.

div.l: [86.1] atha ṣaṣṭhahetunirūpaṇam

[86.2-4] athedānīṃ śrīvaikhānasasūtroktadharmānuṣṭhātṝṇām eva sarvebhyaḥ śreṣṭhamatvaṃ sūtrāntareṣv anuktaṃ śrutisiddhāṣṭādaśasaṃskāravatvaṃ kriyābāhulyañ ca sambhavatīti jñāpayituṃ "aṣṭādaśasaṃskārapratipādakatvād" iti ṣaṣṭho hetur nirūpyate. tathā hi:

[86.5-8] "atha niṣekādisaṃskārān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ṛtusaṅgamana-garbādhāna-puṃsavana-sīmanta-viṣṇubali-jātakarmotthāna-nāmakaraṇānnaprāśana-pravāsāgamana-piṇḍavardhana-caulopanayana-pārāyaṇa-vratabandhavisargopākarma-samāvartana-pāṇigrahaṇānīty aṣṭādaśa-saṃskārāś śārīrāḥ"*{723}* iti aṣṭādaśasaṃskārāḥ sūtre pratipāditāḥ. ete ca
[86.9-10] śrutisiddhāḥ. yathā muṇḍopaniṣadi - "plavā hy ete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktam avaraṃ yeṣu karma. etac chreyo ye 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punar evāpi yanti"*{724}* iti.
[86.11] atra kecid evam ūcuḥ: "yajñasya rtvijaṣ ṣoḍaśa sadasyassaptadaśaḥ yajamāno 'ṣṭādaśaḥ"

[86.12-14] iti śrutyanusāreṇa "aṣṭādaśoktam avaraṃ yeṣu karme"*{725}*ty atra yajamānādaya eva vivakṣitā iti. tad asat. "aṣṭādaśoktam avaraṃ karmayeṣu" ity uktatvāt. ṛtvigyajamānādayo hi yāgakartāraḥ na tu karma. "yeṣu" ity asya padasya yeṣu sūtreṣv ity arthaḥ.

[86.15-18] 'avaraṃ karma'; jātakādayaḥ, smārtakarmatvāt. ātmaguṇarahitā yāgadayaḥ jātakarmādayaś ca. 'adṛḍhāḥ plavāḥ'; saṃsārottārakā na bhavanti. tathā ca atra adṛḍhaplavatvena ninditā saṃskārāḥ yāgādayaś ca ātmaguṇarahitā eva vivakṣitāḥ. tat sahitānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣasādhakatvam. yathā:

[86.19-21] gautamadharme: "yasya tu khalu catvāriṃśatsaṃskārā na cāṣṭāvātmaguṇāḥ na sa brahmaṇas sāyujyaṃ sālokyañ ca gacchati. yasya khalu catvāriṃśatsaṃskārāṇām ekadeśo py aṣṭāv ātmaṇāḥ atha sa brahmaṇas sāyujyaṃ sālokyañ ca gacchati gacchatī"*{726}*ti.
[86.22-23] 'aṣṭāv ātmaguṇāḥ': "dayā samastabhūteṣu kṣāntir anasūyā śaucam anāyāso maṅgalyam akārpaṇyam aspṛhe"*{727}* ti. tallakṣaṇāni tu:

lg.l: [86.24] "abandhau bandhuvarge vā mitre dveṣṭari vā tathā /
[86.25] āpanne rakṣaṇaṃ yat tu dayaiṣā parikīrtitā //

div.p: !{723}! VaikhSmS 1.1. !{724}! MuṇḍakaU 1.2.7: plavā hy ete adṛḍhā yajñarūpā aṣṭādaśoktam avaraṃ yeṣu karma. etac chreyo ye 'bhinandanti mūḍhā jarāmṛtyuṃ te punar evāpiyanti. !{725}! MuṇḍakaU 1.2.7. !{726}! Bezug auf GautamaDhS 1.8.25(8.24): yasyaite catvāriṃśatsaṃskārā na caāṣṭāv ātmaguṇā na sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ gacchati / und GautamaDhS 1.8.26(8.25): yasya tu khalu catvāriṃśataṃskārāṇām ekadeśo 'py aṣṭāv ātmaguṇā atha sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ ca gacchati. !{727}! Bezug auf GautamaDhS 1.8.24(8.23): dayā sarvabhūteṣu kṣāntir anasūyā śaucam anāyāso maṅgalam akārpaṇyam aspṛheti.

lg.l: [87.1] bāhye vā 'bhyantare vāpi duḥkha utpādite paraiḥ /
[87.2] na prakupyati no hanti sā kṣamā parikīrtitā //
[87.3] saguṇān guṇi*{728}* no hanti (?) stauti mandaguṇān api /
[87.6] svadharme ca vyavasthānaṃ śaucam etad udāhṛtam //
[87.10] etad dhi maṅgalaṃ proktam ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ //

div.l: [87.15] prasaṅgād idam uktam. prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ.
[87.16-17] atha aṣṭādaśasmṛtyuktāni aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣūktānīti vā muṇḍakaśrutyartho 'stu iti cet. tad apy asat. smṛtipurāṇādiṣu aṣṭādaśakarmeti viśiṣyānuktatvāt.

lg.l: [87.18-20] atra *{729}* "aṣṭādaśoktam avaraṃ karma yeṣv"*{730}* iti sāmānyenoktatvāt tatroktānāṃ yogādīnām apy apavargaprāpakatvābhāvāt punar api jarāmṛtyuprāpakatvāc ca na smṛtipurāṇeṣūktānīti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ kiñ ca
[87.21] pādmapurāṇe: "vaiṣṇavaḥ*{731}* nāradīyañ ca tathā bhāgavataṃ śubhaṃ /
[87.22] gāruḍañ ca tathā pādmaṃ vārāhaṃ śubhadarśane // [Padma.P uttarabhāga 236.19]

div.p: !{728}! Lies: guṇī. !{729}! Anm. des Herausgebers: atra aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu smṛtiṣu coktānāṃ śrautasmārtakarmaṇām eva avaram iti paryudāso na paryāptaḥ. tatroktayogādīnām api keṣāñcit jīrṇaplavatvasya siddhatvād iti bhāvaḥ. !{730}! MuṇḍakaU 1.2.7. !{731}! PadmaP: vaiṣṇavaṃ.

div.l: [88.1] sāttvikāni purāṇāni vijñeyāni ca ṣaṭ pṛthak* /{732}*
[88.2] brahmāṇḍaṃ brahmakaivartaṃ*{733}* mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tathaiva ca // [Padma.P uttarabhāga 236.20]
[88.3] bhaviṣyad vāmanaṃ brāhmaṃ rājasāni ca ṣaḍvidhāḥ*{734}* / [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.21ab]

lg.l: [88.4] mātsyaṃ kaurmaṃ tathā laiṅgaṃ śaivaṃ skāndaṃ tathaiva ca /
[88.5] āgneyañ ca ṣaḍ etāni tāmasāni nibodha me //" iti [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.18]
[88.6] mātsye: "saṅkīrṇās tāmasāś caiva rājasās sāttvikās tathā /
[88.7] kalpāś caturvidhāḥ proktāḥ brahmaṇo divasāś ca te /
[88.8] yasmin kalpe tu yatproktaṃ purāṇaṃ brahmaṇā purā // [MatsyaP]
[88.9] tasya tasya tu māhātmyaṃ tena rūpeṇa vartate /
[88.12] rājaseṣu tu māhātmyam adhikaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ // [MatsyaP]
[88.13] sāttvikeṣv atha kalpeṣu māhātmyam adhikaṃ hareḥ /
[88.14] teṣv eva yogasaṃsiddhā gamiṣyanti parāṃ gatiṃ //" iti [MatsyaP]

div.l: [88.15] pādme: "vāsiṣṭhañ caiva hārītaṃ vyāsaṃ pārāśaraṃ tathā // [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.23cd]

lg.l: [88.17] mānavaṃ yajñavalkyañ ca ātreyaṃ dākṣyam eva ca* //{735}* [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.24]
[88.19] gautamaṃ bārhaspatyañ ca sāṃvartañ ca yamasmṛtiḥ* //{736}* [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.25]

div.l: [88.20] śāmbham auśanasañ caiva smṛtiṣaṭkantu tāmasam* //{737}*" iti [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.26ab]
[88.21] tathā: "sāttvikā mokṣadā jñeyā rājasāḥ svargadāḥ smṛtāḥ* /{738}* [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.21cd]
[88.22] tathaiva tāmasā devi nirayaprāptihetavaḥ //" [PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.22ab]
[88.23-24] ityādi vacanasiddhasātvikapurāṇeṣu pratipāditānāṃ bhagavadārādhanādīnāṃ mokṣahetutvasmaraṇāt, sāmanyena aṣṭādaśapurāṇoktakarmaṇāṃ jīrṇaplavasādṛśyaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam.

div.p: !{732}! PadmaP: sāttvikāni purāṇāni vijñeyāni śubhāni vai. !{733}! PadmaP: brahmāṇḍaṃ brahmavaivarttaṃ. !{734}! PadmaP: bhaviṣyaṃ vāmanaṃ brāhmaṃ rājasāni nibodha me. !{735}! PadmaP: bhāradvājaṃ kāśyapaṃ ca sātvikā muktidāḥ śubhāḥ / yajñavalkyaṃ tathātreyaṃ taittiriṃ dākṣam eva ca. !{736}! PadmaP: kātyāyanaṃ vaiṣṇavañ ca rājasāḥ svargadāḥ śubhāḥ / gautamaṃ bārhaspatyañ ca sāṃvartañ ca yamasmṛtam. !{737}! PadmaP: śāṅkhyaṃ cauśanasañ ceti tāmasā nirayapradāḥ. !{738}! PadmaP: sāttvikā mokṣadāḥ proktā rājasāḥ sarvadā śubhāḥ; vgl. PadmaP uttarabhāga 236.25b: rājasāḥ svargadāḥ śubhāḥ.

div.l: [89.1-2] anyathā svargamokṣanirayāṇām ekarūpatvāṅgīkārāpātāt. ataḥ śrīmadvaikhānasasūtroktāṣṭādaśasaṃskārā evety avagantavyam. bodhāyanasūtre saṃskārasaṅkhyā na kṛtā.
[89.3-5] āpastambādināpi pañcamahāyajñānāṃ nityahomasya ca pākayajñatvenāṅgīkārāt ete ṣoḍasaṃskārā iti vivicyānuktatvāt aparasaṃskārapratipādanābhāvāc ca na tatroktāḥ gṛhītuṃ śakyāḥ.

[89.6-8] śrīvaikhānase tu kriyābāhulyam apy asti. tathā hi. aṣṭādaśasaṃskārāḥ pākayajñāś ca pṛthaktvenopapaditāḥ. varṣavardhanādyāstu viśeṣāḥ. pañcamahāyajñasahitā dvāviṃśadyajñāḥ - pañcamahāyajñānām ekatvam. aparaś cāṣṭādaśavyatirikta iti.
[89.9] kriyābāhulyena kim ādhikyam iti cet - ucyate. muṇḍopaniṣadi -
[89.10] "kriyāvān eṣa brahmavidāṃ variṣṭhaḥ*{739}*" iti "kriyāvantaḥ śrotriyā brahmaṇiṣṭhāḥ svayaṃ juhvata
[89.11] ekarṣiṃ śraddhayantaḥ. teṣām evaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta*{740}*" iti ca śrūyate.

[89.12-15] bodhāyanaḥ: "tasmād yaḥ kaścana kriyāvān satām anumatācāras sa śrotriyas sa eva vijñeyas sa eva vijñeyaḥ" iti. kiñca - karmabhūyastvāt phalabhūyastvañ ca "yathopāsanaṃ phalam" iti nyāyāt siddhyati. ataḥ: aṣṭādaśasaṃskārāpratipādakatvād asya sūtrasya śreṣṭḥatvaṃ etas sūtriṇāṃ sarvotkṛṣṭatvañ copapadyata iti nirūpitaḥ ṣaṣṭho hetuḥ.
[89.16] iti ṣaṣṭhahetunirūpaṇam.

div.p: !{739}! Bezug auf MuṇḍakaU 3.1.4: prāṇo hy eṣa yaḥ sarvabhūtair vibhāti vijānan vidvān bhavate nātivādī. ātmakrīḍa ātmaratiḥ kriyāvān eṣa brahmavidāṃ variṣṭhaḥ. !{740}! Bezug auf MuṇḍakaU 3.2.10: tad etad ṛcābhyuktam. kriyāvantaḥ śrotriyā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ svayaṃ juhvata ekarṣiṃ śraddhayantaḥ. teṣām evaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivad yais tu cīrṇam.

div.l: [90.1-3] atha śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya itarasūtrāpekṣābhāvāt svātantryam astīti jñāpayituṃ sāṅgakriyākalāpavattvād iti saptamo hetur nirūpyate. tathā hi: atrasūtre aṣṭādaśasaṃskārāḥ śārīrāḥ prasiddhās sāṅgāḥ eva pratipāditāḥ.

[90.4-8] nanu - aṅkurārpaṇaśatābhiṣekāgnidvayasaṃsargaputraparigrahabrahmamedhavṛṣotsarjanādipratipādanābhavāt sāṅgakriyākalāpavattvaṃ nāstīti cet - tad asat. iyaṃ śaṅkā śrīvaikhānasasūtrasvarūpānabhijñatvakṛtā. idaṃ sūtram ekādaśapraśnātmakam. atra na pratipāditānīti uktiḥ, atiriktatvena gṛhyapariśiṣṭasadbhāvājñānāt. gṛhyapariśiṣṭasadbhāvaḥ katham avagamyate iti cet - ucyate.

lg.l: [90.10-11] "sāyaṃ sthaṇḍile sahasraṃ piṣṭena somarūpāṇi karotī"ty atra viśeṣeṇa sthaṇḍilādipratipādanam.

div.l: [90.15] udīcīś ca tathā rekhā dvatriṃśatsaṃkhyayā*{742}* likhet*{743}* //" [GṛhyapariśiṣṭaS]
[90.16] ityādinā śatābhiṣekaprayogaś ca uktaḥ.

lg.l: [90.19] carmābhāve kaṭaṃ vāpi tad ūrdhve vastram āstared*{744}* //" iti [GṛhyapariśiṣṭaS]
[90.21] visṛjāmi vratañ ceti tadvrataṃ carma santyajet //"*{746}* [GṛhyapariśiṣṭaS]

div.l: [90.22] ityādinā agnidvayasaṃsargaprakāraś ca pratipāditaḥ.

div.p: !{741}! Dieser Halbvers ist als "Gṛhya" ebenfalls zitiert in TPC 491.4. !{742}! "Gṛhya" in TPC: dvāviṃśatsaṃkhyayā. !{743}! Diese drei Halbverse sind auch als "Gṛhya" in TPC 494.13-15 zitiert. !{744}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Gṛhya" in TPC 365.3-4 zitiert. !{745}! "Gṛhya" in TPC: śeṣahome tu homānte āsīnau tatra carmaṇi. !{746}! Dieser Vers ist als "Gṛhya" auch in TPC 401.19-20 zitiert.

div.l: [91.1] putraparigrahaprakāraś ca
[91.2] "tyāgavikrayadāneṣu prokteṣv api tatas smṛtau* /{747}*
[91.3] ekaṃ na dadyān no gṛhyāt na strī bhartrananujñayā //"*{748}* ityādinā [GṛhyapariśiṣṭaS]
[91.10] evaṃ atrānuktāni sarvāṇi gṛhyapariśiṣṭe proktāni iti veditavyam.

lg.l: [91.11-15] bodhāyanādibhir apy ete sāṅgā eva pratipāditā iti cet - na. "sati kuḍye cikrakarme" ti nyāyena pradhānakarmāṇi pratipāditāni cet aṅgavicāraḥ kartavyaḥ. sandhyopāsane arghyapradānādikam anuktam. vānaprasthāśramasvīkaraṇādikam api na pratipāditam. vānaprasthāśramasvīkaraṇāsvīkaraṇāraṇyāharaṇapātralakṣaṇādiṣu vaikhānasasūtrāpekṣā asty eva. devatāpratiṣṭhādikam uktaṃ lakṣaṇam anuktam.
[91.16-18] āpastambādibhiḥ sandhyopāsanāṅkurapratisaradevatārādhanayajñopavītadhāraṇādikam apy anuktam. āpastambādīnām anyonyāpekṣā prasiddhā. anyonyāpekṣā nāma asvātantryam aṅgahīnavat.
[91.19] manu: "yad yat paravaśaṃ karma tat tad yatnena varjayet // [ManuDhŚ 4.159cd]
[91.20] sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /

div.l: [91.22-23] anena anantasthiraphalaprāptir darśitā. ataḥ sūtrāntaranairapekṣyāt sarvasūtrottamatvaṃ svātantryañ ca ghaṭata iti nirūpitas saptamo hetuḥ.
[91.24] iti saptamahetunirūpaṇam

div.p: !{747}! "Gṛhya" in TPC: tyāgavikriyadāneṣu yuktau svapitarau smṛtau. !{748}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Gṛhya" in TPC 887.1-2 zitiert. !{749}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert als "Gṛhya" in TPC 747.18-19. !{750}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert als "Gṛhya" in TPC 818.20-21.

div.l: [92.1-3] idānīṃ tāvat śrutismṛtipurāṇādibhiḥ sarvottaratvenāvagatasya śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya akhilaśiṣṭaparigṛhītatvam astīti darśayituṃ manvādyaiḥ svīkṛtatvād iti aṣṭamo hetuḥ nirūpyate. tathā hi
[92.5] manu: "ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ vaikhānasāśramam //"*{751}* ity ārabhya

lg.l: [92.7] kālapakvaiḥ svayaṃ śīrṇair vaikhānasamate sthitaḥ* //{752}*" iti [ManuDhŚ 6.21]

div.l: [92.8] vyāsa: "mūlair eke phalair eke puṣpair eke dṛḍhavratāḥ / [MBh 12.236.13cd]
[92.9] vartayanti yathānyāyaṃ vaikhānasamate sthitāḥ //" iti [MBh 12.236.14ab]
[92.10] gautama: śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāyāgrāmyabhojī" iti*{753}*
[92.11] yama: śrāmaṇakena vidhānena sāyaṃ prātar upaspṛśet. iti
[92.12-13] śaṅkhalikhitau: śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāya kāle kuruvinda - veṇu - śyāmākanīvārādibhir vartayet.*{754}* iti.

[92.14-16] hārīta: vānaprastho grāmyā oṣadhī parivarjayet. tretāgnīnāṃ sthāne śrāmaṇakaṃ vāgnim ādhāya valkalaśāṇacarmakuśamuñjavidalakaṃ vā vasāno vaikhānasaproktena vidhinā vānaprastho vikhanā bhavati. anujñāyiko 'nuprasthāyikaś" ceti
[92.17] vasiṣṭha: śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāyāhitāgnir vṛkṣamūlikaḥ. iti*{755}* [VāsiṣṭhaDhŚ 9.10]
[92.18] bodhāyana: "vānaprastho vaikhānasaśāstrasamudācāraḥ" [BaudhDhS 12.6.11.14]

[92.19-21] āpastamba: "ekāgnir aniketaḥ syād"*{756}* iti. asya dharmakarpardī "gārhapatyādīnāṃ tretāgnīnāṃ sthāne yasyaiko 'gniḥ aupāsana eva - vaikhānasasūtre dṛṣṭatvāt, pāṇigrahaṇanimitvadvādaupāsanasya.
[92.22-23] jaiminīyasūtre saumikacāturmāsyaprakāraṇe. "bhāradvājapūrvaṃ yathā vaikhānasapūrvaṃ pañcaḥ" meti*{757}* (?)

div.p: !{751}! ManuDhŚ 6.1ab v.l. Dieser Halbvers ist ähnlich als "Manu" zitiert in DHN[D] 28.3. !{752}! Dieser Vers ist als "Manu" auch zitiert in DHN[D] 28.4-5. !{753}! Bezug auf GautamaDhS 1.3.26(3.27): śrāvaṇakena [śrāmaṇakena].agnim ādhāya / und auf GautamaDhS 1.3.27(3.28) agrāmyabhojī. !{754}! S.o., DHN[D] 28.10-11. !{755}! VāsiṣṭhaDhŚ: śrāmaṇakenāgnim ādhāyāhitāgnis syāt. !{756}! Bezug auf ĀpastambaDhS 2.9.21.20-21: tasyopadiśanti / ekāgnir aniketaḥ syād aśarmāśaraṇo muniḥ / svādhyāya evotsṛjamāno vācam. !{757}! Lies: pañcamaḥ" iti.

div.l: [93.1-2] atrobhayatra ātrivyākhyānam - ṣoḍaśartvijāṃ madhye bhāradvājasūtriṇaṃ prastotāraṃ vaikhānasasūtriṇaṃ pratihartāraṃ varayet" iti.

lg.l: [93.12] vane vā pattane vāpi japed vaikhānasaḥ śuciḥ //

div.l: [93.13] viyuktaḥ putradārādyaiḥ svayam eva vane sthitaḥ //" [PadmaP ]
[93.14] anyair api evam evoktam.
[93.15-16] akhilaśiṣṭaparigrahe ko viśeṣa iti cet - akhilaśiṣṭaparigrahāt prāmāṇyātiśayo 'stīty avagamyate.
[93.17] āśvamedhike: "dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ prathamaṃ śrutiḥ / [MBh 14, App. 4.2492]
[93.18] dvitīyaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ hi*{761}* tṛtīyaṃ lokasaṅgrahaḥ* //{762}*" iti [MBh 14, App. 4.2493]

lg.l: [93.20] hṛdayenābhyanujñāto yo dharmas taṃ nibodhata //" iti [ManuDhŚ 2.1]
[93.21] yājñavalkya: "catvāro vedadharmajñāḥ parṣat traividyam eva vā /
[93.22] sā brūte 'yaṃ sa dharmaḥ syād eko vādhyātmavittamaḥ // [YājñavalkyaDhŚ 1.9]
[93.23] vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
[93.24] yasya pramāṇaṃ na bhavet pramāṇaṃ kas tasya kuryād vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ //

div.p: !{758}! Ebenfalls zitiert als "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 62.16-17. !{759}! Vgl. "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 62.18: āśrame vā vane vā 'pi sa vaikhānasa ucyate /. !{760}! Ebenfalls zitiert als "Kapiñjalasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 62.19. !{761}! MBh: dharmaśāstrāṇi. !{762}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 76.16-17. !{763}! ManuDhŚ: vidvadbhiḥ sevitaḥ sadbhir.

lg.l: [94.1] na yasya vedā na ca dharmaśāstraṃ

div.l: [94.5-9] smṛter api vedamūlatve tredhā nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ. nityānumeyaśrutimūlatvam prābhākarāḥ. "teṣām utsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogād anumīyanta"*{764}* ity utsannaśākhāmūlatvam āpastambādyāḥ. tat prābhākarādhibhiḥ dūṣitaṃ bhāṣyakārānabhimatañ ca. prābhākarapakṣe 'pi nityānumeyaśrutimūlatve akṣaraśo vā ānupūrvīviśeṣaviśiṣṭatvena vā. akṣaraśa iti yady ucyate tarhi kaṭatapayādīnām api nityānumeyaśrutimūlatvāt smṛtitvaṃ syāt.

lg.l: [94.10-15] ānupūrvīviśeṣaviśiṣṭatveneti cet nityānumeyatvaṃ bhajyet iti. utsannaśākhāmūlatvam iti pakṣe śākhāsu tatratatrotsannā vā utaikā śākhā utsannā vā. tatratatreti cet na - padakramādirūpeṇādhīyamānatvād utsannaśākhāmūlatvaṃ na ghaṭate. ekaivotsanneti cet - na. viṣṇor aṃśāvatārasya tapoyogabalopetasya sarvavedasākṣāt kāravato vyāsasya ajñātāśāsaṃbhavena ekasyāpi śiṣyasya tad adhyāpanasāmarthyasambhavāt tathā vaktum ayuktatvād iti. ato viprakīrṇaśākhāmūlatvaṃ vaktavyam. tathoktam.
[94.16] "durbodhā vaidikāś śabdāḥ prakīrṇatvāc ca ye khilāḥ /
[94.17] tadjñais ta eva sṣaṣṭārthāḥ*{765}* smṛtitantre pratiṣṭhitāḥ* //{766}*" iti

div.l: [94.18-20] ataḥ śrutismṛtipurāṇādibhiḥ prāmāṇatvenāvagatasya śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya akhilaśiṣṭaparigrahāt prāmāṇyātiśayo 'stīti "manvādyais svīkṛtatvād" iti nirūpito 'ṣṭamo hetuḥ.
[94.21] ity aṣṭamahetunirūpaṇam

div.p: !{764}! Bezug auf ĀpastambaDhS 1.4.12.10: brāhmaṇoktā vidhayas teṣām utsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogād anumīyante /. !{765}! Lies: spaṣṭārthāḥ. !{766}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 3.14-15 zitiert.

lg.l: [95.1-3] athedānīm āpastabādisūtrāntaraniṣṭhānāṃ sūtrakārād ārabhya avicchinnatvena paramparayā ekāntitvaṃ nāstīti jñāpayituṃ vaikhānasasūtriṇām eva tat sambhavatīti darśayituṃ.

div.l: [95.6-7] iti manusmaraṇānusāreṇa pratyakṣādibhir avagamayituñ ca akhilajagadekakāraṇabhūtaśrīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvād iti navamo hetur nirūpyate.
[95.8] asya sūtrasya nārāyaṇaikaparatve:

[95.11-17] ity uktāni ṣaḍvidhāni tātparyaliṅgāni santi. tathā hi ādyapraśne prathamakhāṇḍe "nārāyaṇaparāyaṇa"*{768}* ity uktam. evaṃ "sadādhyātmarato dhyānayogī nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma paśyan dhāraṇaṃ dhārayed akṣaraṃ paraṃ brahmāpnoti - "nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahmeti śrutiḥ" ity upasaṃhāre sannyāsavidhau pratipāditam. sandhyopāsanādi - puṇyāhāghārāntahoma - nāndīmukhopanayana - pāṇigrahaṇaparyanteṣu antakarmaṇi ca ato devādivaiṣṇavā mantrāḥ viniyuktāḥ. evaṃ āghāraprakaraṇe "śaro 'ṅgāre 'gnau juhuyād" iti sūtreṇa idhmādhānaṃ taittirīyabrāhmaṇavākyānusāreṇa parabrahmāgnau vihitam.

div.p: !{767}! ManuDhŚ: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam / trayaṃ suviditaṃ kāryaṃ dharmaśuddhim abhīpsatā. !{768}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 1.1: nārāyaṇaparāyaṇo nirdvandvo munir iti saṃskāraviśeṣāt pūrvāt pūrvāt parovarīyān iti vijñāyate.

div.l: [95.18-96.5] parabrahmaśabdābhidheyaś ca bhagavān nārāyaṇa eveti vedānteṣu nirṇītam. tathāhi: "sad eva somyedamagra āsīt, ekam evādvitīyam" ityādibhiḥ pratipannasya abhinnanimittopādānakāraṇasya "yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante - tadbrahme"tyādinā jagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaśabdavācyatvañ ca pratipādyate. tasya "satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahme" tyādinā śodhakavākyena svarūpaṃ nirūpyate. satyatvādiviśiṣṭasya tasya "ānando brahma" iti niratiśayānandarūpatvaṃ pratipādyate. etādṛśabrahmarūpaṃ vastu "nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahma" "tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ" "eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīt" "apahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ" ityādi vākyaiḥ śrīmannārāyaṇa eveti niyamyate. evañ ca "adhyūhante" iti taittirīyavākyaśeṣasthabrahmaśabdo 'pi nārāyaṇapara eveti prakṛtasūtroktedhmādhānam api nārāyaṇaparam eva.

lg.l: [96.6-9] evam ādhāne - "dhyāyan nārāyaṇam upoṣya" iti, agnihotre - bhūmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ dhyāyet" iti, darśapūrṇamāse - "udita āditye dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ 'viṣṇor nu kam'; iti japitvā" iti, some ca - "nārāyaṇaparāyaṇas tūṣṇīm āste" iti ca sarvatrāpi abhyāsena nārāyaṇaparatvenoktatvāt idaṃ sūtraṃ nārāyaṇaparam eva.

[96.10-14] nanu - atra sūtre pravāsāgamane āśvayujyāñ ca "pradakṣiṇam arcanaṃ praṇāmo guhasya" - "bhavaṃ devam āvāhya" ity uktatvāt sarvatra nārāyaṇaparatvam asyeti kathaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate iti cet - ucyate. "aṅgāny anyā devatā" iti aṅgabhūtānāṃ brahmarudrādīnām api yajñāṃśabhāktvaṃ bhagavatprasādalabdham iti bhāratādināvagamyate - tathāhi
[96.15] "tatas te surās sarve brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥ* //{769}* [MBh 12.327.48cd]
[96.17] tasmin satre tathā brahmā svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayat /
[96.18] devā mahārṣayaś caiva sarve bhāgān akalpayan* //{770}* [MBh 12.327.49]
[96.20] prāpur ādityavarṇaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ tamasaḥ param* //{771}* [MBh 12.327.50]

div.l: [96.21] śrībhagavān: yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tathā samupāgataḥ* /{772}*
[96.22] prīto 'haṃ pradiśāmy adya phalam āvṛttilakṣaṇam // [MB.h 12.327.52]

lg.l: [96.23] yajñīye cāpi yakṣyanti sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥ /
[96.24] kalpayiṣyanti vo bhāgāṃs te narā vedakalpitān* //{773}* [MBh 12.327.54]

div.p: !{769}! MBh: tatas te vibudhāḥ sarve brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥ. !{770}! MBh: vedadṛṣṭena vidhinā vaiṣṇavaṃ kratum āharan / tasmin satre tadā brahmā svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayat / devā devarṣayaś caiva sarve bhāgān akalpayan. !{771}! MBh: te kārtayugadharmāṇo bhāgāḥ paramasatkṛtāḥ / prāpur ādityavarṇaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ tamasaḥ param. !{772}! MBh: yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tathā samupāgataḥ. !{773}! MBh: yajñair ye cāpi yakṣyanti sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥ / kalpayiṣyanti vo bhāgāṃs te narā vedakalpitān.

lg.l: [97.1] yo me yathā kalpitavān bhāgam asmin mahākratau /
[97.2] sa mahāyajñabhāgārho vedasūtre mayā kṛtaḥ //"*{774}* iti [MBh 12.327.55]
[97.4] sarve vayaṃ yanniyamaṃ prapannā mūrdhnārpitaṃ lokadhuraṃ vahāmaḥ //"*{775}*
[97.5] evaṃ ca bhavādīnām api nārāyaṇāṅgatvena pūjārhatvāvagamāt.
[97.7] svatantrabuddhyā kurvan hi brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajet //
[97.8] brahmāṇam indram agniṃ vā harer āvaraṇaṃ vinā /
[97.9] yas tu sampūjayed vipraḥ sa pāṣaṇḍī bhaved dhruvam //"
[97.10] ityādinā aṅgabhāvena teṣām arcanaṃ kurvato doṣābhāvasmaraṇāc ca sūtre tathoktiḥ.
[97.11] tathā: "anyatra tvāṃ samāropya yady upāsā vidhīṃyate*{776}* /
[97.12] sā vṛttiḥ pracyutā proktā tava tattvaṃ tathaiva ca // [KJ.K ]
[97.13] tvayi sarvaṃ samāropya yady upāsā vidhīyate /
[97.14] sā vṛttiḥ sakalā jñeyā tava tattvaṃ tavaiva hi //" [KJK ]

div.l: [97.15-18] iti jñānakāṇḍe kaśyapenopāsanasvarūpabhedapradarśanāt "viṣṇor nityārcā sarvadevārcā bhavatī"*{777}*ti mukhyatvena sūtreṇa pratipāditatvāt pracyutiphalapradatvābhāvāc ca teṣām aṅgabhāvena pūjanaṃ yujyate. āpastambādisūtreṣu sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ sadvārakatvena pratipādanāt nārāyaṇaikaparatvena sakṛd api smaraṇābhavāt teṣāṃ na nārāyaṇaikaparatvam.

[97.19-21] nanu bodhāyanenāpi "athāto viṣṇupratiṣṭhākalpaṃ vyākhyasyāmo dvādaśyām ekādaśyāṃ śroṇāyāṃ vā yāni cānyāni śubhanakṣatrāṇi"*{778}* ity ārabhya "dvādaśanāmabhiḥ amuṣmai svāhā amuṣmai svāhā"*{779}* ityādinā homādikam uktā.

div.p: !{774}! MBh: yo me yathā kalpitavān bhāgam asmin mahākratau / sa tathā yajñabhāgārho vedasūtre mayā kṛtaḥ. !{775}! BhāgavataP 9.4.54: ahaṃ bhavo dakṣabhṛgupradhānāḥ prajeśabhūteśasureśamukhyāḥ / sarve vayaṃ yanniyamaṃ prapannā mūrdhnyārpitaṃ lokahitaṃ vahāmaḥ. !{776}! Lies: vidhīyate. !{777}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 4.10: athāgnau nityahomānte viṣṇor nityārcā sarvadevārcanā bhavati. !{778}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.13.1. !{779}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.13.35.

div.l: [98.1-5] iti nārāyaṇaikaparatvena pratipādanāt kathaṃ teṣāṃ nārāyaṇaikaparatvaṃ nāstīty ucyata iti cet - satyam. āpastambādīnām ācāryeṇānena bodhāyanena nārāyaṇaikaparatvena pratiṣṭhādikam anuktam. kintu. "atha rudrapratiṣṭhāvidhiṃ*{780}* vyākhyāsyāmaḥ. caturthyām aṣṭamyām ārdrāyām apabharaṇyāṃ vā*{781}* yāni cānyāni śubhanakṣatrāṇi" iti prakṛtya "bhavāya devāya svāhe"tyādibhiḥ "bhavasya devasya patnyai svāhe"*{782}*tyādibhiś ca homādikam uktvā [BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.16.1-2]
[98.10] iti śivapratiṣṭhā, evaṃ "athāto mahādevasyāharahaḥ paricaryāvidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ"*{783}*

[98.11-15] ity ārabhya "mahādevam āvāhayet - āyātu bhagavān mahādeva"*{784}* iti pṛthaktvena rudrapūjā ca pratipāditā. tathā - anyatra "athāto 'rdhamāse 'rdhamāse 'ṣṭamyāṃ brāhmaṇāḥ striyaś cāhuḥ" ity ārabhya "atha pradoṣe rudraṃ virūpākṣaṃ sapanīkaṃ*{785}* sasutaṃ sapārṣadam" ityādibhiḥ rudrāvāhanam uktam. evaṃ "ādityam ambikāṃ viṣṇuṃ gaṇanāthaṃ maheśvaram"*{786}* iti pañcapūjā ca. ataḥ bodhāyanasūtraṃ nārāyaṇaikaparaṃ na bhavati.
[98.16-18] atha āpastambādayaḥ kiṃ nārāyaṇaikaparaḥ - ata rudraparāḥ āhosvit nānādevatāparāḥ?. nārāyaṇaikaparā iti cen na. jātikulācārādiṣv āgotraprathamād ārabhya:

lg.l: [98.20] mātā cāsya pitā ca pāśupatinau vaiśeṣiko deśikaḥ /

div.p: !{780}! BaudhGṛŚeṣS: rudrapratiṣṭhākalpaṃ. !{781}! BaudhGṛŚeṣS: vā caturdaśyāṃ vā. !{782}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.16.35: kṛsaram ājyamiśraṃ juhuyāt - 'bhavāya devāya svāhā'; ity aṣṭābhiḥ 'bhavasya devasya patnyai svāhā'; ityādibhiḥ. !{783}! BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.17.1. !{784}! Bezug auf BaudhGṛŚeṣS 2.17.1: snātaś śucis same śucau deśe gomayenopalipya devasya pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvākṣatapuṣpair yathālābham arcayitvā saha puṣpodakena mahādevam āvāhayet - 'oṃ bhūḥ puruṣaṃ āvāhayāmi'; ityādi 'āyātu bhagavān mahādevaḥ'; iti. !{785}! Lies: sapatnīkaṃ. !{786}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 64.12.

div.l: [98.23-99.4] ity uktarītyā eteṣāṃ śaivapāśupatavaiṣṇavādyākariṇa vidyamānatvāt āpastambādisūtrāṇy api nārāyaṇaikaparāṇi na bhavanti. bhagavato nārāyaṇasya samārādhanavidhipratipādanābhāvāc ca. nārāyaṇaikaparañ ced āpastambādisūtraṃ tarhi tatsūtroktadharmānuṣṭhātāraḥ sarve 'pi nārāyaṇaikaparā eva syuḥ. na ca tathā dṛśyate. pāñcarātrādyuktamārgeṇa vaiṣṇavasaṃpādane "svasūtre vidyamāne tu" - "svasūtrasya parityāgāt" - "yas svadharmaṃ parityajya" "vidharmaḥ paradharmaś ca" - śreyā svadharmo viguṇaḥ" - ityādi vacanapratipāditasvasūtraparityāgaparadharmasvīkāraśākhāraṇḍatvādidoṣāḥ prasajyeran.
[99.5-6] "svaśāstranirṇaye satye satyāḥ syur lokanirṇayā" iti svasūtrasya prāmāṇyabuddhiś ca teṣām avarjanīyā.

[99.7-9] vaikhānasānāṃ sūtrakārād ārabhya avicchinnatvena śrīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvenārādhanādikaṃ pratyakṣasiddham. tathā ca sūtram, "gṛhe devāyatane vā bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ nārāyaṇam arcayet tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ gacchatīti vijñāyate" iti*{787}*.

lg.l: [99.10-12] itareṣv āpastambādiṣu pitṛ pitāmaha mātula mātāmaha putra pautra bhrātṛ sambandhiṣu kecic chaivāḥ kecid pāśupatāḥ kecic chāktāḥ nānādevatāparāś cetyevamākāreṇa dṛśyate.
[99.15-16] iti keṣāñcit svakṛtapūrvapuṇyaviśeṣān nārāyaṇaparatvasambhave 'pi svasūtrakāram ārabhya svaparyantam avicchinnatvena tad astīti vaktuṃ na śakyate. ataḥ -
[99.18] narā bhagavat aikantye na sthāsyanti kalau yuge // [VāyuP]

div.l: [99.21-22] iti vāyupurāṇādivacanād āgamādibhir nipuṇaṃ parīkṣya nirṇīta evārthaḥ vipaścidbhiḥ anuṣṭheyaḥ.

[99.23-100.10] nanu - kiṃ arthaṃ nārāyaṇaikaparatvena sūtraṃ praṇītam iti cet - ucyate. nārāyaṇa*{788}* akhilajagadekakāraṇatvāt paraṃbrahmaparamātmādiśabdavācyatvāt apavargādiphalapradatvāt samābhyadhikarahitatvāc ca nārāyaṇaikaparatvena praṇītam. atra - "nārāyaṇād ru*{789}* jāyate. nārāyaṇād indro jāyate. nārāyaṇād dvādaśādityāḥ rudrā vasavas sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni. nārāyaṇād eva samudpadyante. nārāyaṇāt pralīyante" ityādyāḥ "nārāyaṇaparaṃ brahme"ty ārabhya "antarbahiś ca tatsarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ" ity ādyāḥ, "tam eva vidvān amṛta iha bhavati. nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate" "utāmṛtatvasyeśānaḥ" ityādyāḥ, "na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇañ ca vidyate" "na tatsamaścābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate" "parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca" ityādyāḥ, "eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ" ityādyāḥ, "eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīt" ityādyāḥ, "yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante. yena jātāni jīvanti. yatprayanty abhisaṃviśanti. tadvijijñāsasva. tad brahme"ti "patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaram" ityādyāś ca śrutayaḥ pramāṇam.

div.p: !{787}! Bezug auf VaikhSmS 4.12: dvijātir atandrito nityaṃ gṛhe devāyatane vā bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ nārāyaṇam arcayet. tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ gacchatīti vijñāyate. !{788}! Lies: nārāyaṇasya. !{789}! Lies: rudro.

div.l: [100.11-23] nanu - śvetāśvatare - "eko hi rudro na dvitīyāya tasthe - ya imān lokān īśata īśanībhiḥ*{790}* - viśvādhiko rudro maharṣiḥ*{791}* - hiraṇyagarbhaṃ janayāmāsa pūrvaṃ sa no buddhyā śubhayā saṃyunaktu*{792}* - "umāsahāyaṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ triyambakaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam. jñātvā munir gacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt" ityādibhiḥ rudrasyāpi jagatkāraṇatvādi pratipādyata iti cet - ucyate. āpātato rudraparatvenāvagamyamāne 'pi vicāryamāṇe nārāyaṇaparatvam eva. eka eva rudra ity anupapannam. "sahasrāṇi sahasraśo ye rudrā" ityādi śrutibhiḥ "ekādaśarudrā" ityādibhiś ca anekarudrāṇāṃ vidyamānatvāvagamāt krūrasya rudraśabdavācyasya "bṛhattvāt bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tadbrahmeti prakīrtitam" iti brahmaśabdavācyatvāsambhavāt, "teṣām asurāṇāṃ tisraḥ pura āsann" ity ārabhya, "idam asiṣyatīti rudram abruvan rudro vai krūras so 'syatviti. so 'bravīd varaṃ vṛṇai aham eva paśūnām adhipatirasāv iti tasmād rudraḥ paśūnām adhipatir iti" "rudro vā akāmayata paśumān syām iti - "mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnām" iti. paśupatitvayācakatvāt. "naiva devo na martyaḥ. na rājā varuṇo vibhuḥ. nāgnirnendro na pavamānaḥ.

div.p: !{790}! ŚvetU 3.2: eko hi rudro na dvitīyāya ??thur ya imāṃ llokān īśata īśanībhiḥ. !{791}! ŚvetU 3.4: yo devānāṃ prabhavaś codbhavaś ca viśvādhipo rudro maharṣiḥ. !{792}! ŚvetU 3.4.

div.l: [100.24-101.7] mātṛkkaś ca na vidyate - ity ārabhya "etad rudrasya dhanuḥ. rudrasyatvena dhanurārtniḥ. śira utpipeṣa. sa pravargyo 'bhavat. tasmād yas sapravargyeṇa yajñena yajate. rudrasya sa śiraḥ pratidhāti. nainaṃ rudra āruko bhavati" ity uktatvāc ca rudrasya brahmaśabdavācyatvaṃ na sambhavati. rudra hara paśupati nīlagrīva śitikaṇṭha bhava śarva kapardītyādīnām ekatvena śruyamāṇānām ekatvaṃ na sambhavati. īśvara maheśvara paramamaheśvara iti paramamaheśvaraśabdaśravaṇāt. "śiva eko dhyeyaḥ śivaśśaṅkaraḥ sarvam anyatparityajye" tyādinā śivaśabdavācyād adhikatvena śivataraśivatamaśabdavācyasya vidyamānatvāt. śambhuśabdasya viśvaśambhutvaśravaṇāt īśānasya jagadīśānatvaśravaṇāt mahādevasya "tamīśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paramañ ca daivatam" iti śravaṇāc ca rudrādīnāṃ paraṃbrahmaśabdavācyatvaṃ na sambhavati.

lg.l: [101.8-12] nanu - śvetāśvatare - umāsahayaviśeṣita paramamaheśvaraśabdavācyasya rudratvasambhavāt paraṃbrahmaśabdavācyatvaṃ tasya sambhavatīti cet - na. paramamaheśvaraśabdasya umāsahāyam ity atra rudrādiṣv anupapannatvāt. ukārastvavadhāraṇārthaḥ. u - mā sahāyaṃ lakṣmīsahāyaṃ paramaṃ maheśvaram eva trilocanatvādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭhaṃ lakṣmīnarasiṃhaṃ dhyātvetyarthaḥ. yadvā. devamanuṣyādyapekṣayā paramamaheśvaratvāt,
[101.14] sa saṃjñāṃ yāti bhagavān eka eva janārdanaḥ //"

div.l: [101.15-18] iti bhagavaccharīrabhūtatvāc ca rudrasya paramamaheśvaratvam. evaṃ bhūtaṃ rudraṃ dhyātvā munir mananaśīlassan bhūtayoniṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇaṃ samstarakṣakaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt gacchati. "ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād" ityādibhiḥ tamasaḥ pāravartinaṃ prakṛteḥ paraṃ paramātmānaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ gacchati - prāpnoti ity arthaḥ.

lg.l: [101.19] kiñca - atra: sano devaḥ śubhayā smṛtyā saṃyunaktu. ity anena
[101.21] śaṅkarāt jñānam anvicchet mokṣam icchej janārdanāt //"
[101.22-23] iti jñānapradatvāt śaṅkaropāsanam ucyate. ato bhagavatā nārāyaṇena sāmyaṃ brahmarudrādīnāṃ nopapadyate.
[102.2] sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvac candrādivākaram // [MB.h ]
[102.5] vārāhe: "anyadevasamaṃ ye tu manyante māṃ narādhamāḥ /
[102.6] caṇḍālatāṃ vrajanty āśu janmani nava pañca ca //" iti [VarāhaP]
[102.9] asmād anyaṃ paratvena cintayāno hy acetanaḥ /
[102.12] nārāyaṇāj jagannāthāt te vai pāṣaṇḍinaḥ smṛtāḥ // [KūrmaP ]
[102.14] samatvenaiva vīkṣeta sa pāṣaṇḍī bhaved dvijaḥ //" iti [KūrmaP ]
[102.16] tān vai kudṛṣṭayas samyak paratvenāpy upāsate //" iti
[102.18] "yo yajñair ijyate devo yasmāt sarvam idaṃ jagat /

div.l: [102.24] rajasā tamasā yuktaṃ so 'pi māṃ sasṛje prabhur //" iti [VarāhaP]

div.p: !{793}! Lies: mahāviṣṇum. !{794}! DHN[T] 607: nīyate. !{795}! DHN[T] 607: tridhātmānāṃ.

lg.l: [103.3] tathā rayāṅgam*{796}* aṣṭāṅgaṃ sunābhañ ca suvṛttakam /

div.l: [103.5] agnau pratāpya vidhivat dhārayed bhaktisaṃyutaḥ //" iti [VarāhaP]

lg.l: [103.8] śrāddhe dāne vrate yajñe vivāhe copanāyane /
[103.9] cakrāṅkitaṃ vipram eva pūjayed aparaṃ na tu //" [VarāhaP]

div.l: [103.10-11] ityādivacanaiḥ cakrādinānaṅkitasya*{797}* vaiṣṇavatvābhāvāt vaikhānasānāṃ*{798}* kathaṃ vā vaiṣṇavatvam iti cet - ucyate.

lg.l: [103.12-13] "yasya me śriyam amitāṃ dātuṃ garbha eva kare cakraṃ dhārayāmi sa cakravartī bhavati" iti śruteḥ
[103.15] nārāyaṇaḥ svayaṃ garbhe mudrāṃ dhārayate nijām* //{799}*" iti
[103.17] ravipām iti vāme tu śaṅkhañ ca bibhṛyāt kare* //{800}*"
[103.18] iti bhṛguṇoktatvāc ca śrīviṣṇubalikarmaṇā vaikhānasānāṃ garbhavaiṣṇavatvādikaṃ pratipannam.
[103.19] tathā*{801}*: "indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā hy arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
[103.20] manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ //
[103.21] mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ /
[103.22] puruṣān na paraṃ kiñcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ //"

div.l: [103.23] iti śruteḥ paramaikāntitvaṃ paramapuruṣavaśīkaraṇadvārā garbhagatasya prapattir api sambhavati.
[103.24] garbhagatasya prapattir api garbhopaniṣadi śrūyate. "jñānād dhyanād akṣaram oṅkāraḥ cintayati."*{802}*

div.p: !{796}! DHN[T] 607: rathāṅgam. !{797}! DHN[T] 608: cakrā(dinā)naṅkitasya. !{798}! DHN[T] om. vaikhānasānāṃ. !{799}! Dieser Vers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 36.22-23 zitiert; der zweite Halbvers ist auch in KrA 36.43ab enthalten. Vgl. ĀS 16.33 (Nārāyaṇa spricht zu Vikhanas): tvadvaṃśajānāṃ sarveṣāṃ garbhavaiṣṇavajanmanāṃ / ahaṃ eva svayaṃ garbhe manmudrāṃ dhārayāṃy ahaṃ ; vgl. ĀS 19.12: vaikhānasānāṃ sarveṣāṃ garbhavaiṣṇavajanmanāṃ / aham eva svayaṃ garbhe mannudrāṃ dhārayāmi tāṃ. !{800}! ĀS 11.6: śaṅkhaṃ ca bibhṛyād iti; dieser Vers ist auch als "Bhagavacchāstra" in DHN[D] 106.20-21 zitiert. !{801}! DHN[T] 609 statt DHN[D] 103.18-19: iti bhṛguṇoktatvāc ca śrīviṣṇubalikarmaṇā garbhavaiṣṇavatvādikaṃ. !{802}! Bezug auf GarbhaU 3.10: pañcātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañcātmikā cetasā buddhir gandharasādijñānā dhyyānāt kṣaram akṣaraṃ mokṣaṃ cintayatīti /. DHN[T] 610: oṅkāraṃ cintayatīty.

lg.l: [104.1-2] ity uktvā "atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇasampūrṇo bhavati. pūrvajātiṃ smarati. kṛtākṛtañ ca karma bhavati. śubhāśubhañ ca karma vindati."*{803}*
[104.4] āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītāś ca vividhāḥ stanāḥ // [Garbha.U 4.1]
[104.5] jātasyaiva mṛtasyaiva janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ /
[104.6] aho duḥkho dadhau magno na paśyāmi pratikriyām //" ityuktvā [GarbhaU 4.2]

div.l: [104.9-14] *{807}*puruṣasūktabhāṣye - mudgalopaniṣadi - "vāmadevo 'py āṅgirasas san pūrvapūjāṃ samārātriṃ patnyanasūyāgarbha eva śayāno brahmaiva vedayāñ cakre sa garbhaṃ puro bhitvā brahmalokam upacakrāma tam utkrāmāntam āha madhye 'dhvānam indraḥ upaniṣada uvāca, bhagavan garbhapañjare evābhiniveśamāna anabhijñātopāyo 'smāt kiñcid dhādityā sa garbhas sarvo manyamāno 'dhvanaḥ pāram upagacchasī"tyādi. tathā ca garbhagatasya prapadanavicāraśravaṇādyupapadyata eva.
[104.15-16] vaidikatāntrikabhedena prapattir dvividhā - praṇavapūrvakatvena puruṣādyāvāhanādikaṃ vaidikam.

lg.l: [104.19] makāras tu tayor dāsa iti praṇavalakṣaṇam* //{808}*" iti

div.l: [104.20] kiñca. praṇavoccāraṇamātreṇa śaṅkhacakrādidhāraṇam api sambhavatīti śruyate*{809}*.

[104.21-24] kaivalyopaniṣadi - "dhṛtordhvapuṇḍraḥ kṛtacakradhārī viṣṇuṃ paraṃ dhyāyati yo mahātmā. svareṇa mantreṇa sadā hṛdisthaṃ parāt paraṃ yanmahato mahāntam." iti. sarvakāraṇabhūtāya sarvarakṣakāya sarvaśeṣiṇe śriyaḥ pataye eva svābhāvikaśeṣabhūta iti sarvadānusandhānam eva vaidikī prapattiḥ.

div.p: !{803}! Bezug auf GarbhaU 3.12: atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇasampūrṇo bhavati. pūrvajātīḥ smarati. kṛtākṛtañ ca karma bhavati. śubhāśubhañ ca karma vindati. !{804}! DHN[T] 610 und GarbhaU: dṛṣṭvā. !{805}! Lies: nārāyaṇaṃ; DHN[T] 610 und GarbhaU 4.6: nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ. !{806}! GarbhaU 4.4-4.7 lautet vollständig: yadi yonyāḥ pramucyāmi sāṃkhyaṃ yogam vā samāśraye / aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam // yad.i yonyāḥ pramucyāmi taṃ prapadye maheśvaram / aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam // yad.i yonyāḥ pramucyāmitaṃ prapadye bhagavantaṃ nārāyaṇam devam / aśubhakṣayakartāraṃ phalamuktipradāyakam // yad.i yonyāḥ pramucyāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam //. !{807}! DHN[T] 611 statt DHN[D] 104.9-14: puruṣasūktabhāṣye - mudgalopaniṣadi - "vāmadevo 'py āṅgīrasas san pūrvapūjāṃ samārātri patnyanasūyayā garbha eva śayāno brahmaiva vedayāñ cakre sa garbhaṃ puro bhitvā brahmalokam upacakrāma tam utkrāmantam āha madhye 'dhvānam indra upaniṣada uvāca, bhagavan garbhapañjara evābhiniveśamāno 'bhijñātopāyo 'smāt kiñcid dhādityā sa garbhas sarvo manyamāno 'dhvanaḥ pāram upagacchasī"tyādi. garbhagatasya prapadanavicāraśravaṇād upapadyata eva. !{808}! Diese Verse sind als "Lakṣmīviśiṣṭādvaita" zitiert in Mokṣopāyapradīpikā, S. 54(1), und in Vaikhānasamahimāmāñjarī, S. 17. !{809}! Lies mit DHN[T] 612: śrūyate.

lg.l: [105.2] ātmadāsyaṃ hareḥ svāmyaṃ svabhāvañ ca sadā smara //"
[105.5] "tyaktvā trayīṃ tantram eva prapadya śaraṇaṃ sthitāḥ //" iti [PādmaS caryāpāda 21.56cd]

div.l: [105.8-10] *{810}*iti ca upadiśyate. tasyāḥ prapatteḥ sakṛtkaraṇāt samantrakatvābhāvāt taccheṣagatyanusmaraṇābhāvāc ca tāṃ tāntrikaprapattiṃ vihāya "yad eva vidyayā karoti tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī"ti śrutyā vaidikaprapattim evoktavān sūtrakāraḥ.
[105.13] śivāgamādidīkṣāṇāṃ dhāryaṃ tiryak tripuṇḍrakam //" iti [SkandaP ]

lg.l: [105.15] ekajāter ayaṃ dharmaḥ na jātu syād dvijanmanām* //{811}*" iti [ViṣṇuP ]
[105.18] śiṣyas sākṣān nāradasya dadau cittam akhaṇḍitam //
[105.19] tenoktaṃ sāttvataṃ tantraṃ yat jñātvā mokṣabhāg bhavet /
[105.20] yatra strīśūdradāsānāṃ saṃskāro vaiṣṇavaḥ smṛtaḥ //" iti [BhāgavataP ]
[105.21] padmapurāṇe: "vedajñe brāhmaṇe nityaṃ sarvās tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ /
[105.24] haris tiṣṭhati vāme tu devakīsūnur ādarāt // [PadmaP ]

div.p: !{810}! DHN[T] 614 statt DHN[D] 105.8-10: iti sakṛtkṛtatvāt mantrakatvābhāvāt taccheṣagatyanusmaraṇābhāvāc. (yad eva vidyayā karoti tad eva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī"ti śrutyā tāntrikaprapattiṃ vihāya vaidikaprapatti)m evoktavān. !{811}! DHN[T] 614: ekajātīr ayaṃ dharmo na jātus syād dvijanmanām.

lg.l: [106.2] taddāhe devatās sarve palāyante diśo daśa // [PadmaP ]
[106.4] śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ mṛdā yas tu kuryāt taptāyasena vā // [PadmaP ]

div.l: [106.7] tathā cakrāṅkito vipras sarvakarmasu garhitaḥ //" iti. [PadmaP ]

lg.l: [106.8] tatraiva: "mohād vā lobhato vāpi vipraś cakrāṅkito yadi /
[106.9] anarhas sa hi vijñeyaḥ śrautasmārteṣu karmasu // [Padma.P ]
[106.10] kriyāsv anarhatām eti yathā kāṣṭhaṃ śmaśānagam /
[106.13] śmaśānaṃ tad dhi vijñeyaṃ vāsānarhaṃ dvijanmanām //" [PadmaP ]

div.l: [106.14-16] ityādinā dūṣaṇam uktam. etāni taptacakrāṅkanavidhāyakāni vacanāni "viṣṇvāgamāditantreṣu dīkṣitānām" ity uktatvāt ekajātiviṣayatvenoktatvāt "nānyadehinām" ityuktatvāc ca tāntrikāgamoktaprakāreṇa dīkṣitaviṣayāṇīty*{813}* avagamyate.

lg.l: [106.17-19] yadvā vidhiniṣedhavacanānāṃ vaiyarthyaparihārāya "vapāśrapaṇībhyām*{814}* anvārabhate tannaivānvārabdhaṃ naivānanvārabdhaṃ"*{815}* "avaghreyam eva tat naiva prāśitaṃ naivāprāśitam" ityādi śrutinyāyena samantrakatvena bhāvanārūpeṇa śrīvaikhānasaśāstre pratipāditam.*{816}*. yathā:
[106.21] ravipām iti vāme ca śaṅkhañ ca bibhṛyāt kare* //{817}*" iti
[106.23] "dakṣiṇe tu bhuje vipro bibhṛyād vai sudarśanam /
[106.24] savye tu śaṅkhaṃ bibhṛyād iti vedavido viduḥ* //{818}*" iti.

div.p: !{812}! DHN[T] 615: śmaśānagaṃ. !{813}! DHN[T] 616: dīkṣitānām ity. !{814}! DHN[T] 617: vapāśramaṇībhyām. !{815}! Bezug auf TS 6.3.8.2.1: paśur iti yan nānvārabheta suvargāl lokād yajamāno hīyeta vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhate tan nevānvārabdhaṃ nevānanvārabdham. !{816}! Anmerkung im Devanāgarī-Text: pratipāditam iti. vidhivacanānāṃ bhāvanārūpeṇānuṣṭhānaṃ, niṣedhavacanānāṃ tāparūpeṇānuṣṭhānaṃ ca tātparyārthaḥ iti ubhayaṃ saṃgacchata iti bhāvaḥ. !{817}! ĀS 11.6: ravipām iti vāme tu śaṅkhaṃ ca bibhṛyād iti; dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 103.16-18. !{818}! Dieser Vers ist ähnlich in PadmaP uttarabhāga 224.57 zitiert (dort statt savye lies vāme) und in Vṛddhahārītasmṛti 2.38cd/39ab als "Śruti" zitiert. DHN[T] 618: brahmavido statt vedavido.

lg.l: [107.1] mohaśāstratvāt śaptaviṣayatvāc ca pañcarātre tāpavidhānaṃ uktam iti kecit vadanti.*{819}*
[107.2] padmapurāṇe gautama: "yan mayi brāhmaṇābhāsāḥ ṛjau kaitavam īdṛśam /
[107.5] śākte ca dīkṣitā yūyaṃ bhavata brāhmaṇādhamāḥ //" iti [PadmaP ]
[107.7] dīkṣitāś ca dvijā nityaṃ bhaveyur nirbhayā hare // [PadmaP ]
[107.11] aṅkitāḥ śraddhayā yūyaṃ bhavata brāhmaṇādhamāḥ //" iti [PadmaP ]

div.l: [107.12] skānde - "sūtasaṃhitāyām sarasvatīṃ prati rudraḥ:

lg.l: [107.13] "śrutir balīyasīty uktā pramāṇānāṃ sulocane" ity ārabhya [SkandaP ]
[107.15] na hi svatantratas tena bhrāntimūlāni rūpiṇi // [SkandaP ]
[107.17] so 'ṃśaḥ pramāṇam ity uktaṃ keṣāñcid adhikāriṇām // [SkandaP ]
[107.20] tāntrikāṇāṃ mahādevi na labhyo 'vyavadhānataḥ //" iti pratipāditam. [SkandaP ]

div.l: [107.21] kaurme: "purā dāruvane puṇye munayo gṛhamedhinaḥ //" [KūrmaP 16.97ab]
[107.22] ity ārabhya māyayā gokalpanādi śāpaprāptiparyantam uktvā:
[107.23] "kā no vṛttir mahādeva śāpānnaḥ trātum arhasi* /{821}* [KūrmaP 16.112cd]
[107.24] tathā pārśvasthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ samprekṣya vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ* /{822}*

div.p: !{819}! DHN[T] 619: mohaśāstratvāc chaptaviṣayatvāc ca pañcarātra uktam iti kecit vadanti. yathā. !{820}! DHN[T] 619: vedamārgabhraṣṭhā bhavet ivaikālāmukhe pāñcarātre statt vedamārgabhraṣṭhāś ca pāpinaḥ kālamukhe pāñcarātre. !{821}! KūrmaP: kāmavṛttyā mahāyogau pāpānnas trātum arhataḥ. !{822}! KūrmaP: tadā pārśvasthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ samprekṣya vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ.

div.l: [108.1] kim eteṣāṃ bhavet kāryaṃ prāha puṇyaiṣiṇām iti // [Kūrma.P 16.113]

lg.l: [108.2] tatas sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ śaraṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ /
[108.3] gopatiṃ prāha viprendrān ālokya praṇatān hariḥ // [KūrmaP 16.114]
[108.4] na vedabāhye śāstre ca*{823}* puṇyaleśo 'pi śaṅkara /
[108.5] saṅgacchate yato dharmo vedād eva hi nirbabhau* //{824}* [KūrmaP 16.115]

div.l: [108.6] tathāpi bhaktavātsalyāt rakṣaṇīyā maheśvara* /{825}*
[108.7] āvābhyāṃ sarva evaite viprā vai nātrasaṃśayaḥ* //{826}* [KūrmaP 16.116]
[108.8] tasmād vai vedabāhyānāṃ rakṣaṇārthañ ca pāpinām* /{827}*
[108.9] vimohanāya śāstrāṇi kariṣyāmi vṛṣadhvaja* //{828}* [KūrmaP 16.117]
[108.10] evaṃ sañcodito rudro mādhavenāsurāriṇā* /{829}*
[108.11] cakāra mohaśāstrāṇi keśavo 'pi śiveritaḥ // [KūrmaP 16.118]
[108.14] kṛtvā cārcya ca tad devān *{832}* kurvāṇās tatra coditam* /{833}*
[108.15] patanti narake ghore bahūn kalpān punaḥ punaḥ //" ityādi coktam [KūrmaP 16.120]
[108.19] kalāv avatariṣyanti ninditās*{834}* te bahiṣkṛtāḥ //" iti [SkandaP ]

lg.l: [108.22] dharmaśāstre purāṇe ca proktaṃ hi maraṇāntikam /

div.p: !{823}! KūrmaP: na vedabāhye puruṣe. !{824}! KūrmaP: saṅgacchate mahādeva dharmo vedād vinirbabhau. !{825}! KūrmaP: tathāpi bhaktavātsalyād rakṣitavyā maheśvara. !{826}! KūrmaP: asmābhiḥ sarva evaite gantāro narakān api. !{827}! KūrmaP: tasmād dhi vedabāhyānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pāpinām. !{828}! KūrmaP: vimohanāya śāstrāṇi kariṣyāmo vṛṣadhvaja. !{829}! KūrmaP: evaṃ saṃbodhito rudro mādhavena murāriṇā. !{830}! KūrmaP: kāpālaṃ nākulaṃ vāmaṃ. !{831}! DHN[T] 621 mit KūrmaP: pañcarātraṃ pāśupataṃ. !{832}! Anmerkung in Devanāgarī-Text: tad devān - teṣu śāstreṣu paratvenoktān devān ity arthaḥ. !{833}! KūrmaP: sṛṣtvā tān āha nirvedāḥ kurvāṇāḥ śāstracoditam. !{834}! DHN[T] 622: nindakās. !{835}! DHN[T] 622: smṛ(śśru)tiprokta.

lg.l: [109.2] teṣām evābhirakṣārthaṃ tad ahaṃ tantram uktavān // [SāmbaP]
[109.9] tasya nāmnā tu vikhyātaṃ sāttvataṃ nāma śobhanam /

div.l: [109.11] vāsiṣṭhe: "bṛddhaśāvaka nirgandhāḥ pāñcarātravido janāḥ* /{837}*
[109.12] kāpālikāḥ pāśupatāḥ pāṣaṇḍā ye ca tadvidhāḥ // [VāsiṣṭhaDhŚ ]

lg.l: [109.13] yasyāśnanti havīṃśy ete durātmānas tu tāmasāḥ /
[109.14] na tasya tad bhavec chāstraṃ pretyeha ca na tatphalam //" iti. [VāsiṣṭhaDhŚ ]
[109.19] smārtāni nācariṣyanti kalau brahman*{838}* narās sadā // [LiṅgaP]
[109.20] āmnāyaṃ dharmaśāstrañ ca purāṇaṃ bhārataṃ mune /
[109.21] alpamātram iti brahman*{839}* vadiṣyanti kalau yuge // [LiṅgaP]
[109.23] svadharme rucitā nāsti brāhmaṇānāṃ kalau yuge // [LiṅgaP]
[109.25] kecit kāpālam icchanti kecit pāśupataṃ mune // [LiṅgaP]

div.p: !{836}! DHN[T] 622: uktavān. !{837}! DHN[T] 623: buddhaśāpakanirdhandhāḥ nirgandhāḥ pañcarātravido janāḥ. !{838}! DHN[T] 623: brahmān. !{839}! DHN[T] 624: brahmān.

lg.l: [110.1] kecid bauddhaṃ praśaṃsanti kecid daigambaraṃ tathā /
[110.2] kecil lokāyataṃ brahman*{840}* kecit saumaṃ*{841}* mahāmune // [LiṅgaP]
[110.3] lākulaṃ kecid icchanti tathā kecit tu bhairavam /
[110.4] kecid vāmaṃ praśaṃsanti kecic chāktaṃ tathaiva ca // [LiṅgaP]
[110.5] śāmbhavaṃ kecid icchanti yāmalaṃ bhuvi kecana /

div.l: [110.11] bhartṛvikrayiṇaḥ kecid bhaviṣyanti kalau narāḥ //" iti [LiṅgaP]
[110.12] ataḥ pāñcarātoktaṃ taptacakradhāraṇaṃ*{842}* sarvasādhāraṇaṃ na bhavantīti siddham.*{843}*

[110.13-16] atha yad uktaṃ sarvasādhāraṇaṃ na bhavatīti tan nopapadyate - ātharvaṇe "cakraṃ bibharti vapuṣābhitaptaṃ balaṃ devānāmamitasya viṣṇoḥ. sa eti nākaṃ duritā vidhūya prayānti yadyatayo vītarāgāḥ, "caraṇaṃ pavitraṃ vitataṃ purāṇaṃ"*{844}* ityādi śrutibhiḥ sarvasādhāraṇatvena śrūyamāṇatvāt iti cet - na.

lg.l: [110.17-20] taptacakradhāraṇe prāyaścittavidhānāt. ataḥ yathoktamārgeṇa bhāvanārūpeṇaiva cakrāṅkanaṃ na tu taptarūpeṇa. sarvasādhāraṇaśrutis tu vaikhānasetaraviṣayā*{845}*. "yasya me śriyam" ityādi śrutyavirodhena arthavyavasthāyāḥ kāryatvāt. ataḥ taptacakrāṅkanaṃ sarvasādhāraṇaṃ na bhavati.
[110.21] kiñ ca: "yatra śāstragatir bhinnā sarvakarmasu bhārata /

div.l: [110.24] iti sumantusmaraṇāc ca vyavasthitavikalpotra vaktavyaḥ.

div.p: !{840}! DHN[T] 624: brahmān. !{841}! DHN[T] 624: somaṃ. !{842}! DHN[T] 625: pañcarātoktaṃ taptacakrāṅkaṇaṃ. !{843}! DHN[T] 625 om. siddham. !{844}! DHN[T] 625 om. vitataṃ purāṇaṃ. !{845}! DHN[T] 626 ins. kutaḥ.

div.l: [111.1-2] kiñca brahmarudrādīnām api saṃhārakartā harir eveti śrūyate. yajuṣi - hariṃ harantam anuyanti devāḥ viśvasyeśānaṃ*{846}* vṛṣabhaṃ matīnām" iti.ab hier Telugu überprüfen

lg.l: [111.3] brahmapurāṇe: "brahmāṇam indraṃ rudrañ ca yamaṃ varuṇam eva ca /
[111.5] brahmā śambhus tathaivārkaś candramāś ca śatakratuḥ /

div.l: [111.7] jagatkāryāvasāne tu viyujyante ca tejasā /
[111.8] tejasaś caiva te sarve pañcatvam upayānti ca//" iti [BrahmaP ]

lg.l: [111.9-14] nanu - "hariṃ harantaṃ" iti pūrvopāttayajuṣi īśānaśabdaśravaṇāt rudra eva saṃhārakarteti śrūyate iti cet - tad asat. tatra "viśvasyeśāna," iti jaganniyāmakatvam ucyate. bis hier telugu noch überprüfentathā ca "patiṃ viśrasyātmeśvara," itivat nārāyaṇa eva atra pratipādyaḥ. "asyeśānā jagato viṣṇupatnī" sa hariḥ suvittamaḥ, "perur indrāya pinvata" "virāḍ asi", "bṛhatī śravasīndrapatnī dharmapatnī", "sa brahmā sa śivas sendraḥ", ityādi śrutayotra vibhāvanīyāḥ.

div.l: [111.17] setuṃ paramadharmātmā rāvaṇaṃ hatavān prabhuḥ //" [KūrmaP 21.45ab]
[111.18] iti rāvaṇavadhādikaṃ pratipādya:
[111.19] "setumadhye mahādevam īśānaṃ kṛttivāsasam // [KūrmaP 21.46cd]

lg.l: [111.21] tasya devo mahādevaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṅkaraḥ // [KūrmaP 21.47]

div.l: [111.22] pratyakṣam eva bhagavān dattavān varam uttamam /" [KūrmaP 21.48ab]

div.p: !{846}! DHN[T] 702: viśvasyeśāniṃ. !{847}! KūrmaP: kṛtvātha vānaraśatair laṅkāmārga mahodadheḥ.

div.l: [112.1-2] iti bhagavate rudropāsanam ucyate iti cet - satyam. rudrasya tad api bhagavadvaraprasādalabdham. evaṃ hi vārāhe prāgitihāse rudragītāsu ucyate, yathā -

lg.l: [112.4] "brahmaṇāhaṃ purā sṛṣṭaḥ proktaḥ sṛja iti prajāḥ /
[112.6-7] jalamadhye kālamedhasaṅkāśaḥ atiśobhanaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kaścit puruṣo rudreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ kastvam iti rudreṇa pṛṣṭasya tasya prativacanam:
[112.9] divyaṃ cakṣur bhavatu te tena māṃ paśya yatnataḥ //" iti pratipādya [VarāhaP]
[112.10] "evam uktas tadā tena yāvat paśyāmm*{848}* ahaṃ tanum /
[112.12] tam evāhaṃ prapaśyāmi tasya nābhau tu paṅkajam /
[112.13] brahmāṇaṃ tatra paśyāmi hy ātmānañ ca tadaṅkataḥ // [VarāhaP]
[112.14] evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ tato harṣam upāgataḥ /
[112.15] taṃ stotuṃ dvijaśārdūla matir me samajāyata //" [VarāhaP]
[112.16-17] ity upakramya mahatstotram uktvā ante rudreṇa bhagavantaṃ pratyabhīṣṭanivedanaṃ pratipāditam. yathā:
[112.18] "iti stuto me bhagavannanāde juṣasva bhaktasya viśeṣataś ca /
[112.19] sṛṣṭiṃ sṛjasveti tu coditasya sarvajñatāṃ dehi namo 'stu viṣṇo //" iti [VarāhaP]

div.l: [112.20] evaṃ stotre parisamāpite
[112.21] "varaṃ varava bhadraṃ te devadeva umāpate //" [VarāhaP]

lg.l: [112.23] "brahmaṇā cāham uktas tu prajās sṛja iti prabho /
[112.24] tatra jñānaṃ prayacchasva trividhaṃ bhūtabhāvana //" iti prārthayāmāsa. [VarāhaP]
[113.3] devānāñ ca sadā pūjyaḥ sarvadā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // [VarāhaP.]
[113.5] anyaṃ dehi varaṃ deva prasiddhaṃ sarvajantuṣu // [VarāhaP]
[113.6] martyo bhūtvā bhavān eva māmārādhaya keśava /
[113.7] māṃ vahasya ca deveśa varaṃ matto gṛhāṇa ca // [VarāhaP.]

div.l: [113.8] yenāhaṃ sarvadevānāṃ pūjyāt pūjyataro 'bhavat //" iti punaḥ tena prārthitaḥ [VarāhaP]

lg.l: [113.10] tvām evārādhayiṣyāmi tvañ ca me varado bhava // [VarāhaP]
[113.12] sa tvāṃ vahāmi deva tvāṃ megho bhūtvā śataṃ samāḥ //" iti varam api dadau.
[113.14] varado 'bhūt purā mahyaṃ tenāhaṃ daivatair vṛtaḥ // [VarāhaP.]
[113.15] nārāyaṇāt paro devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
[113.16] etad rahasyaṃ devānāṃ purāṇānāñ ca sattama //" iti [VarāhaP]
[113.21] jagatām upakārāya na sā karmanimittajā //" iti [ViṣṇuP ]

div.l: [113.22-23] evaṃ nṛsiṃharūpiṇā bhagavatā śarabharūpeṇāgatānāṃ brahmarudrādīnām api saṃhārādikaṃ nārasiṃhapurāṇādiṣv avagamyate. yathā:
[114.4] yuṣmābhis saṃstuto viṣṇuḥ prasanno bhavati kṣaṇāt//" ity ārabhya [NarasiṃhaP]

lg.l: [114.6] hiraṇyakavināśārthaṃ stuto 'haṃ śaṅkareṇa ca // ity uktvā [NarasiṃhaP]
[114.12] pravepitaṃ jagad idaṃ deveśe kupite bhṛśam // [NarasiṃhaP]
[114.13] tvatto hi nānyaś śaraṇaṃ devānām iha vidyate /
[114.17] ko naś śamayitā tasya kopasya harimedhasaḥ // [NarasiṃhaP.]
[114.18] tvaṃ me janayitā deva sa te janayitā hariḥ /
[114.19] tasya devasya kaś śakto viṣṇor vai nigrahe bhavet // [NarasiṃhaP]
[114.20] yad bhayāt pavate vāyuḥ sūryas tapati yad bhayāt /
[114.21] yad bhayād dharaṇī dhatte nigrahe tasya kaḥ prabhuḥ /
[114.22] tathāpy upāyo dṛśyo me parameṇa samādhinā // [NarasiṃhaP]
[114.23] kṛte tasmin bhavec chreyaḥ tūṣṇīṃ bhāvo na rocate /
[115.1] vānarāṇāṃ tathā meṣaḥ phaṇīnāṃ garuḍaḥ smṛtaḥ /
[115.2] mūṣakānān tu mārjāro mṛgāṇāṃ śvā prakīrtitaḥ // [NarasiṃhaP.]
[115.6] ity evam uktvā bhagavān sasarja śarabhaṃ tathā // [NarasiṃhaP.]
[115.11] pādeṣu bhūdharān sarvān śivas tasya nyaveśayat /

div.l: [115.13] jagarja narasiṃhaṃ taṃ samuddiśya bhayānakam //" [NarasiṃhaP]

lg.l: [115.16] abhyāśam agamad viṣṇoḥ ninadan bhairavaṃ svanam // [NarasiṃhaP]
[115.17] tam abhyāśagataṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛsiṃhaḥ śarabhaṃ ruṣā /

div.l: [115.21] iti bhagavatā brahmarudrādyadhiṣṭhitaśarabhahananaṃ pratipāditam.

lg.l: [116.3] pādme: "tau yudhyamānau tu ciraṃ vegena balavattarau /
[116.7] patitaṃ bhīmam atyugraṃ gatāṃsuṃ draṣṭum āgatāḥ /
[116.8] ṛṣayo devagandharvā yatra śete bhavo haraḥ // [Padma.P ]
[116.9] taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ jagmuḥ vismayantu divaukasaḥ /
[116.10] paśaśaṃsus tathā karma nṛsiṃhasya mahādbhutam //" iti [PadmaP ]
[116.12] vidadāra nakhais tīkṣṇaiḥ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ yathā //" iti [BhāgavataP ]
[116.13-14] kiñca ānuśāsanike umāmaheśvarasaṃvāde bhagavato 'ṅgabhāvena vinā rudropāsanaṃ kurvatāṃ śudratulyatvam uktam. yathā dakṣādhvare:
[116.15] rudrāṇī: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā viśiṣṭā ca tasmāt tvaṃ māṃ supūjaya /
[116.16] dakṣa: na tu jyeṣṭhā viśiṣṭā tvaṃ mama pūjyā imās surāḥ*{850}* //" [MBh ]
[116.17] ityādinā rudrāṇīdūṣaṇam adhvarabhaṅgādikaṃ ca pratipādya rudraṃ prati śāpotsargaḥ kriyate.
[116.19] naitad vaṃśeṣu yaḥ kaścit tvadbhakto hi janiṣyati // [MBh ]
[116.20] ajānāt tvāṃ hi yaḥ kaścit munir vā brāhmaṇo 'pi vā /
[116.21] anujīvati cet tasmāt tulyaś śūdreṇa garhitaḥ // [MBh ]

div.l: [116.22] bhaved devalakaś caiva rudrakālyupajīvakaḥ //" iti [MBh ]

lg.l: [116.23-117.2] ato nārāyaṇasya rudreṇa samānatayā bodhāyanena pratipāditvāt bodhāyanāpastambādisūtreṣu ṣadvidhatātparyaliṅgābhāvāt teṣāṃ sṛṣṭikālād ārabhya nārāyaṇaikaparatvābhāvāt nānādevatopāsakatvadarśanāc ca paramaikāntitvaṃ na sambhavati. evaṃ kātyāyanasūtriṇām api:
[117.4] talliṅgair eva mantrais tu arcayet tu samāhitaḥ //" [Kātyāyanasūtra]

div.l: [117.5] iti pratipādanāt na paramaikāntitvam.
[117.6] drāhyāyaṇasūtre tu rudraviṣayatvena karmārambhe prapadanam uktam.
[117.7-9] ataḥ śrīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvāt paramaikāntitvaṃ śrīmadvaikhānasānām eveti pratijñā kartum ucitā. evaṃ "akhilajagadekakāraṇaśrīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvāt" iti navamahetur nirūpitaḥ.
[117.10] iti navamahetunirūpaṇam.
[118.1-3] athāsya śrīvaikhānasasūtrasya śīmannārāyaṇaikaparatvād tatsūtrānuṣṭhānavatām eva bhagavatpriyatamatvam upapadyata iti pratipādanāya "bhagavatpriyatamatvopapatter" iti daśamahetur nirūpyate.
[118.4-5] chandogabrāhmaṇe: "vaikhānasā vā ṛṣaya indrasya priyā āsan"*{851}* iti. atra indraśabdaḥ paramātmapara iti pūrvam evoktam.
[118.6] vārāhe: "aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvaḥ tulasī vikhanās tathā* /{852}*
[118.7] catvāro matpriyā rājan teṣāṃ vaikhānaso varaḥ* //{853}* [VarāhaP]

lg.l: [118.8] yatra vaikhānasā viprā yatra santi gavāṃ gaṇāḥ /
[118.9] yatra bilvāḥ palāśāś ca tatra sannihito hariḥ* //{854}*" iti [VarāhaP]

div.l: [118.12] pāñcarātre pauṣkare: "viprā vaikhānasākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvam ucyate* //{856}* [PauṣkaraS 36.260cd]

lg.l: [118.14] kartavyam iti deveśaṃ saṃyajante phalaṃ vinā* //{858}* [PauṣkaraS 36.261]

div.l: [118.15] prāpnuvanti ca dehānte vāsudevatvam abjaja* //{859}* [PauṣkaraS 36.262ab]

lg.l: [118.16] bṛhannāradīye: "devārcanaparā ye ca ye ca tatsādhakā narāḥ /
[118.18] yas tu bhogatayā viṣṇoḥ satkṛtyaṃ kurute sadā /
[118.21] te vaiṣṇavā bhāgavatās santa ity api kīrtitāḥ // [BṛhannāradaP]

div.p: !{851}! ChāndogyaBr 2.23.1; ebenfalls zitiert in DHN[D] 21.8, 41.8 und 61.13-15. !{852}! Der erste Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.3 zitiert. !{853}! ĀS 19.10; dieser Vers ist auch ohne Herkunftsangabe in DHN[D] 21.12-13 zitiert, ähnlich als "Varāhapurāṇa" in DHN[D] 41.10-11; vgl. KrA 36.37: aśvatthaḥ kapilā gāvaḥ tulasī vikhano dvijaḥ / haripriyās tu catvāraḥ teṣu vaikhānaso varaḥ. !{854}! Dieser Vers ist auch in DHN[D] 42.16-17 und 48.23-24 zitiert. !{855}! Dieser Vers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 42.13-14. !{856}! PauṣkaraS: viprā ekāyanākhyā ye te bhaktās tattvato 'cyute; dieser Halbvers ist als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" ähnlich zitiert in 24.6, 42.25, 48.18, 118.12, als "Purātantra" ähnlich in DHN[D] 36.24. !{857}! Lies: ekāntinaḥ. !{858}! PauṣkaraS: kartavyatvena ye viṣṇuṃ saṃyajanti phalaṃ vinā; der erste Halbvers ist auch als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" zitiert in DHN[D] 48.18, ähnlich als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 37.1; der ganze Vers als "Pauṣkarasaṃhitā" in DHN[D] 24.7-8, 42.26-43.1 und 118.13-14. !{859}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch zitiert in DHN[D] 43.2 und 118.15.

lg.l: [119.1] manmānasāś ca madbhaktā mama pūjāsu lolupāḥ /
[119.2] matkathāśravaṇe sattās te vai bhāgavatāḥ smṛtāḥ //" iti [BṛhannāradaP]
[119.5] mayi bhaktiparo yas tu madyājī matparāyaṇaḥ /
[119.7] ye 'rcayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ na te prākṛtamānuṣāḥ /
[119.8] viṣṇulokāt samutpannās te devā nātra saṃśayaḥ // [ĀS 14.58]
[119.9] nāviṣṇur jayate viṣṇur nāviṣṇur viṣṇum arcayet*{861}* /
[119.10] rūpadvayaṃ hareḥ proktaṃ bimbam arcaka eva ca // [KrA 36.59cd]

div.l: [119.11] bimbe tv āvāhanād ūrdhvaṃ sadā sannihito 'rcake / [KrA 36.60ab]
[119.12] arcakas tu prasannātmā harir eva na saṃśayaḥ //

lg.l: [119.13] kaliḥ kṛtayugas teṣāṃ kleśāś caiva sukhāvahāḥ /
[119.14] yeṣāṃ śarīram aniśaṃ hariśuśrūṣaṇe ratam //" iti
[119.15] bhāgavate: "sā vāg anantarasya*{862}* guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tatkarmakarau manaś ca /
[119.16] smared vasantaṃ sthirajaṅgameṣu śruṇoti tatpuṇyakathās sa karṇaḥ* //{863}*
[119.17] śiraś ca tasyāṅghriṣu namramāṇaṃ tam eva yaḥ paśyati taddhi cakṣuḥ /
[119.18] aṅgāni viṣṇor atha tajjanānāṃ pādodakaṃ yāni vahanti nityam* //{864}* [BhāgavataP 10.80.4]
[119.19] hṛdi rūpaṃ mukhe nāma naivedyam udare hareḥ /
[119.20] pādodakañ ca nirmālyaṃ yasya mūrdhni sa vaiṣṇavaḥ //" iti [BhāgavataP ]

div.p: !{860}! Auch zitiert in DHN[D] 60.15-16. !{861}! Dieser Halbvers ist auch als "Purātantra" in DHN[D] 39.17 zitiert; vgl. KhA 22.162ab: nāviṣṇur arcayed viṣṇuṃ nāviṣṇuḥ dhyāyate harim. !{862}! Lies: anantasya. !{863}! BhāgavataP 10.80.3: sā vāg yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tatkarmakarau manaś ca / smared vasantaṃ sthirajaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tatpuṇyakathāḥ sa karṇaḥ. !{864}! BhāgavataP: śiras tu tasyobhayaliṅgam ānamet tad eva yat paśyati tad dhi cakṣuḥ / aṅgāni viṣṇor atha tajjanānāṃ pādodakaṃ yāni bhajanti nityam.

div.l: [119.21-120.3] śrutir api: "tad asya priyam abhipātho aśyām naro yatra devayavo madanti urukramasya sa hi bandhur itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva utsaḥ" iti. asyārthaḥ: viṣṇoḥ 'priyaṃ'; tatpāthaḥ niveditam annādikam 'abhyaśyām'. 'devayavo narāḥ'; devārādhakāḥ 'yatra madanti'; yasmin niveditatīrthaprasādādike svīkṛte 'madanti'; hṛṣṭā bhavanti. yadvā: brahmādīn api na gaṇayanti. 'itthā'; itthaṃ pratidinaṃ vartamānaḥ 'urukramasya viṣṇor bandhuḥ'; jātyekavacanam. sa evātīvābhimataḥ 'parame'; sarvotkṛṣṭe 'madhve'; madhuvat bhogyatame viṣṇoḥ pade 'utsa'; utsukaḥ. yadvā utkṛṣṭaḥ.

lg.l: [120.4-5] śrutyantare: "viṣṇunāśitam aśnanti viṣṇunā pītaṃ pibanti viṣṇuna ghrātaṃ jighranti viṣṇunā rasitaṃ rasayanti tasmād vidvāṃso viṣṇūpahṛtaṃ bhakṣayeyuḥ" iti.
[120.8] ucchiṣṭabhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ taremahi* //{865}*" iti [BhāgavataP 11.6.46]
[120.14] agnikāryāvaśiṣṭañ ca baliśiṣṭañ ca yad dhaviḥ /
[120.15] sarvaṃ tatpūjakāyaiva proktam evaṃ manīṣibhiḥ //" iti
[120.16] yajñādhikāre bhṛgu: "ātmanaś ca caturthāṃśaṃ vaiśvadevārtham arcakaḥ /
[120.19] gṛhṇīyād vaiśvadevārthaṃ bhojanārthañ ca ṛtvijaḥ //" iti [YA ]

div.l: [120.20-23] kāśyapa: "sarvahaviḥ pātreṣu śiṣṭam annaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavanniveditam apūpādikañ ca pūjakā gṛhṇīyuḥ. yathā guror ucchiṣṭaṃ putraśiṣyabhṛtyānāṃ bhojyaṃ. tathā sarvasya rakṣituḥ saumyamūrte sarvavyāpino viṣṇoḥ jagadguror niveditam annādyaṃ viśvaṃ caturvarṇānāṃ bhaktimatāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhojyam, abhaktimatām abhojyam" iti.

div.p: !{865}! BhāgavataP: tvayopabhuktasraggandhavāso 'laṅkāracarcitāḥ / ucchiṣṭabhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayema hi.

lg.l: [121.1] tasyedānīṃ pradānañ ca prāśanañ ca praśaṃsasi /
[121.2] kim etad atra me jātas saṃśayaḥ parameśvara // [ĪśvaraS ]
[121.3] īśvara:pradānaṃ prāśanaṃ putra upabhogyatvam eva ca /
[121.4] śaive pāśupate dṛṣṭam acirād eva pāpakṛt //
[121.5] tatpunar vaiṣṇave mārge vartate vyatyayena tu /
[121.7] tatraiva devatārcane: "karṣaṃ nayati pāpāni puṇyavṛddhiṃ karoti ca /
[121.8] dānair dharmaiḥ tathā puṇyais tapobhiś ca na tatphalam // [ĪśvaraS ]

div.l: [121.9] bhagavadbhaktipūtānāṃ yatphalaṃ prāpaṇādanāt //" iti [ĪśvaraS ]

lg.l: [121.11] sa yāti viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yaddehāvasāne 'cyutatulyatejāḥ //" iti
[121.15] rajastamo 'bhibhūtānāṃ na tu mokṣaḥ kathañcana //" iti
[121.16] purāṇāntare: "yatraiva pūjyate viṣṇur vidhinā prayatair naraiḥ /
[121.17] na tatra hy ādhidaurgatya vyādhicaurādikaṃ bhayam //" iti
[121.23] uktā guṇā na śakyante vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api // [Ā.S 14.16]

div.l: [122.3] saulabhyataṃ*{867}* jagatsvāmī sulabho hy uttarottaraḥ //" [ĀS ]

[122.4-7] iti pratipāditarityā bhagavataḥ paratvādiṣu saulabhyābhāvāt akhilalokasamujjīvanārtham arcāvatāraḥ. tadekaparatvād vaikhānasāḥ tatpriyatamāḥ. etadṛśanārāyaṇāyaṇaikaparatvābhāvād bodhāyanasya āpastambādīnāñ na kathañcad api paramaikāntitvaṃ bhagavatpriyatamatvañ ca sambhavati.
[122.8-9] evaṃ ca vaikhānasānām eva paramaikāntitvaṃ bhagavatpriyatamatvañ copapadyate iti sarvaṃ samañjasam iti daśamo hetur nirūpitam.
[122.10] iti daśamahetunirūpaṇam

[122.11-14] iti śrīramaṇaveṅkaṭācaleśvarapādāravindasaparyāniratasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīnivāsamakhivedāntadeśikasya kṛtiṣu śrīvaikhānasasūtratātparyacintāmaṇau daśavidhahatunirūpaṇam upodghātabhāgaḥ samāptaḥ.

div.p: !{866}! ĀS: guruṇoddiśya mām purā. !{867}! Lies: saulabhyataḥ.
